tuv.seg: 0.1秒，游小默用这么短的时间反应，然后立马闪人了。
0.1 second was how long You XiaoMo reacted and ran.
0分钟到5分钟，包括5分钟，分数为零。
From zero to five minutes, inclusive, no points were given.
10分钟到15分钟，包括15分钟，得分是两分。
From ten to fifteen, inclusive, two points would be given.
25分钟到30分钟，包括30分钟，得分是五分。
All the way up to twenty-five to thirty minutes where all five points would be awarded.
5分钟到10分钟的范围，包括10分钟，得分是一分。
From five to ten minutes, inclusive, it was one point.
<t0/>似想到<t1/>什么，游单突然瞪大眼睛“你该不会就是……”然后他的视线猛地落在身后的游小默身上。
As if remembering something, You Dan's eyes suddenly widened. "Could you be..." Then his gaze suddenly flicked to You XiaoMo.
<t0/>再者他<t1/>是最熟悉游小默的人，所以从一些蛛丝马迹就能猜到一二。
In addition, he was the most familiar with You XiaoMo, so he could guess from what little leads there were.
<t0/>后者怎么<t1/>听就觉得怎么荒谬。
The latter idea was absolutely absurd.
<t1/> “<t2/>儿纸～快起床，我们要<t3/>出<t4/>发了。
"“Son~ Quickly get up, we're setting off soon.
<t1/>那他也太可怜了，遇上了不负责的长辈。”
Then he's really too pitiful to have met such an irresponsible elder."
<t2/>麟<t3/>杭毕恭毕敬地道：“<t4/>麟杭有<t5/>负少主之托，没能见到那个人。”
Lin Hang respectfully replied, "Lin Hang has disappointed the young master and was unable to meet with that person."
C<t0/>hapter 451: Old Eagle
Chapter 451: Old Eagle
---- bang!
‘侩子手’仍然在感慨他的好心。
While the 'executioner' was still feeling touched at his good deed.
‘狗’的脑门霎时出现暴怒的符号。
Signs of violent rage instantly emerged on the forehead of the 'dog'.
"Just wait and see," Ling Xiao replied.
"Son~"
“<t0/>是那个凌霄和被赤血家族通<t1/>缉的游小默，没想到他们还真的敢出现，我记得赤血家族好像已经进去了，他们进去一这<t2/>会碰到。

"It's You XiaoMo who is wanted by the ChiXue Clan and that Ling Xiao. I didn't think they'd dare to appear. I remember the ChiXue Clan seems to have entered already, but they would surely meet once they go in.
“<t0/>有意思，等着看<t1/>好<t2/>戏了。
"Interesting, we've got a good show to watch now.
“<t0/>靠，<t1/>这也太牛逼了，他们是<t2/>什么人？
"Fuck, this is too freaking awesome. Who are they?
“…<t0/>…”该说自信<t1/>，还是自负过头？
"..." Should he call this confidence or conceited?
“……”大鹏鸟扑腾的翅膀僵住了。
"..." The Roc's wings that had been flapping frantically were suddenly motionless.
“……”游小默被他一瞬间噎住了，沉默了两秒，他忍不住问道：“你知道我要说什么吗？”
"..." You XiaoMo choked for a moment because of him and stayed silent for two seconds before he couldn't resist asking, "Do you know what I'm about to say?"
“……原来你在鄙视和轻视我啊，罪加一等。”
"...So you have been despising and holding me in contempt ah. Your sin has risen by a grade."
“……我被耍了。”
"... I've been played."
“……还是想吧。”
"......I want it."
“一个多月前，有个人在十五天内连续扫荡了七八座洞府，这个人是你吧？”
"More than a month ago, a man consecutively cleaned-out seven or eight Immortal’s Caves within fifteen days. Was that you?"
“一个月后。”游小默答。
"In a month," You XiaoMo replied.
“一共是一亿三千一百五十万灵晶，我把零头抹掉，算你们一亿三千万灵晶。”
"The total comes to 131.5(one hundred thirty-one million, five hundred thousand) million spirit gems. Rounding it out, I'll just take one hundred thirty million."
“一切安好”银戈淡淡的<t0/>说道，“其实我父亲本来是打算亲自过来的，他人也已经到了北阳城，但因为突然发生一些事情，所以不得不改变计划，还望傅盟主见谅！”

"He's been well," Yin Ge said lightly, "In reality, my father had been planning to come in person. He had arrived at BeiYang City already, but because of some unexpected events, he was forced to change his plans. I hope Fu Alliance Head doesn't take offense!"
“一区的价位在一积分到两积分之间，有些前辈不是炼丹师，所以他们主要需求灵丹，但是一名院生只能交换一种，多了他们是不会与你交易的。”

"The price of Block 1 is between one to two points. Some seniors aren't mages, so what they mostly need are magic pills. But a student can only exchange one type of pill, if there's more they won't exchange with you."
“一号出价五亿两千万。”
"Number one has bid five hundred and twenty million."
“一定会。”苏朗肯定的说道，“他们为了得到心灵花草都肯花几千万灵晶，一定不会放过任何可以得到黑莲草的机会，而且那个伙计也说了，他们没有留下联络方式，所以只能等他们自己上门。”

"Of course," Su Lang said with absolute certainty. "They were willing to spend tens of millions of spirit gems to obtain the Herat Flower Herb. They definitely wouldn't let any chance of obtaining the Black Lotus Herb slip by. Plus, the manager said that they didn't leave any contact information, so we can only wait for them to return."
“一点点。”游小默下意识的回道，脑子转了个弯才觉得他反了，这句话应该是他问才对，“你怎么样？”
"A little bit." You XiaoMo subconsciously returned. Only after his brain made a full circle (脑子转了个弯) did he realize that it was the opposite. He should be the one asking this sentence. "How are you?"
“一积分五万灵晶。”
"One point for fifty thousand spirit gems."
“一群不知好歹的家伙，你们就等着后悔吧。”
"Just wait; you don't know who you've messed with."
“一群不知死活的脏东西，竟然敢对我姐姐出言不逊，你们可知道我们是谁，说出来吓死你们！”莫菲立刻跳出来，虽然是双胞胎，但是她的身材没有莫雪丰满有料，看起来比较瘦弱，不过在强盗们看来也很活泼可爱。

"A crowd of reckless dirty objects dares to speak so insolently about my older sister? If we were to tell you who we are, it'd scare you to death!" Mo Fei instantly leaped forward. Even though they were twins, her figure wasn't as full or impressive as Mo Xue's. She looked fairly frail and weak, but the bandits still felt that she seemed very lively and cute.
“一起去。”凌霄打断他的话。
"Together." Ling Xiao interjected.
“万俟西元？”斗篷人顿时惊呼一声。
"Moqi Xiyuan? (万俟西元)" The cloaked person immediately cried out in alarm.
“万俟部长……”
"Chief MoQi..."
“万俟部长应该知道我的意思，黑蜘蛛不是个合作的好对象，他们随时都可能在背后捅我们一刀，何不等他们两人斗得两败俱伤再动手。”夏音有把柄落在凌霄手上，但是只要有一丝希望，她就不会妥协。

"Chief MoQi should know what I mean. The Black Spider is not good a partner to cooperate with. They may stab us in the back at any time. Why not wait until both sides have suffered great losses before making a move?" Ling Xiao had blackmail (把柄) over Xia Yin, but she would not compromise if there was a glimmer of hope.
“万俟部长，你可以考虑，你是个聪明人，我的提议对水西部落只有好处，水西部落现在的处境你应该明白，夏玛针对水西部落的行为越来越明目张胆，再过不久，他很可能会发起两部落的战争，我的时间也不多，所以我希望你能尽快给我答复。”夏音说道。

"Chief MoQi, you can think about this. You are a wise man. My proposal contains only benefits for the ShuiXi Tribe. You should understand the current situation of the ShuiXi Tribe. Mo Ma's actions against the ShuiXi Tribe are becoming more and more brazen. In the near future, he will probably initiate a war between the two tribes. I don't have much time, so I hope that you can give me an answer as soon as possible. " Xia Yin said.
“万师傅，我想借用一下厨房可以吗？”游小默走到万厨师面前，然后拿了<t0/>几枚灵晶给他<t1/>。
"Chef Wan, can I borrow the kitchen?" You XiaoMo walked in front of Chef Wan and gave him a few spirit gems.
“万师傅，能不能麻烦你们帮我们把饭菜都端到房间里，作为回报，我刚刚多做的一些就给你们怎么样？”
"Master Wan, can you help us bring the food to the room? In return, I'll let you have some of what I just made; how does that sound?"
“三号出价五亿三千万。”拍卖师大声喊道。
Number 3 has bid five hundred and thirty million," the auctioneer announced.
“上次他的修为还没完全恢复。”
"Last time his cultivation hadn't yet completely recovered."
“上次没能见到，这次挺让人期待的啊！”白衣人笑眯眯的说道，虽然没有像黑衣人直接表达出不喜，但他那句期待却说得很平静，仿佛有些不以为意。

“I didn’t get to meet him last time, I’m rather looking forward to it this time.”The white robed man beamed. Although he did not directly express his unhappiness like the black robed man, his sentence of ‘looking forward’ was spoken very serenely, as if he was somewhat unconcerned.
“下次手别再抖了。”
"Don't let your hand slip next time."
“下次提前说一声可以吗？”
"Can you warn me beforehand next time?"
“不。”<t0/>银戈牵<t1/>着风迟云的手，“我现在的实力还不是我父亲的对手，所以我决定和迟云在外闯荡提升实力，直到我打败我父亲为止。”
"No." Yin Ge held Feng ChiYun's hand. "My current strength isn't enough to face my father, so I've decided to travel with Feng ChiYun to train and improve until I can defeat my father."
“不不不……不用了，灵晶就可以了。”
"No no no...no need, spirit gems are fine."
“不可能。”游君其全力否认，一本正经地说道：“爹爹刚刚听到你说‘你的错觉’，爹爹不可能听错的。”
"Impossible." You JunQi denied it with all his strength and solemnly stated, "Daddy just heard you say 'you're delusional'. It's impossible for daddy to have misheard."
“不可能！”颜辉想也不想就拒绝了，“师傅传消息过来之前，你只能待在庄园里，届时我会把事情告诉师傅，请他老人家定夺。”

"Impossible!" Yan Hui refused without even thinking about it. "Before shifu sends the information over, you can only stay in the mansion. When the time comes, I'll relay the matter back to shifu and ask him to make the final decision."
“不可能，我今年才二十五岁，如今已经是一名彩级一品丹师，当初师傅说过我是通天大陆第一的天才，天才怎么会输给一个无名小卒。”苏朗傲慢的说道，虽然前段时间才突破，但是他一直都很为自己骄傲。

"Impossible, I'm only 25 years old this year, and I'm already a Grade One Rainbow Level mage. Back then, shifu once said that I was TongTian Continent's number one genius, how can a genius lose to a nameless nobody?" Su Lang said arrogantly. Even though he had only just broken through not long ago, but he had always been very proud of himself.
“不好！”花姑其实有在分神的注意着游咏的一举一动，见她神情有异便猜测她有后手。
"Shit!" Hua Gu was actually paying half a mind to You Yong's each and every move. Upon seeing something strange in her expression, she guessed that You Yong had a way of escape.
“不好，它要自爆了。”
"Not good, it's about to self-destruct."
“不好，那家伙以前就只会欺负我。”
"No way, that guy only ever bullies me."
“不如我们去叫那厨师帮我们做一顿？”王华提议道。
"How about we call that Chef to make us a meal?" Wang Hua suggested.
“不对，他之前似乎也有踢中几个人，不止十一人。”
“No, he kicked a couple of people off before as well, so it’s not just eleven.”
“不对，这是传递信息的黑<t0/>鸦<t1/>，它的右脚有东西。”
"No, this is a messenger Black Crow. There's something on its right leg."
“不急。”凌霄按住他的肩膀。
"There's no hurry." Ling Xiao pressed on his shoulder.
“不是你做的是谁？”杨丁皱起眉，对他的话只信了三分，因为这艘商船就只有他一个厨师，不是他还能是谁。

"If it wasn't you then who?" Yang Ding squinted his brows as he only believed a fraction of what he said. The reason being that on this who comerical ship, only he was a chef, if it wasn't him then who?
“不是你挨打你当然会这么说。”强者甲并不领他的情，真要帮他一开始就应该跟他说，而不是事后才来假好心。
"Of course you can say that. You're not the one beat up." Expert^1 said ungratefully. If he really wanted to help, he should have said so in the beginning and not after, pretending to be of help.
“不是才过十天，难道又有什么好消息？”
"Isn't it just been ten days. Could it be that there's some other exciting news again?"
“不是每个外来者都那么好欺负，有些人补反抗只是不想与你们这些弱者计较而已，不要太自以为是，哪一天要是惹到一个脾气比我更差了，只会给你们集九镇带来灭顶之灾。”

"Not every outsider can be bullied so easily. Some people don't resist because they don't want to argue with weak people like you. Don't be too arrogant. If you provoke someone with a worse temper than mine one day, it will only bring disaster to JiJiu Town."
“不是让你大摇大摆的捕捉龟族人，只要找到与莫景相似的人再暗地里处置即可。”
"I'm not telling you to hunt the Tortoise Clan's people in broad daylight. As long as you find the people who look like Mo Jing and deal with them secretly, that will suffice."
“不是！”
"Nope!"
“不清楚，这件事我要尽快通知主人，另外，你想个办法派人去跟着他们，一定要知道他们的行踪，等我请示过主人后再定夺。”

"I'm not sure, but I must quickly notify Master of this. Also, think of a way to send someone to go follow them. We have to know their whereabouts, and we'll make a final decision after I hear back from Master."
“不然也不能把天恨说的哑口无言。”天明哈哈大笑道，终是忍不住笑了起来。
"He wouldn't be able to make Tian Hen so speechless otherwise." Tian Ming started laughing, unable to hold back any longer.
“不然进去看看？”凌霄提议道，虽然妖坟场里不乏一些大神勇者，比方说生前实力还在他之上的，但毕竟已经死了那么多年，生前再厉害，死后也不可能恢复巅峰状态，再者他的神火是它们的克星。

"Should we go in and take a look?" Ling Xiao suggested. Although there was no lack of powerhouses in the Demon Beast Graveyard, including those who had been even stronger than him before their death, in the end they had still been dead for so many years now. No matter how powerful they were in life, there was no way they could regain their peak condition in death. Moreover, his Godfire (神火) was their natural enemy.
“不用”
"I don't need to."
“不用。”凌霄想也没想就否定了，眼中透着一丝诡异的笑意，“既然留纸条的人让我们两人去，那就如‘他’所愿好了。”

"No." Ling Xiao rejected it without even a second thought. A hint of a strange smile flashed through his eyes, "Since the person who left the note asked only the both of us to go, then let's just do as 'he' wishes."
“不用。”掌柜说道，“其他房间的客人已经被我们迷昏了，暂时不会有人发现，先找找他们的储物袋。”
"No need," the owner said, "The other customers have already been knocked out. No one will notice for a while. Let's find their magic bags first."
“不用了。”游小默果断拒绝，就算不是要走，他也没兴趣被这群恶心的家伙跟着。
"No need." You XiaoMo resolutely rejected him. Even though he wasn't leaving, he still had no interest in being followed by these disgusting fellows.
“不用看了，他早知道了。”凌霄漫不经心的说道，之前透露过名字的时候，他就猜到会有这一天。
"No need to look anymore, he's known for a long time now." Ling Xiao said absently. When they had divulged their names before, he had guessed that such a day would come.
“不用看了，是宫殿的地图。”凌霄拍拍他的脑袋，率先走向宫殿的大门，门中央镶着一颗白虎的脑袋，栩栩如生，两只眼睛似是蓝宝石雕刻，偶尔闪过几道光芒，异常逼真。

"No need to look, it's the map of the palace." Ling Xiao patted him on the head as he walked first over to the palace gate. On the gate was a sculpture of a white tiger's head, that was incredibly realistic with two eyes made of sapphires. Sometimes light will shine and reflect off of it, creating the illusion of it being alive.
“不用，就让他们过来好了。”凌霄挥挥手，“让那些鼠兽继续守在附近，若是还有人靠近立刻通知我。”
"No need, just let them come." Ling Xiao waved his hand. "Let those Rat Beasts continue to keep guard nearby. If more people get close, let me know immediately."
“不用，我已经有安排了。”男人挥了下手，“你下去吧。”
"No need, I've already made arrangements." The man waved a hand. "You're dismissed."
“不着急，但是也不能在这里呆太久，外面现在应该已经乱成一团了。”凌霄淡淡的说道。
"No hurry, but we can't stay here too long. It's probably a mess on the outside now." Ling Xiao indifferently stated.
“不着急，慢慢来吧。”凌霄的手放在他的脑袋上。
"Don't be impatient. Take things slowly." Ling Xiao placed his hand on his head.
“不知道！”
"I don't know!"
“不管是不是挑衅的人，不过是个藏头露尾的人。”黑衣人不耐烦的说道，“天刀让我们尽快回去，你到底走不走？”

“It doesn't matter whether it was the same person who did the provoking or not. It’s only just a guy who hid the head and showed the tail.”The black robed man impatiently grumbled, “Tian Dao asked us to go back as soon as possible. Are you coming or not?”
“不管是谁，我绝对不会放过他！”天修阴沉着脸恶狠狠地说道，好好一张俊雅的脸被他败得像地狱爬上来的修罗。

"It doesn't matter who it is, I definitely won't let him go!" Tian Xiu's face was gloomy as he spoke fiercely. His ordinarily refined and elegant face was rearranged into something that looked like an evil spirit that had crawled out of hell.
“不自量力！”颜辉冷哼道，“他的实力分明在你我之上，如果我补及时拉走你，现在你根本补可能再站在这里。”
"You're overestimating yourself!" Yan Hui sneered coldly. "His level of strength is clearly above ours. If I didn't drag you away in time, there's no way you would be standing here now."
“不行。”凌霄干脆的否定他的提议。
"No." Ling Xiao rejected his idea out right.
“不要。”游小默想也不想就拒绝了。
"Nope." You XiaoMo rejected it without a second thought.
“不要杀我，我再也不敢了，不要杀我！”
"Don't kill me! I won't dare to do it again, don't kill me!"
“不要闹事，这里可是苍盟的地盘。”老者的声音在他耳边淡淡的响起。
"Don't make a fuss, this is the Cang Association's territory." The elderly man's voice faintly resounded beside his ears.
“不要！”凌霄干脆的拒绝了。
"No!" Ling Xiao bluntly rejected.
“不认识！”凌霄嫌弃的将洞口两名黑衣人的尸体提出山洞，地上的血半干半湿，他们显然躲在这里有一小段时间了。
"Don't know!" Ling Xiao said with distaste as he threw out two of the men's corpses. The blood on the floor was half dry and half wet, clearly they had been hiding here for a while now.
“不论得到的答案是什么，结果都不会改变。”其实凌霄想了解血脉的事情不仅仅是想问清楚他身上的龙族血脉，他有一种直觉，古叔好像有什么事情瞒着他一样。

"No matter the answer, the conclusion wouldn't change." The truth was that Ling Xiao wanted to know about his bloodline not only to find out where his Dragon Clan blood came from but also, he had an intution that Uncle Gu was hidding something from him.
“不该不经你的同意就用湖里的灵水。”
"I should not have used the spiritual water in the lake without your permission."
“不该鄙视和轻视你。”
"I should not have despised and held you in contempt."
“不说话我就当你同意了，那我去叫凌霄进来，让他用麒麟神火烤，一定会很美味的。”说完他就作势要离开空间。

"If you don't speak, I'll take your silence as agreement. In that case, I'll call Ling Xiao to come in and ask him to use his Qilin Godfire to roast you. You'd definitely be extremely delicious." With that, he got ready (作势) to leave his dimension.
“不过三次挑战必须使用一次，否则视违规，要扣一个积分。”
"However, you have to use at least one of your three challenges, otherwise you break the rules, resulting in one pint being deducted."
“不过你也算是天狗的少主，如果天狗的成员都是这么变态的家伙，那么他们会听命于你吗？”游小默灵光一闪。

"However, you can also be considered at the young master of the Tiangous. If all the members of Tiangou are such abnormal/perverted guys, then will they obey your orders?" Inspiration struck You XiaoMo.
“不过是一个外来者，竟然敢在老娘的地盘上撒野，镇以为你有点实力就能在集九镇动手吗，老娘告诉你，老娘的丈夫可是集九镇最强的人，敢跟我动手，我丈夫绝对不会放过你的。”

"You're just an outsider! Yet you dare to act wildly in this old woman's territory! Do you think that just because you have some strength, you can make a move in JiJiu Town? Let this old woman tell you, this old woman's husband is the strongest person in JiJiu Town. If you dare to start a fight with me, my husband will never let you off."
“不过是些贪婪的人！”老人嗤之以鼻。
"They were just greedy people!" The old man snort disdainfully.
“不过还是需要好几天才能到达。”
"But it'll still take several days to get there."

"How is he now?" You XiaoMo inserted himself between the two. Looking at the wooden Feng ChiYun, he could not help but stretch out his hand to poke his cheek as he randomly (随机) asked in concern.
“他的心愿该不会跟我有关吧？”游小默灵机一动，猛地瞪大眼睛指着自己。
"His wish couldn't have anything to do with me, right?" You XiaoMo suddenly had a spark of inspiration as he opened his eyes wide and pointed at himself.
“他的红卡到底是怎么来的？”柴正恨恨的说道。
“Where did he get that red card?” Chai Zheng muttered as he seethed.
“他要求的是丹方吧？”游小默正是看到晶石板上的丹方字样。
"He wants recipes, right?" You XiaoMo had noticed the word "pill recipes" scrawled on the plate.
“他说他有重要的事情要告诉你们，但是他在中途被人埋伏，身受重伤，无法亲自赶过来，所以想找玄龟族的族人前去接他。”凌霄淡淡的说道。

"He said that he had something important to tell you, but he was ambushed in the middle of his journey and was seriously injured. So he was unable to come in person and wanted to look for people from the Black Turtle Clan to pick him up." Ling Xiao indifferently stated.
“他说的万年前的约定是什么，还有他到底是什么人？”
"What was the promise made ten thousand years ago about? And who in the world is he?"
“他身上怎么会有玄龟族的血脉？”
"How does he hae the Black Turtle Clan bloodline?"
“仙、仙师，小人绝对没有耍你们的意思，我做的饭菜真的是这样的。”万厨师结结巴巴的解释道。
"(仙、仙师), I'm not playing any tricks on you I swear, this is what my food tastes like." Chef Wan stuttered out in explanation.
“仙师，昨天的饭菜不是小人做的。”
"(仙师), the food from yesterday wasn't made by me."
“以前的游小默确实不是。”凌霄意味深长的看着他。
"Indeed, the You XiaoMo from before was not." Ling Xiao looked at him meaningfully.
“以后还需要我帮你留意吗？”
"Is there anything else you want me to look out for you?"
“休想走！”
"Don't even think of leaving!"
“传闻玄龟族待人谦和，看来不过如此。”游小默把这个叫阿泽的男子和当初在绵绵山见到的玄龟族代表玄明比较了一下，两者完全不是一个档次的。

"It is said that those from the Black Turtle Clan treat people modestly. Apparently this is not so." You XiaoMo compared this man named Ah Ze with the representative of the Black he met in the Amaranthine Mountains. Both were of completely different grades (档次).
“但是什么？”
"But what?"
“何事？”
"What is it?"
“何事？”房内传出一个平静的声音。
"What?" From the room came a calm voice.
“你——”玄盛眼神一狠。
"You -" Xuan Sheng's expression became ruthless.
“你——”青年气急。
"You - -" The youth saw red.
“你——”麟昊武怒指着他，眼睛却瞪着凌霄：“不要以为你朋友是麒麟族就可以在本少爷面前嚣张，惹恼了我，就算他回到麒麟族，我也有办法让他在麒麟族过不下去。”

"You - " Lin HaoWu pointed at him in fury, yet his eyes were staring at Ling Xiao. "Don't think that you can run rampant in front of this young master just because your friend is from the Qilin Clan. If you offend me, I still have ways to make his life difficult even if he returns back to the Qilin Clan."
“你一个人吃一只？”
"You're going to eat one yourself?"
“你一定要憋着点啊，不要把灵山挖空了。”
"You definitely must restrain yourself a little. Don't empty out the Spirit Mountain."
“你一直在质疑我们的话，看来你其实知道得比我们还清楚。”凌霄眉峰一耸，黑色的眼睛暴射出一道犀利的眸光，语气有一股不容置疑的肯定。

"You have constantly been questioning our words. It seems that you know what happened better than us." Ling Xiao raised any eyebrow (眉峰一耸) and a piercing glint suddenly flashed through his black eyes as his tone contained an unquestionable affirmation.
“你不会是想告诉我，我们这次是白来了吧？”
"You aren't trying to tell me that we came for nothing this time, right?"
“你不是很想知道颜辉接近我们的目的？”凌霄一脸享受的饮着茶，这个表情每次都让游小默以为他被鬼附身了。

"Don't you really want to know Yan Hui's purpose for approaching us?" Ling Xiao drank his tea with a look of pleasure on his face. This expression really made You XiaoMo think that Ling Xiao was possessed by a ghost every time he witnessed it.
“你不是说打一架是少不了的吗？”游小默被他说糊涂了，听起来应该是不用打，但前言不搭后语。
"Didn't you just say a fight is unavoidable?" You XiaoMo was confused by what he said. It sounded like they wouldn't need to fight, but what he said before didn't match what he said after.
“你不用帮他说好话。”
"Don't speak for him."
“你不用谢我，我并不是无偿给你师傅的，到时我会跟他收取报酬的。”游小默抓抓头，他可不是那么大方的人。
"You don't need to thank me. I'm not giving it to you for free. I'll be asking for payment soon enough." You XiaoMo scratched his head. He wasn't so generous.
“你不知道，在你闭关的这些天，通天大陆发生了很多震撼的事情，这个叫凌霄的男人，他身上有麒麟族和妖凰族的血脉，不过麒麟族和妖凰族都不愿意承认他。”

"You see, when you were in secluded cultivation, a lot of shocking things happened on the TongTian Continent. This man called Ling Xiao, he has the bloodline of both the Qilin Clan and the Demon Phoenix Clan, but neither is willing to accept him."
“你不能杀我”
"You can't kill me!"
“你不能杀我，我是玄龟族二代长老，杀了我就是与整个玄龟族为敌，就算你实力再强，也绝对敌不过族长。”

"You can't kill me. I am a second generation elder of the Black Turtle Clan. Killing me would be equal to making an enemy of our entire clan. No matter how strong you are you're still nothing compared to the clan leader.
“你且说说当时是什么情况。”黑袍人沉声说道，无缘无故出现一名十二阶强者，这种情况有些不寻常，他想到邢七说的那个将他的手臂扯下来的男人，同样是断了一只手，二者莫不是有什么联系？

"Tell me what happened at the time," the person in black said lowly. It was a little abnormal for a level twelve expert to appear for no reason. He thought of the man Xing Qi had talked about who had torn off his arm (手臂扯下来?). They had both lost a hand, so could it be that the two of them were connected somehow?
“你为什么要找我契约？
"Why do you want to be my contract demon beast? What's your reason?"
“你之前不是在灵，草田里种了不少灵草，现在怎么样了？”凌霄结果酒瓶，仰头喝了一口，刚刚消耗的灵力顿时一点一点的恢复过来。

"Didn't you plant a lot of magic herbs in the magic herb fields before? How's it going?" Ling Xiao received the wine jar, and raised his head to drink one mouthful, the spiritual energy that just been consumed immediately started recovering bit by bit.
“你也就这点追求！”凌霄瞥了他一眼。
"You have such a measly aspirations!" (你也就这点追求) Ling Xiao shot him a glance.
“你什么你，难道我说的不对吗？
"You what you, did I say it wrongly?
“你从左边开始找，我从右边开始，有可疑的地方就用传音石呼唤对方，或者先把位置记录下来。”
"You start looking from the left, I'll start from the right. If we find anything suspicious, we call the other with the transmitter stone or record the location."
“你以为通灵玄龟是那么好找的吗？”老人反问道，语气中甚至有一点在嘲笑那些人的不自量力，在他们这些渔民心中，通灵玄龟就是庇佑他们的老祖宗，那是神圣不可侵犯的圣人。

"Do you think it's so easy to find Psychic Black Turtles?" The old man answered with a rhetorical question and his tone even had a hint of ridicule towards those people who overestimated their capabilities. In their minds of these fishermen, the Psychic Black Turtle was their ancestor who blessed them and was akin to a sacred and inviolable saint.
“你以前来过东洲没有，我觉得集九镇的人都挺恶心的<t0/>的<t1/>。”
"Have you been to Dong Zhou before? I think the people of JiJiu Town are all pretty disgusting."
“你们不是第一批人。”老人略不耐烦的说道，“每年都有很多外来者想出海去寻找通灵玄龟，但是很多人都是出海后就再也没有回来，偶尔也就只有一两个能幸运的活着回来。”

"You are not the first batch." The old man impatiently replied, "Every year there are many outsiders who want to go out to the sea to look for the Psychic Black Turtles. However, many who go out to sea never come back. Once in a while, one or two would be lucky enough to return alive."
“你们不用担心，我不介意，就这样，我先走了。”
"Don't worry, I don't mind. Alright, I'll be leaving now."
“你们似乎很高兴？”
"You guys seem to be very pleased?"
“你们准备去哪里，回西境吗？”分手之前，游小默随口问道，自从风迟云救出来后，他牵挂的事情又少了一件，整个人轻松了不少。
"Where are you two going? Back to XiJing?" Before they parted, You XiaoMo asked casually. After saving Feng ChiYun, another burden had been lifted off his shoulders and he felt much lighter.
“你们在这里做什么？”
“What are you guys doing here?”
“你们怎么了？”游小默随口问道。
"What happened with you?" You XiaoMo asked in passing.
“你们怎么了？”男人诧异的问道。
"What happened with you guys?" The man asked in surprise.
“你们怎么想与我无关，我只是传达头儿的话。”
“What you’re all thinking is of no concern to me, I’m only passing on the Leader’s words.”
“你们是什么人？
"Who are you guys? This isn't a place you can just wander into." One of the guards said with severity.
“你们是说苍盟的盟主？
"You mean the Head of the Cang Alliance?"
“你们有多少？”
"How much do you have?"
“你们有没有听到什么声音？”
"Did you hear something?"
“你们有空在这里与我争辩，还不如想想怎么在明天傍晚之前把人找出来。”
"If you have the time to argue with me, why don't you try and figure out how to find your man before tomorrow evening instead?"
“你们灵草堂不是先来先得吗，这个预定又是怎么回事？”
"Isn't your Magic Herb Shop first come first serve? How did this reservation happen?"
“你们的运气不错，今天傍晚有两艘大商船要出海前往鲸岛，你们可以随他们一起出海，到鲸岛后再去问其他人买船或借船，鲸岛的船只比河镇的渔船要结实得多。”老人终于松口。

"You're in luck. There are two big merchant ships are heading towards Whale Island (鲸岛) this evening. You can go out with them and ask someone about buying or borrowing a boat when you reach Whale Island. The boats from Whale Island are much stronger than those from River Town." The old man finally relented.
“你们确定那个人在炼丹？”一道略微尖锐的男声从红色的帘子后面传出来，隐约可见帘后之人魁梧的身段。

"You guys have confirmed that that person is refining pills?" A slightly sharp male voice drifted out from behind the red curtain, and the tall and sturdy figure of the person sitting behind the curtain could vaguely be seen.
“你们究竟想干什么，被我爹爹知道，他一定不会放过你们的。”莫雪愤怒的吼道，身体却也害怕得颤抖起来。
"What on earth do you guys want to do? If my dad knows about this, he definitely won't let you go!" Mo Xue howled wrathfully, although her body had already started to shake in fear.
“你们觉得会是谁？”一名散修忍不住问道。
"Who do you think it is?" A lone practitioner could not help asking.
“你们说够了没有，说够了最好把莫景的消息老老实实说出来，否则我让你们有来无回。”玄泽整个人都充斥着一股戾气，眉宇间更是萦绕着一丝嗜血的杀意，眼睛略红，显然有入魔的征兆。

"Have you said enough? You'd better tell us the truth about Mo Jing's situation, or I'll completely destroy you (有来无回)." Xuan Ze's aura was full of evil tendencies and a tinge of bloodthirsty killing intent was hovering between his eyebrows. His eyes were reddish and there were obvious signs that he was falling into the devil's path. (入魔的征兆)
“你们说够了没有？”大概听不下去，凌霄终于出声打断他们的对话，语气带着一丝无力。

"Have you guys chatted enough yet?" Ling Xiao probably couldn't bear listening any longer, and so he finally spoke up in order to break off their dialogue. There was a hint of helplessness in his voice.
“你们还不快来帮忙？”
"You're all still not coming over to help?"
“你似乎孤立无援了，接下来要怎么办呢？”
"You seem to be left high and dry. What do you plan to do next?"
“你倒是有自知之明，想活命就把独立空间交出来，我可以考虑放你一条活路。”斗篷人放声大笑起来，他并没有听出凌霄话里的暗示，他以为凌霄知道自己逃不了了，心中不免得意起来，越发轻视他。

"You have quite a bit of self-knowledge. If you want to live, then hand over the solitary dimension, and I can consider letting you walk away alive." The cloaked person started to laugh loudly. He hadn't heard the suggestion in Ling Xiao's words; instead, he thought that Ling Xiao knew that he would be unable to escape. The cloaked person felt extremely pleased in his heart and looked down on him even more.
“你倒是聪明。”凌霄说道。
"Contary to expectations, you are quite smart." Ling Xiao said.
“你做什么？”
"What are you doing?"
“你准备什么时候闭关？”凌霄道。
"When are you going into secluded cultivation?" Ling Xiao asked.
“你别乱来！”
"Don't you dare try something funny!" (你别乱来！)
“你别问那么多，我在星罗城的城主府，十万火急啊！”
"Don't ask so much. I'm in Starfall City's City Master estate, it's an emergency!"
“你叫什么名字？”
"What's your name?"
“你可以走了。”凌霄挥手赶人。
"You can leave now." Ling Xiao shooed with his hand.
“你听错了。”凌霄面无表情的说道，“刚刚只有有只狗在叫而已，不用理它。”
"You got it wrong." Ling Xiao expressionlessly replied, "It was just a dog barking just now, there's no need to bother about it."
“你在做什么？”凌霄的声音突然在他耳边响起。
"What are you doing?" Ling Xiao's voice suddenly appeared by his ears.
“你在犹豫什么？”
"What are you hesitating for?"
“你在看什么？”
"What are you looking at?"
“你好像有心事。”九夜难得主动开口挑起话题。
"There seems to be something on your mind." Jiu Ye seldom broached a topic first of his own volition.
“你好自信哦。”
"You have a lot of confidence, hm."
“你就放一百二十颗心好了。”天恨摩拳擦掌，翻手现出他的武器短刀，他正愁找不到人发泄这几日的火气，这个“外来者”真好可以让他练练手。

"You can be 120% at ease." Tian Hen rubbed his hands together, and he revealed his dagger with a flick of his hand. He was just worrying about how he couldn't find someone to release his anger on these past few days, so this 'outsider' would be perfect for him to practice on.
“你就是上次霄儿提起过的小默吧？”男人几乎一眼就看穿他彩级一品的修为，眼中瞬间闪过一丝惊诧，几个月前他听凌霄提起过，当时这个少年应该只有十级修为，“那个在天修的自在阁炼丹的人也是你吧。”

"You are the Xiao Mo who Ling-er had mentioned the last time ba?" The man seemed to have seen through his cultivation level of Grade One Rainbow Level with a single glance. A hint of amazement flashed through his eyes. A few months ago he had heard Ling Xiao mention that the young man should only be a level ten mage at that time, "The one who was refining magic pills at Tian Xiu's Leisure Pavilion (天修的自在阁) was also you ba."
“你尽可放心，我师傅说了，逍遥院是学习的地方，任何势力都不敢在这里放肆，你们留在这里暂时是安全的。”乔无双说道。
"Rest assured, my Shifu said that the XiaoYao Institution was a place to study. No forces, big or small, can act wantonly here. You guys are safe for now." Qiao WuShuang answered.
“你帮我看看，看完再告诉我。”游小默坚定的回道。
"You help me take a look. Tell me after you've finished looking." You XiaoMo firmly replied.
“你应该知道我这次去逍遥院有两个目标吧？”
"You should know that I have two objectives for going to XiaoYao Institution this time right?"
“你很吵！”凌霄不悦的看了他一眼。
"You're so loud!" Ling Xiao looked at him, annoyed.
“你怎么会被通缉？”
"How could you become wanted by the city guards?"
“你怎么全吃了？”游小默一脸震惊。
"You ate all of it?" You XiaoMo was astonished.
“你怎么样？”游小默看到他手上的血迹，紧张的问道。
"How are you doing?" You XiaoMo nervously asked upon seeing the bloodstain on his hand.
“你怎么知道小鸡跟我们有关系？”游小默听到凌霄承认就不否认了，他觉得姬凤是有备而来的。
"How did you know that Little Chicken is connected to us?" When You XiaoMo heard Ling Xiao acknowledge it, he didn't bother denying it anymore. He believed that Ji Feng had come prepared.
“你怎么这么清楚？”游小默惊呼道。
"How do you know that?" You XiaoMo was shocked.
“你悠着点，别太冲动了！”
"Calm down, don't be so reckless!"
“你想不想你儿子？”
"Do you miss your son?"
“你想太多了。”
"You're overthinking it."
“你想都别想了。”
"Don't even think about it!"
“你感觉怎么样？”
"How do you feel?"
“你把它的灵智抹掉了？”
"You wiped away it's intelligence?"
“你撒谎。”男人轻描淡写的道，“最后一句是真的，但前面都是假的吧，那十人明明问的是将你送到村子的青年的事情，老头，都这么大岁数了，撒谎可不好。”

"You're lying." The man mildly commented, "The last sentence is true, but the front part is all false. Those ten people were clearly asking about the youth who sent you to the village. Old fellow, you're already a fully-fledged adult, it's not good to lie."
“你是什么人，为什么要偷袭我？”
"Who are you? Why did you ambush me?"
“你是在眶我吗？”银戈不悦地道。
"Are you trying to frame (眶) me?" Yin Ge asked in displeasure.
“你是我不是。”
"You are. I'm not."
“你是指院生之间的交易？”游小默总觉得这个办法似乎也不能解决院生对积分的需要，因为大家手上的积分本来就少，谁还拿出来交易。

"Are you talking about the trading that goes on between students?" You XiaoMo still felt that this method couldn't resolve the demand that the students had for points, since everyone only had a few points, so who would just take them out and trade them.
“你来了。”
"You're here."
“你没发现吗？”凌霄反问道。
"You haven't discovered it yet?" Ling Xiao asked in return.
“你的错觉。”游小默说道。
"You're delusional (你的错觉)." You XiaoMo said.
“你看着。”
"You just watch."
“你真不吃？”
"You really don't want it?"
“你真可怜！”游小默同情道。
"You're so pitiful!" You XiaoMo sympathized.
“你真的没见过天狗的成员？”游小默赶忙问道。
"You've really never seen any members of the Tiangou?" You XiaoMo hastily asked.
“你真聪明！”游小默两眼亮晶晶的称赞道。
"You're really smart!" You XiaoMo praised with sparkling eyes.
“你知道什么？”
"What do you know?"
“你笑什么？”游小默皱起眉，<t0/>魔音脑脑<t1/>的笑声。
"What are you laughing at?" You XiaoMo frowned at this strange laughter.
“你笑什么？”雷老不悦的道。
"What are you smiling at?" Old Lei snapped in displeasure.
“你笑什么？”麟昊武被他笑得怒火越来越大。
"What are you laughing for?" Lin HaoWu's rage was burning brighter and brighter from being laughed at.
“你管我。”
"Leave me alone."
“你管我在笑什么。”申老头眉毛一扬。
"Why do you care about what I'm smiling about." Geezer Shen raised an eyebrow.
“你自己看看，它哪里在召唤你？”
"Take a look yourself, what about it is calling you?"
“你若不愿意，那便算了，我可不想无缘无故惹一身骚。”银戈作势要走。
"We can forget it if you're not willing . I don't wish to attract a whole lot of trouble for no reason." Yin Ge turned and was about to walk away.
“你莫不是怕了他们？”
"Could it be you're afraid?"
“你要干什么？”翁公警惕了起来。
"What are you going to do with the information?" Weng Gong was wary.
“你要是还想拿回贪狼的内丹，现在最好控制住自己的一言一行，不然主人一气之下什么都做得出来的。”傲慢鸟如是说道。
"If you want the Wolf of Gluttony's Life Crystal back, it's best if you watch your words and actions, otherwise who knows what master might do if you piss him off," the Bird of Pride said.
“你要试也可以，试不成，我们再来商量则呢么把元素之心抢到手。”
"You can try it if you want. If you fail, we can then discuss about how we should snatch the Elemental Essence."
“你认不认识一个叫做丹青的顶级丹师？”丹青既然是远古的丹师，看起来好像又很有名，说不定他认识。
"Do you know of a pinnacle level mage called Dan Qing?" Dan Qing was an ancient mage. It seemed that he was very famous, so perhaps the handsome guy knew of him.
“你认识这三人吗？”游小默一脸惊讶，这是特意跑到他们的山洞自杀，还以为是敌不过他们两人，所以齐齐自杀？
"Do you know the three of them?" You XiaoMo said with surprise. Were they here to commit suicide or did they commit suicide, thinking they weren't You XiaoMo's opponent?

"Fellow Brother You, you're finally back." With delight, Yan Hui walked towards them, "So many things happened but with the Vermillion Blood Clan hunting you down (通缉), why aren't you guys hiding? If they knew about your whereabouts, they're sure to come catch you."
“游同学，还有半个月就是乙级学区一年一次的比赛，到时请加油哦！”
“Classmate You, ward B’s annual tournament is in half a month, good luck with it!”
“游家主不必客气”

"You ZhenTian is here." Ling Xiao tensely frowned. He did not like this sort of feeling, looks like the plan to raise his strength had to be urgently brought forward.

"You ZhenTian, you are an elder. Yet you actually made a move on two juniors (小辈) because you were ashamed into anger. This is not a the demeanor befitting an expert. Don't tell me that you are a sore loser?" Fu CangQiong laughed brightly, yet he spared no effort to denunciate him.
“游震天，我今天就把话放在这里，他们我是一定要保，就算是与你赤血家族为敌，想动他们就得过我这一关。”傅苍穹的声音平静的完全不像在宣言，反而像在聊天一样。

"You ZhenTian, I'll declare my stance here today. I will definitely protect them even if this means becoming enemies with the ChiXue Clan. You'll have to get through me if you want to touch them." Fu CangQiong's voice was so calm that it did not seem like a declaration of sides, and was as if he was merely chatting.

"Even spirit wines has differences in quality." Ling Xiao said bored, but continued, "This wine's probably a high quality one. Normally, the higher the quality, the faster the recovery speed, but since there isn't many sommeliers to begin with, one of a kind spirit wines are rare."
“牛徐阳！”莫菲突然大声喊他的名字，恶狠狠的瞪向游小默，“真正救我们的人根本不是他，他充其量不过是制止强盗的动作而已，真正吓走强盗的人是谢大哥他们。”

"Niu XuYang!" Mo Fei suddenly shouted his name and fiercely glared at You XiaoMo, "The one who really saved us is not him. At the most, he just stopped the movement of the bandits. It's Xie-dage and the rest who really scared the bandits away."
“独立空间？”
"An independent dimension?"
“玄龟族的精血饱含着本体部分修为，你可以试着吸收它的精华，对你的修为会有帮助，不过不要用它淬炼你的体质，会被玄龟族发现的。”

"The Black Turtle Clan's Life Blood is full of the cultivation base from their original bodies. You can try absorbing its essence; it'll be useful for your cultivation base. However, do not use it to refine your constitution, since it will be discovered by the Black Turtle Clan."

"Hundred Birds Valley has remained peaceful. Hua Gu said that they're like the other clans; they probably don;t believe it was us who did all those things. Right now, everyone is launching investigations. We have the advantage in the current situation," Hua Diao quickly explained.

"See, I told you you were overthinking it." Just as they were about to walk into the Giganticus, Ling Xiao suddenly turned to rub salt on You XiaoMo's wounds.

"Seeing your sincerity, i'll give you this magic pill (神丹), it can give you an extra life."
“看来不能所有人都一起了。”游小默为难的说道。
"It looks like we can't all go at once." You XiaoMo said awkwardly.

"It seems that everyone has numerous opinions on this magic herb field. I trust that nobody wants to waste too much time here, so it might be better to listen to this old man say a word. There are quite a lot of magic herbs here, so let us each take what we need and split it evenly, how's that?" The one speaking was a rainbow level mage from the Mage Association. "You're really audacious!" The man lamented. Not only was he audacious, even Ling Xiao was the same too. To actually refine pills on other people's territory, and it was even a rainbow pill, don't tell me that they were not afraid of failure ma?

“真是好大的口气，你们老板娘该不会以为她是酒楼的老板娘就能随随便便敲诈吧。”毛球唇角一勾，勾魂的眉眼却多了一抹犀利，狐媚的容貌更加勾魂摄魄。

“真是小气！”游小默托着下巴，蹲在一块大石头上面，“那现在到底要怎么找到鬼哭涯，该不会要等他们自己出现吗？”

"So stingy!" You XiaoMo cupped his chin in his hands and squatted on a big rock. "Then how exactly are we going to find the Weeping Ghost Shore? You're not saying we should just wait until they appear on their own, right?"

“站住，再靠近休怪我们不客气！”

“糟糕，是水妖！”

“老夫今年已一百一十岁，在胡村生活了一百一十年，一百多年来，老夫亲眼看过的兽潮便有八十三次，可这兽潮从来没有一次攻击过胡村，即使偶尔有失散的妖兽，它们也只在村外徘徊，从不会进入村庄，这种情况自胡村建立起便一直如此，你如今却说胡村会被下一次兽潮攻击，岂不是胡说？”

"I'm already one hundred and ten years old, I've lined here for one-hundred and ten years. In this century, I've personally seen eight-three Beast Tides, but never has one even touched the village. It has been so ever since the village was built, yet today you say that the village will be attacked by the next Beast Tide, how is it not nonsense?"

"I don't have the time to waste here!" You ZhenTian placed his hands behind his back, scrutinizing the other with his sharp gaze. The power of a Sacred level powerhouse pressed down against the other lightly.

"Go treat your brain if you're sick. Don't you know that those who cultivate don't need to eat?

"If it weren't for the assistance of Sir Benefactor, I'm afraid that the three of us would have to flee across the entire continent. If Sir Benefactor does not object to the three of us, we are willing to follow Sir Benefactor."

Two minutes later, the four of them gathered in Ling Xiao's room.
两只金翅虫围在他身边，似在幸灾乐祸，吞金兽非常傲慢的甩了甩头。
The two Golden Winged Insects flew around the Metal Swallowing Beast, as they chuckled at his misfortune. Metal Swallowing Beast simply shook his head pridefully.
两只金翅虫围着他们一个劲的幸灾乐祸。
The two Golden Winged Insect surrounded them and unceasingly took joy in calamity and delight in disaster.
两只金翅虫突然动了，小小的身体往左边无人的空地缓缓的移动，远离吞金兽和大鹏鸟，好像在说‘不关我们的事’。

The two Golden Winged Insects suddenly moved. Their small bodies slowly flew over to an uninhabited area on the left, distancing themselves from the Metal Swallowing Beast and the Roc. It was as if they were saying 'this does not involve us'.
两名伙计是男人，厨师是一名中年大婶，他们看到掌柜下来后立刻围了上去，刚要问就看到他一脸阴沉。

The two shop assistants were both male, whereas the chef was a middle aged women. After they saw the shopkeeper come down, they instantly surrounded him. but before they asked anything, they saw his gloomy expression.
两名女侍一看到这东西，立刻露出大事不妙的表情，她们倒是忘了莫雪姐妹是莫玛之女，身上必须会有保命的法宝，如果让他们逃走把事情告诉莫玛，圣女的计划就完了。

Seeing this item, the two attendants knew that this wasn't good. They had forgotten that Mo Xue and her sister were Mo Ma's daughters and were certain to have special tools they could use to save themselves when attacked. If they managed to escape and inform Mo Ma, then the holy maiden's plan would fail.
两名女侍在带着她们离开小镇后便直接走进一片密林，密林不仅不见一个人影，连一只<t0/>妖兽都没有<t1/>见到，确实是个杀人埋尸的好地方。

The two attendants led the two into a thick forest after leaving the town. The forest was devoid of human life; there didn't even seem to be a single demon beast here either. It really was a good place to kill and bury people.
两名女侍抽出手中的剑。
The two attendants unsheathed their swords.
两名女侍突然停下脚步，<t0/>一<t1/>前一后挡住两姐妹逃跑的路线，眼神冰冷仿佛在看两个死人，杀气十足。

The two attendants suddenly stopped, one in front and the other behind, cutting off the two sisters' escape routes. Their gazes were chilling, as if looking at two corpses, and killing intent filled the air.
两大强者最强的绝招都是绝对足够毁天灭地，他站在中间等他们炮轰，而且他现在能感觉得出来，游震天恨不得杀了他。

The finishing blow/unique skill (绝招) of two powerhouses were definitely enough to destroy the heavens and the earth. He would just be waiting for them to bombard him (炮轰) if he stood in the middle. Furthermore, he could feel that You ZhenTian was really itching to kill him now.
两头<t0/>妖兽吓得<t1/>眼珠子都差点掉出来，急急忙忙刹住四肢，转身想跑，可是已经来不及了。
The two demon beasts' eyes bulged in fear, hurriedly trying to break their momentum and wanting to turn and flee, but it was too late.
两头妖兽一头撞进那股磅礴的灵魂之力里，旋即被撞飞了出去，不知掉落在哪处森林，眨眼就不见了踪影。
The two demon beasts crashed into the wave of powerful soul force, instantly being thrown flying. The fell somewhere into the forest, gone in the blink of an eye.
两头牛角妖兽的视线随着少年的动作移动，<t0/>后蹄蹭得<t1/>更加用力了，口中发出的声音越来越危险，特别是当它们看到少年背对着它们的时候，两头妖<t2/>兽突然<t3/>大吼一声，纵身一跃就跳起来，跑得轰隆隆响，朝少年冲撞了过去。

The two bull-horned demon beasts tracked the young man's movements, kicking at the ground even more harshly with their hooves. Their voice grew more threatening, especially when they saw the young man turn his back to them. The two demon beasts suddenly roared, leaping up, their hooves thudding against the ground as they charged at the young man.
两头牛角妖兽立刻停止自相残杀，凶狠的目光看着突然出现的两个人，龇牙咧嘴，好像随时都会扑过去一样。
The two bull-horned demon beasts immediately stopped attacking each other and turned to glare at the two that had suddenly appeared, baring their teeth like they were about to pounce.
两巴掌的声响非常大，连外面的谢俊都听到了。
The sound of the two slaps were so loud that Xie Jun who was outside could hear it.
两年内就要成为六品丹师，要是以前他或许会拍拍胸口跟凌霄保证绝对没有问题，但是自从他被卡在三品巅峰后，他的信心就少了一点点。

He had to become a Grade Six mage within two years. If it was the him in the past, he would pat his chest and give Ling Xiao a guarantee that there would definitely not be a problem. However, ever since he was stuck at the pinnacle of Grade Three, his confidence had decreased a little.
两者之间好像没有太过直接的联系。
But the two didn't appear to have a direct correlation.
两边谁也不让谁！
Neither side were willing to yield to the other!
两道人影无声无息的出现在裂缝的下方。
Two figures appeared under the tear silently.
两道威压一散，众人顿时觉得轻松了许多。
Everyone immediately felt relieved once the two pressures dispersed.
中天和往常一样热闹，就是一个偏僻的小镇也仍然在讨论凌霄和游小默的事情。
Zhong Tian was just as lively as it used to be. Even a remote little town was still talking about Ling Xiao's and You XiaoMo's matters.
中天并不缺丹师，成熟的十一二级灵草往往刚摆上台面就会被人抢先买走，武成的资金也不多，所以只是种子和未成熟就简单得多了，往往很少有丹师会感兴趣的。

Zhong Tian did not lack mages and mature level eleven and twelve magic herbs would always be immediately snatched up after just being put on sale. Wu Cheng also did not have much funds, so it would be much easier if they were only seeds or immature herbs, which many mages were seldom interested in.
中天现在的形势虽然看起来风平浪静，但是赤血家族并没有就此罢休，游震天在中天安排了许多人，一旦发现他们的行踪立刻上报，到时他们面临的就是赤血家族所有精英的追杀了。

Although the situation in Zhong Tian looked peaceful, the Vermillion Blood Clan hadn't given up yet. You ZhenTian planted many people here so that if any trace of them was found, they would immediately be hunted down by all of the experts of the Vermillion Blood Clan.
中天的形势其实没有游小默想象的严峻。
The situation at Zhong Tian wasn't actually as grim as You XiaoMo was imagining.
中天确实有赤血家族的探子，这些探子每天晚上都会跑到酒楼来探消息，结果每额人都直接去见阎王爷了，偏偏他们还乐此不疲。

Zhong Tian indeed have the Vermillion Blood Clan's scouts, and every night these scouts would come running to the inn searching for information. The result was that every guest would go directly to see the King of Hell, and they would even enjoy it.
中庭交易会终于迎来高潮部分。
The Courtyard Trade Fair finally ushered in its climax.
中等空间符除了传送的距离比低等长，稳定性也比较高。
Apart from the distance transported being further, the mid-level teleportation talisman was also more stable than a low-level teleportation talisman.
中途他们并没有遇到猖獗的海贼，游小默本来还想见识一下这个世界的海贼的希望落空了。
They actually hadn't encountered any roaming pirates along the journey. You XiaoMo originally wanted to see the pirates of this world, but his hopes were dashed.
中途他碰巧看到过，有一种外形和鳄鱼很相似的水底生物成群结队的游过，似乎是在迁徙，结果通灵玄龟经过，立刻把鳄鱼群给冲散了，有的甚至被水流刮走很长一段距离。

Mid-way through, he had coincedently seen a group of sea-creature that looked very much like crocadiles swimming past, seemingly in migration.However, due to the passing of the Psychic Black Turtle, the group was scattered and some were swept very far away.
丹师工会一名弟子被一只水妖撕成两半，鲜血从空中洒下来，接着水妖便瞅准离它最近的真龙族弟子，尖叫着扑了过去。

A disciple from the Mage Association was torn in two by a Water Demon. Blood sprinkled down from the sky. Then the Water Demon looked at the nearest person who was a disciple from the True Dragon Clan and pounced on him with a screech.
丹师工会并不缺乏灵丹，所以想用灵丹来打动他们几乎是不肯能的，除非是五品或者六品的彩丹或许可行。
It was impossible to try to move the Mage Association with magic pills as they did not lack magic pills. Unless the pills were fifth or sixth grade rainbow pills, then it may succeed.
丹师工会的代表则皱了下眉，却什么也没说。
The representative from the Mage Association frowned, but he didn't say anything.
丹师工会的代表吸了一口气，与交手的水妖拉开距离后，忍不住失声道：“十二阶水妖？”
The representative of Mage Association inhaled and after drawing some distance away from the water demon he was fighting with, and could not crying out, "A Level Twelve Water Demon?"
丹师工会的代表费了番功夫斩杀一只水妖后便和真龙族的强者围困住十二阶水妖，水妖无法离开寒潭太久，他们是纯粹的水底生物，就像鱼离开了水不能活一样，不过想要采摘湖边的灵草就一定要打倒这只水妖。

The representatives of Mage Association took great effort to kill one Water Demon before he surrounded the Level Twelve Water Demon with the experts from the True Dragon Clan. They were purely underwater creatures, just like how fish could not live without water, Water Demons could not leave the cold lake for too long However, if one wanted to pick the magic herbs by the lake, they definitely had to defeat this Water Demon.
丹师工会的强者冷笑一声。
An expert of the Mage Association let out a cold laugh.
丹师工会的强者突然惊骇的叫出声，立刻快速的往后撤退，其他人听到这句话顿时不敢耽搁，纷纷往外急射而去。
The expert from the Mage Association let out a cry of shock and quickly backed off to retreat. Everyone else who heard his words, also made a beeline to the outside without hesitation.
丹师工会的强者立刻朝黑蜘蛛的人吼道，他一个人对付不了十二阶水妖，水妖向来是一种非常难斩杀的半妖兽，特别是十二阶。

The expert from the Mage Association immediately shouted at the people from the Black Spider. He could not deal with the Level Twelve Water Demon alone. The Water Demon had always been a very difficult half-demon beast to kill, especially one of the Twelfth Level.
丹师工会的强者给了他一个稍安勿躁的眼神，事后再找他们算账也不迟，黑蜘蛛会为他们做的事付出代价的。
The expert from the Mage Association gave him a look that asked him to let it go. It would not be too late to get revenge after this was settled. The Black Spider would pay for their actions.
丹师工会的通天大陆丹师最多的地方，彩级丹师的数量几乎是个各势力的总和，真龙族和麒麟族因先天条件无法炼丹，所以他们经常找丹师工会帮忙炼丹，用两株灵草换取人情，对他们来说根本就是有赚无赔的买卖。

The Mage Association had the greatest amount of mages in TongTian Continent, and the amount of rainbow level mages in the association was basically the same as the amount of people in every other major power. Since the True Dragon Clan and Qilin Clan couldn't refine magic pills due to natural restrictions, they often sought help from the Mage Association. If they could exchange two magic herbs for some favor, it could be considered a very profitable transaction for them with no extra losses.
丹师，特别是顶级丹师，他们的灵魂和血肉是最吸引怨灵的，那股从灵魂里散发出来的美味气息，一直都是它们狩猎的主要对象。
The soul, flesh, and blood of mages - especially pinnacle level mages - attracted resentful beings (怨灵) the most. What they hunted most was the delicious scent that was emitted from the soul.
丹方的主人也不知道怎么办才好，因为不论选谁，都会得罪另一人，不划算！
The owner of the pill recipe did not know what was to be done too, as no matter who he chose, he would be offending the other. It wasn't worth it!
丹方这种东西不论是财大气粗的丹师工会或驭兽工会，他们都不会把丹方拿出来拍卖，就算是十级丹方也一样，更别说彩丹的丹方，那绝对是无价之宝，数量比起顶级功法技法还要稀少。

Whether it was the rich and overbearing Mage Association or Beast Transfiguration Guild, such things like pill recipes would definitely not be put up for sale even if it was a level ten pill recipe; let alone the pill recipe of a rainbow pill. It was definitely a priceless treasure and its quantity was rarer than a pinnacle level soul or skill training manual.
丹青的话在脑海里一一闪过，游小默突然就明白是怎么一回事了。
Dan Qing's voice flashed across his mind and You XiaoMo instantly knew what was happening.
为了不引起轰动。
To avoid causing a commotion.
为了不被他甩太远，他要把内丹攒在手里，必要时用它来晋级。
So as to not be thrown too far behind, he must grab onto the Life Crystal and if needed to be, use them to advance.
为了买这些灵草，他花了一大笔灵晶，事后确实有点后悔。

He spent a lot of spirit gems to buy these magic herbs and he did regret it a bit afterwards because the news about the Black Spider's auction was only revealed afterwards, including the fact that they only take spirit gems. The ShuangYu Hotel was also given a invitation.
为了他的眼睛能尽快恢复，就算在危险他也要试一试，于是就有了这一幕。
In order for his eyes to heal as fast as possible, he would still have to give it a try, even if it was dangerous, resulting in this scene.
为了保证城里的秩序，南面和北面都派了大量的守卫看着，但是，刑七三人都以为莫景想从北面离开，因为北面是活水河界的方向，所以北面的守卫比南面还要多。

To assure the order and peace in the city, both gates had many guards, to keep watch. However, Xing Qi and co all thought that Mo Jing would want to leave through the north gate because the north gate led to Living Waters River Boundary. Thus, there were more guards at the north gate.
为了保证能抓到两只肥羊，他们把其他客人都迷倒了，免得突然出现捣乱了他们的计划。
To ensure that they would be able to get their prey today, they had knocked all the other customers unconscious to prevent anyone from messing up their plan.
为了关押这里的人，赤血家族也算下了血本，因为级别越高的玄铁越不容易得到。
To imprison these people, the ChiXue Family had really gone all in because the higher the level of the myth steel, the harder it was to find.
为了守株待兔，他们已经在这里浪费了很多时间。
To wait for their prey, they had wasted a lot of time here.
为了得到转生丹欠缺的两株灵草，游小默和凌霄根据就近原则来到了乌山集镇，由绵延的丘岭山脉组成，错落着许多小部落，因为许多是依山而建，所以看起来不像大城池那般平整。

To find the last two magic herbs for the Reincarnation Pill, by the logic of going to the closest place first, they arrived at WuShan Town. It was many small tribes that combined into one town, which followed the path of the continuous mountain range (丘岭山脉), thus it didn't look as flat and tidy as a normal city.
为了找到凶手，西境现在完成乱成一团了，每隔一段时间就传出哪里爆发了争斗。
Xi Jing was now in a mess in order to find the murderer. News of fighting breaking out in an area would be conveyed every once in a while.
为了把游小默他们引出来，苏朗可是帮了大忙，不过他没有和<t0/>李管事<t1/>摊牌，只是设计<t2/>让灵草堂收<t3/>了这株灵草，然后就在一旁等着鱼儿<t4/>上勾<t5/>。

In order to lure out You XiaoMo and his companion, Su Lang had gone and helped manager Li with this immense task, but didn't tell the other anything. He just had the Magic Herb Shop take the herb and sat to the side, waiting for the fish to bite.
为了治疗眼睛，他翻找了很多资料，最后才发现浴火宝丹的存在，这种灵草以令人浴火重生，应该可以治他的眼睛，可是炼制这种灵丹所需的材料却是给了他沉痛一击。

In order to cure his eyes, he had searched through numerous resources before finally discovering the existence of the Fire Bathed Jewel. This kind of magic herb could make someone reborn by bathing in fire, so it should also be able to cure his eyes. But the ingredients needed to refine this magic pill had given him a heavy blow.
为了烤好肉，游小默忙得团团转，一会要跑到这边，一会要跑到那边，生怕把肉烤焦了。

In order to roast the meat properly, You XiaoMo was so busy he was running around in circles. One moment he need to run to this side, another moment he needed to run to the other side, for fear of burning the meat.
为了这张丹方，鲁长老这次可真是下了血本，谁不知道那<t0/>枚固心<t1/>丹是他成为二<t2/>品丹师<t3/>后唯一成功炼制出来的灵丹。
Elder Lu had really given it all to get this pill recipe. Everyone knew that this Heart Fortification pill was his only successful one after breaking through to a grade two mage.
为了避免玉简丢失，他将玉简里的丹方都复制到另一枚玉简上，由于两枚玉简的容量不一样，他只能把高级丹方和顶级丹方复制进去。

To prevent the jade drive from being lost, he copied all of the pill recipes onto a different jade drive. Since the two jade drives had different storage capacities, he could only fit the high-grade and pinnacle level pill recipes in. (高级丹方和顶级丹方)
为了防止有人中途打扰他，他让吞金兽和金翅虫在附近守着。
In order to prevent people from disturbing him in the middle, he told the Metal Swallowing Beast and Golden Winged Insects to keep an eye out nearby.
为什么他会被困在自然城里？
Why would he be have been trapped in ZiRan City?
为什么传族之宝会开启？
Why on earth would the Inheritance Jewel activate?
为什么到她手上却每次都要废死他很多脑细胞，明知道他智商负二位数还这么考验他，老天太不长眼了。

Then how come every time it landed in his hands, he always had to waste so many brain cells? Despite clearly knowing his IQ was in the negatives, the Heavens were still testing him like this, they were too blind.
为保险起见，凌霄在游小默体内种下一粒火种，火种是麒麟神火，可在危急时刻救主人一命。
For insurance, Ling Xiao planted a fire seed (火种) inside of You XiaoMo. The fire seed was part of the Qilin Godfire, and it could save someone's life in a critical moment.
为游小默和凌霄引路的黑鸦是天刚亮的时候就停在他们的房顶上，在黑鸦的羽毛下塞着一张纸，上面写明拍卖盛会开始的时间。

The black crow which was leading the way for You XiaoMo and Ling Xiao had alighted on their roof just as dawn arrived. A piece of paper was tucked under the feathers of the black crow and written on it was the time the auction would begin.
为避免惹上麻烦，部分人很惜命的离开了。
In order to avoid attracting trouble, some people that valued their life left/left in consideration of their life.
为防止炼丹之人有同伴，他们商量过后决定分成两队，一队从正门入，另一队从后方潜进入。
In case the person refining pills had a partner, they agreed to split into two teams. One team would go in from the front, while the other would sneak in through the back.
主人在，游小默用一株上品灵草换到两株中品，还附赠了一些种子，那些种子是天修随手放在柜子里的，并没有太大的作用。
You XiaoMo was able to trade one high-grade magic herb with two mid-grade magic herbs and also some seeds. Those seeds were randomly placed there by Tian Xiu, they didn't have much of a use.
主人求安慰！
Please comfort me master! (求安慰)
举手投足间就把集九镇最强的男人打倒了，而且对方还毫无反抗之力，这说明什么？
Within a single movement, he had overthrown the strongest man in JiJiu Town. Moreover, the other party did not have the slightest resistance. What did this mean?
久而久之，这种现象就渐渐在集九镇的人们心里烙下一个深刻的世界观，就算我们坑了你又怎么样，你敢跟集九镇所有人为敌吗？

As time passed, this phenomenon gradually branded a deep world-view in the hearts of the people of JiJiu Town. So what even if we defraud you? Do you dare to become enemies with all the residents of JiJiu Town?
之前他的速度太快，所以没有正面看到，此时凌霄的脸几乎完完整整的出现在他面前，伏姓男子一个踉跄，幸好他及时稳住，否则就要当众摔倒了。

Previously, he was going too fast, so he did not see the front view of Ling Xiao's face. At this time, Ling Xiao's face practically appeared in front of him. The man surnamed Fu stumbled. Fortunately, he was able to stabilize himself in time, otherwise he would fallen in front of everyone.
之前有人<t0/>不<t1/>信邪，特意走进去几步，结果当着所有人的面被两名守卫给架走了，之后就没人敢再示范了。
A few people hadn't believed this and purposefully walked inside. They ended up getting taken away by the guards and after that no one dared try again.
之前由于游小默炼丹时连一丝灵魂之力都没有散发出来，所以大家都没办法探测到他炼的灵丹等级，但是现在解放了，几乎所有人都发现了。
Since You XiaoMo hadn’t let a single thread of soul force slip from his grasp, no one was able to estimate the level of the pill he was refining. Now that it did, everyone noticed.
之前给游小默打下手，万厨师学了两分，于是就试着做了两道，做好的时候也尝过味道，虽然比不上游小默做的，但是已经让他很满意了。

By helping out You XiaoMo, Chef Wan learnt about twenty percent of the dish, thus he tried making them. The end result wasn't comparable to what You XiaoMo made but was still satisfactor by his standards.
之后不到一个时辰，又有二三十户人家跑来<t0/>跟游小默<t1/>交涉，不过他的储物<t2/>袋很快<t3/>就告竭了。
In the next two hours, twenty or thirty families had come to barter with You XiaoMo, but his magic bags quickly ran out.
之后两人还讨论了炼丹之道和晋级之道。
After that, the two even talked about the path of refining pills and of advancements. (炼丹之道和晋级之道)
之后五长老便宣布比赛结束，明天开始第二轮，然后让大家解散了。
Then the fifth elder announced that the competition had come to a close, with the second round beginning tomorrow, and dismissed everyone.

他亲眼看到一颗果核打中强盗头子的手，而且果核飞过来的方向与谢俊一群人的方向是相反的。

他们不准备在自然城待太长时间，吃过饭后就准备离开了，至于皮球他们，进城前就约好一个时辰后在城门外等着。

They were not intending to stay in the Nature City for too long and were planning to leave after they ate. As for PiQiu and the rest, they agreed to meet outside the city gates in an hour before they entered the city.
他们与游小默相处过，早上又是他帮忙把成熟的灵草挖出来的，那么好相处的一个人，老夫妇<t0/>决定信<t1/>他一次。

They had never made enemies with the Qilin Clan, although judging from their attitude towards Ling Xiao, it was never going to be good. Now, however, was simply Lin HaoWu being disagreeable.
他们二人刚好在前面，本来想回鬼哭涯，听到声音才又返回来。
The two of them happened to some distance ahead and were intending to return to the Weeping Ghost Shore, but turned back upon hearing the roar.
他们以为是天狗的人制造的，因为这片区是天狗的地盘，而且也就只有他们才有这等本事。

他们刚进入宫殿不就这东西就启动了，虽然被人捷足先登，但是一个独立空间却够本了。

他们在小岛呆了一个多月，别说人影，就连鬼影都没有见到一个，可以想象这座小岛有多么偏僻。
They had stayed here for over a month, there wasn't a shadow, not even a a ghost of a shadow here. From that, one could tell how remote this island was.
他们在空间里捣鼓禁制玉简的时候，外面已经天亮了，六十层的人陆陆续续跑去修炼所修炼，走廊只剩下零散几道人影。

Dawn had arrived on the outside while they were fiddling with the sealed jade drive in their dimension. One after another, the people on the sixtieth level people hurried to the Cultivation Institute to cultivate, leaving only a few scattered figures in the corridor.
他们在这座小岛已经呆了不止两个月，外面的情形什么都不知道，虽然他不着急，但是若能知道一些外面的情况就好了，毕竟他们也不是完全无牵无挂。

They had been on this island for more than two months and did not know the situation in the outside world. Although he was not in a hurry, it would be nice to know some news about the outside world. After all, they were not completely free of all constraints and attachments.
他们好歹是神境四星的强者，结果竟然毫无招架之力？

他们并不知道，凌霄体内还有玄龟的血脉，玄龟虽然不是水属性的妖兽，但是他们世代生存在活水河界，对水的操纵虽然没有白虎厉害，但绝对是数一数二的，他所传承的记忆中就有不少是关于如何灵活控水的方法。

What they did not know was that Ling Xiao had the bloodline of the Black Tortoise within his body. Although the Black Tortoise was not a demon beast with a water attribute, they had lived in the Living Waters River Boundary for many generations. Their ability to manipulate water was definitely one of the best even if it was not a good as the White Tiger. Many of his inherited memories concerned methods on how to flexibly control water (灵活控水).
他们并不知道，半刻钟后，天狗的人也出现在这片土地上。

They didn't need to hid or be sneaky since not many knew of their true faces. Not only that, most wouldn't expect them to add an extra person in their party at such a critical time.

They had long since heard of the treasure that was a magic bag, but the price was too expensive for them. Now, seeing that this young gentleman was willing to gift them a magic bag, if they don't act now, they might regret it in the future.
他们显然忘了，游小默不只是一个人而已，凌霄虽然一直待在屋里，但是他只是在调养而已，大概就是这样才造成他们的错觉，以为凌霄没什么本事，至于吞金兽和两只金翅虫，太小了，没注意。

They had clearly forgotten that it wasn't just You XiaoMo by himself. Even though Ling Xiao stayed in the house the whole time, he was only recuperating. 他们此刻所在的都城是西境北面唯一的一座都城自然城，都城面积非常大，而且也是通天大陆最奇特的一座城，因为该城将一片森林也给圈了进去。

The capital city they were currently at was the only capital city in the north of Xi Jing - the Nature City (自然城). The capital city was extraordinarily large and it was also the most peculiar city in the TongTian Continent as it enclosed a forest within its walls.
他们没有深入腹地，而是待在外围，需要空间之力制作空间符，便在外围收取即可，如果有人经过，一定会大为震惊，一般人躲都来不及，更别说靠近。

They did not go deep into the interior, but stayed in the periphery. 他们的大王一直惦记着那个人做的火鸡，好几次差点不顾一切冲过去，要不是他们及时阻止，恐怕已经酿成大祸，因为那个人的实力看起来不低的样子。

Their king still remembered the turkey that that person made, and he had almost charged over numerous times without a care. If it weren't for them stopping him just in time, he probably would've met disaster already, since that person didn't look like he was weak.
他们的实力虽然已经是佼佼者，但是任然不如游小默，发现他是顶级丹师后，两人一惊。

他们的目的地是上次经过的自然城，莫景此刻就在那里，不过当他们感到的时候，自然城却不知因何原因，竟然只允进城不允出城，很多人都被阻在外面，不能出城就等于没了自由。

Their goal was ZiRan City, which they had passed before, since Mo Jing was there right now. But when they arrived, for whatever reason, ZiRan City only allowed people to enter and not leave the city. Many people were stuck outside, because not being able to leave the city meant having no freedom.
他们绝对承担不起后果。

他们要去的地方是凌霄上次在西境晋级的山谷，原本郁郁葱葱的大山谷，在凌霄离开后变成一片焦土，原本生活在山谷里的妖兽，不是死了就是跑了，不过事后还是有人到这里来探查情况。

他们还以为是主人在使坏不给他们吃，可是抬头却发型烤肉在凌霄老大手里，三只默默的转头，卖萌的看着他们主人，求赏口肉吃。

They had thought that it was their Master who was playing dirty tricks and not letting them eat. However, they soon discovered that the roast meat was in the hands of Boss Ling Xiao after looking up. 他们这次小心的隐藏了行踪，并且直接去了黑色大峡谷的北边，在北边找了一圈后，果然也没有发现目标。
This time, they carefully covered their tracks and went directly to the Black Canyon. They looked around the north side and, as expected, didn't find their target.

Once they got rid of the Water Demon, the other side was also coming to a conclusion. All of the Level Eleven Water Demons had been killed, leaving only the Level Twelve one, but even it won't last long as Ling Xiao's occasional flames made it's body patchy, like the moon's surface.
他们追着蠢主人的方向，但是蠢主人也在移动，结果眼睁睁的看着距离越拉越远，真是心酸呐！

They were chasing in direction their stupid Master had went in, but their stupid Master was also moving. As a result, they could only look on helplessly as the distance widened farther and farther. It was really saddening!

His head was lowered so he didn't see that the man who appeared was Ling Xiao. Words rattled from his mouth like a torrent.
他倒是想将所有人都拦下，可是不仅犯众怒不说，他一个人也没有那么多分身。

From the book he was reading, he saw a familar last name. It seemed that the You Family (游族) had also particpated in that battle during the ancient times (远古发生的那场大战) and had a few epic powerhouses. (牛逼轰轰)
他到底是有多倒霉！

他又看了眼游小默刚刚走过去的方向，该不被发现了什么？
He glanced again in the direction that You XiaoMo was about to walk in. He couldn't have been discovered, right?
他发现东洲人会根据衣服的质量来判断是不是外来者，既然如此，只要他和凌霄换上跟他们一样的衣服，短时间内应该不会被发现。

He discovered that Dong Zhou's people used the quality of the clothes to determine whether or not someone was a foreigner. Since it was like this, as long as he and Ling Xiao changed into the same clothes as them, they wouldn't be found out for a while.
他只催熟两株灵草，只能先做一坛灵酒，剩下的要等灵草田其余灵草成熟再来酿制。

As he only accelerated the maturity of two magic herbs, he could only make one pot of spirit wine. He would have to wait for the remaining magic herbs in the magic herb field to mature before using them to brew spirit wine.
他只是想让凌霄快点结束而已，为什么就这么难？

He did not believe that Ling Xiao would have caused such a stir just by refining a corpse. There was a ninety percent chance that it was the Black Spider and that holy maiden from the Guma Tribe. He did not guess that the ShuiXi Tribe would also be involved for a period of time.
他可没打算就这样放过他们，自动送上门来的炮灰岂有放过之理，而且既然是那只鸡的对手，他就勉为其难帮他铲除几个。

He had no intentions whatsoever of just letting them go like this. What was the point of letting go of cannon fodder that had sent themselves straight to his door? 他听出来是游震天的声音。

他听小镇上的人说这里是死人最多的地方。

他周围的人也没有让他失望，立刻就有人追问了。
The people around him did not disappoint and there were people immediately questioning him.
他和凌霄坐在靠窗的角落里，谢俊一伙人一时没注意到他们，不过牛徐阳却第一时间就看到了他们，反应却没有，平平淡淡的，好像不认识他们一样。

He and Ling Xiao sat in the corner close the window. For a while, Xie Jun and the rest didn't notice them, but Niu XuYang saw them immediately. However, he had no reaction. Instead, he was calm and unperturbed, as if he didn't recognize them.
他和斗篷人不同，夏音和凌霄的对话总让他觉得那里怪怪的，不过他并没有深入思考，因为凌霄突然对斗篷人动手了，如今见夏音挡着他，心中更加疑惑。

He was different from the cloaked man. He felt that something was strange about Xia Yin and Ling Xiao's dialog, but he did not think deeply over it as Ling Xiao had launched a sudden attack on the cloaked man. Now that Xia Yin had blocked him, the doubts in his heart grew.
他四处找过了，却只找到那名弟子的尸体，而风迟云却不见踪影，赦长老再也不敢耽搁。

他在厨房里忙活，没有注意到外面的万厨师和他的助手已经被香味吸引进来了，看着游小默麻利的做菜，两人面面相觑。

He bustled around in the kitchen, not noticing that the Chef Wan and his assistant outside had been lured in by the aroma. Watching You XiaoMo cooking with practiced swiftness, the two looked at each other.
他在地下迷宫，通道内没有海水，所以和斗篷人他们的情况不同，他只能考自己双腿跑出迷宫，虽然有地图，但是速度还是快不了多久，结果当所有海水都排出宫殿，他却被困在宫殿里。

He was in the underground labyrinth, and the passageways had no sea water, so his circumstances were different from the cloaked person's. As a result, by the time all the sea water drained out of the palace, he ended up being trapped in the palace.
他在山脉的深处果然看到鬼哭涯的标记，好玩的是，鬼哭涯的周围正是客栈老板用红字注明危险的地方。
He saw that in the depth of the mountain range was indeed the Weeping Ghost Shore and what was interesting was that surrounding it, the owner had used a red pen to mark out it's danger.
他好像是第一次看到有人这么怕他，真是让他唏嘘不已，以前只有他怕别人的份，现在终于风水轮流转。
It was the first time he had seen someone so afraid of him. Before, it was only him being afraid, now it was the other way around. As they say, what comes around goes around.
他姓凌，也姓麟，因为麟姓是他父亲的姓，但是在他出生后，他父亲却让他姓凌，至于是什么原因却没有说明。
His surname was Ling, but also Lin, because Lin was his father's last name. But after he was born, his father changed Ling Xiao's surname to Ling, and he had never told him the reason why.
他对凌霄竞价时的本事可是深有体会。

他对水妖还是有些了解的，如果生前没有仇恨，水妖不可能会用一种怨恨的眼神看着游小默，既然这种仇恨浓烈到死后变成水妖还记得，那就表示此人生前极度怨恨他。

He was somewhat knowledgeable on Water Demons. If there wasn't enmity from it's previous life, it wouldn't have looked at You XiaoMo with such resenting eyes. Since, this kind of hatred was strong enough to be remembered even as a Water Demon, that could only mean, in their previous life, it was an extreme hatred.
他就像被一座直冲云霄的山峰压在下面，带给他不可抗拒的压力，这种感觉他只在那个人身上感受到过。
He felt as if he was crushed under a mountain that was high as the sky, giving him an unbreakable pressure. This kind of feeling he had only felt on 'that' person.
他就是本场拍卖会的拍卖师，实力为神境七星。
He was the auctioneer of the auction today, a Divine Level seven star.

Ling Xiao helped him close his mouth and explained, uncaringly, "Can't you tell? That holy maiden wants to kill Mo Xue and Mo Fei and then frame us. Plenty of people know that there's bad blood between the sisters and us. With them dead, the Guma Tribe would naturally suspect us."
凌霄并没有再去找他们玩逐个击破，真要击破他们，那就不是受点轻伤那么简单了，接下来就是履行约定的时候。

Ling Xiao did not look for them to toy with and destroy one by one again. If he really wanted to destroy them, then they would not merely be sustaining minor injuries. Furthermore, the appointed time was coming up.
凌霄应了一声，“它不需要灵智，不然一天到晚都会想着逃跑，以后要用到它对我会有阻碍。”
Ling Xiao confirmed, "It doesn't need intelligence, otherwise, it would be thinking of escaping all day. That's going to be a hindrance when we use it."
凌霄开口说道：“这枚火元素之心既然会放在最后一位，它的价值应该比前两者都要高，你连功法和丹方都拿不下，能指望拿下这枚元素之心？”

Ling Xiao opened his mouth and replied, "Since this Fire Elemental Essence was put as the last item, its value should be higher than the previous two. You can't even get a soul training manual or pill recipe, how would it be possible for you to get this Elemental Essence?"
凌霄弹了他的脑门一记，“时机把握得很好，但还没到聪明的地步。”
Ling Xiao flicked his forehead once. "You took advantage of the opportunity very well, but you still can't quite be called 'smart' yet."
凌霄往<t0/>屋里看了一眼。
Ling Xiao glanced at the inside of the hut.
凌霄往前走几步，身上的气势呈现隐而不发的状态，只见他翻起手掌，掌心霎时跳跃出一缕火焰，火焰呈现紫红色，乃麒麟神火与妖凰神火的结合，火焰慢慢的融成一团火球，散发的温度比太阳还要炙热。

Ling Xiao walked forward a couple of steps. The aura from his body was in a hidden state. Only the action of him turning his plams face-up was seen, and a wisp of flame could be seen leaping in the hollow of his palm. The flame was red-purple in color, and it was the combination of the Qilin Godfire and the Demon Phoenix Godfire. The flame slowly melted into a ball of fire and the temperature emitted was even hotter than the sun.
凌霄往后仰到，放声大笑起来。
Ling Xiao leaned backwards (往后仰到) and burst into laughter.
凌霄很<t0/>是平静的讲出自己的目的，一开始他并没有这么想过，主要那时他还不知道自己体内还隐藏着通<t1/>灵玄龟<t2/>的血脉，知道后就打起这个主意。

Ling Xiao calmly spoke of his intentions. At first he hadn't thought of doing this, but that was mainly because he didn't realize that he was of the Black Turtle bloodline. After finding out, he had thought of this idea.
凌霄很喜欢群殴，不管是他群殴别人，还是别人群殴他，都是非常爽有非常刺激的打架方式，不过这次他却不准备这样做。

Ling Xiao really liked wild brawls (群殴). No matter whether he was attacking others or others were ganging up him, he would be fighting in an extremely invigorating and exciting style. However, this time he was not prepared to do so.
凌霄很肯定的说道：“不会，他们虽然是古叔的部下，但是一个个都有自己的独立思想，绝对不会因为我和古叔的关系或古叔的命令就听命于我。”

Ling Xiao confidently stated, "They won't. Although they are Uncle Gu's subordinates, each and every one has their own independent mind and definitely would not obey me due to my relationship with Uncle Gu or with Uncle Gu's command."
凌霄很遗憾当时没有在场。

Ling Xiao obtained three points and was currently in the lead. The one ranked first in strength obtained two points, and was currently second. And then it was Rong Xuan, Qing Zhang and the others with one point each. In total, eight people had gained points.
凌霄微笑着说道，表情依旧不愠不火，配上他的话，不知情的人还真以为他们的关系有多好。

Ling Xiao smiled slightly as he spoke, his expression as light as ever. Matched with his words, someone who wasn't familiar with the situation would really believe that their relationship was quite good.

Ling Xiao was unable to restrain a smile curling up the corner of his mouth. A certain person who had always been well-known for stirring up trouble actually became law-abiding today. It was really worthy of celebration.
凌霄思索道：“听说彩级丹师突破了很多丹师的界限，比如？”
Ling Xiao asked thoughtfully, "I heard that a rainbow leveled mage broke through a lot of a mage's limitations, like what?"
凌霄思索道：“找找看就知道了，那个白衣人说过要去集合，现在人应该都集中在某个地方，我们先上去看看。”

Ling Xiao thought over it, “We’ll know if we take a look around. That white robed man said that they were going to gather. Everyone should be gathered at someplace now. Let’s go up and take a look first.”
凌霄思考了一下，“半只不管饱，我吃得也比你多，要不然给我四分之一，我们平分。”
Ling Xiao thought about it and said, "Half is not filling for me and I eat more than you. How about you give me a quarter of yours, so we split this evenly."
凌霄悠然的看了他一眼，“你很天真。”
Ling Xiao leisurely gave him a look, "You're really naive."
凌霄意味深长的笑道：“你知道黄鼠兽为什么要当你的契约兽吗？”
With a meaningful smile, Ling Xiao asked, "Do you know why the Ground Squirrel Beast wanted to be your demon beast?"
凌霄慢悠悠的走出来，“做什么？”
Ling Xiao leisurely walked out, "Help you to do what?"
凌霄戏谑的笑道：“若夫人非要这么说，为夫也没办法，不过作为承受一方，夫人不觉得你怀孕的可能性更大吗？”

Ling Xiao jokingly laughed, "If the wife says so, then your husband can only comply (为夫也没办法). But as the party who is on the receiving end (承受一方), doesn't you think that you are more likely to be pregnant, my dear wife?"
凌霄手一收，身体往后退了两步，游小默没有扑到内丹，反而扑到他的大腿上。
Ling Xiao retracted his hand and took two steps back. Not only did You XiaoMo not get the Life Crystal, he fell onto Ling Xiao's lap.
凌霄手上的筷子不客气的往那道酸辣鸡丁伸过去，虽然材料都很普通，但是不可否认味道确实很香，这种口味他很喜欢。
Ling Xiao's chopsticks went towards the spicy and sour chicken without shame. Though the ingredients were very normal, it had a mouthwatering scent, something that was just his taste.
凌霄手里拿着只啃了一半的果子，看向两手空空的游小默，意外的挑了下眉。
Ling Xiao still held a half-eaten fruit in his hand. He looked at You XiaoMo, whose hands were both empty, and he raised an eyebrow in surprise.
凌霄打开玉盒，水元素之心迅速的往外窜，刚自由没两秒，立刻被一只大手抓回来。
Ling Xiao opened the box and immediately the Water Elemental Essence darted out, but it wasn't even free for two seconds before it was captured by a giant hand.

Ling Xiao raised one hand and blew away a person with the force of a single palm. A simple technique, but with plenty of power behind it. Those who charged at the front only just entered the fight, but were even more useless than Teng Jiao, getting blown out the ring one after the other. In a flash, all the members of the Teng family and half of the Chai family had been eliminated.
凌霄扶他坐在椅子上，然后在他旁边坐下，“这里是大通海的东面海域，距离陆地很远，海岛数量稀少，距离这座岛最近的海岛也要上万里，靠飞行的话，要几年才能回到东洲。”

Ling Xiao helped him sit in a chair before sitting next to him. "This is the eastern territory of DaTong Ocean (大通海). It's very far from the continent, and there are very few islands. It's at least five thousand kilometers from here to the nearest island. If we depend on flying, it'll take a few years before we can get back to Dong Zhou."

凌霄把玩着手上的玉片，空间较薄弱，开道口子就比较容易，因此不用担心力量过猛，导致空间之力不稳定。

Ling Xiao played with the jade tokens in his hand. If the dimension was relatively weaker, it was easier to make an opening, and he wouldn't have to worry about using too much force, leading to the dimension being unstable.

Ling Xiao grabbed You XiaoMo and with his quick reflexes, rushed inside. Inside the barrier was a air-tight space, blocking out all the sea water and the red light turned back into a map.
凌霄抬头一看，刚刚还很晴朗的天空此时已经凝聚起一大片乌云，乌云的面积很大，方圆几百米都被覆盖了，隐约还能看到云中噼啪的闪电。
Ling Xiao looked up to see the once-clear-sky filled with thunder clouds. It took up a few hundred meter radius from their cave and one could even see lightening flying through.

Ling Xiao lifted his head and looked at the sky, which was about to dim. "It's already night, let's talk about this tomorrow. Let's first go rest in the dimension for the night." /PARA "Your dimension or my dimension?"

Ling Xiao took You XiaoMo to a forest with no hints of human life. The place was crawling with high level demon beasts, and the enraged roaring of demon beasts could occasionally be heard.

Ling Xiao dragged his wife over, and he looked at the name carved on the gravestone. It only had the date that the owner of the grave died on, no surname or given name, and it seemed to be a nameless grave.

Ling Xiao took out the bottle with the Black Turtle Life Blood (玄龟精血). There were only three droplets inside, since Xuan Wei's (玄威) hadn't yet been refined. But he only needed one drop, so he withdrew one drop before handing the rest to You XiaoMo.

Ling Xiao raised an eyebrow and did not speak. He just enigmatically looked at him and the few people he brought. The numbers were certainly several times lesser than that of the last time. There was indeed 'sincerity'.
凌霄挑挑眉，千年前才建立的势力他和游小默一样没听说过，所以也有点好奇，“所以当有失主找上门，他们就可以用是别人卖给他们的理由推脱得一干二净？”

Ling Xiao raised an eyebrow. 凌霄接着说：“一般人看到一个长得跟自己很相像的人会什么反应都没有吗？”

凌霄接过储物袋，检查了一遍才递给游小默。

Ling Xiao touched his nose. "Elder, I'll tell you the truth. Our friend is a member of the Mystic Tortoise Clan. He was being hunted down by others and asked us to find the Psychic Black Turtles. I'm afraid that his life would be in danger if we do not tell them of this as soon as possible."

Ling Xiao rubbed his nose. Without even looking at the sisters, ge shrugged his shoulders and said, "On this planet, there's bound to be people who are brain damaged. 凌霄收起手中的火球，“既然我夫人都说算了，那便算了。”

凌霄放下茶杯，示意他倒茶。

Ling Xiao did not have any objection, he was thinking the same too. They did not use this as they had no way of stalling You ZhenTian earlier. Now that You ZhenTian was currently being stalled by the ball of light, it was time.
凌霄无所谓地道：“既然你不想挖，那就走吧。”
Ling Xiao said indifferently, "If you don't want to dig it out, then let's just go."
凌霄早就认出他，只是一直没有反应而已，现在看到他，俊脸不由得露出一个诡异的笑容。
Ling Xiao had recognized him long ago, it was just that he did not have any reaction. Now when he saw him, Ling Xiao could not help revealing a strange smile on his handsome face.
凌霄早有准备，两缕火苗像火蛇一样自他手上窜出去，瞬间缠上黑衣人的剑，火蛇顺着剑迅速的朝黑衣人身体攀上去，为了自己的性命，他们不得不撤掉攻击。

Ling Xiao, however, was prepared. Two slivers of flame, like a snake, slithered out and wrapped around the man in black's swords. Climbing up the sword, they quickly reached towards the men's bodies. To protect themselves, the men in black couldn't help but retract their attack.
凌霄是一路找过来的，当然，一路上也没发现任何可疑的地方，可以确定，白虎的右眼不在这边，要么在峡谷的另一边，要么在峡谷下面。

Ling Xiao searched all the way over, and of course, he hadn't seen anything suspicious along the way. They could be certain that the white tiger's right eye was not here. It was either on the other side or below them.
凌霄显然也没有叙旧的意思，将他拦截下来后便直接出手了，几拳打得毫无防备的他吐血不止，加上两三个月前未痊愈的伤势，现在伤得更重了，就是神境强者都未能打赢他。

Ling Xiao obviously wasn't here to reminisce about the olden days. Once he intercepted him, he acted immediately, and within a few blows he caused the expert to spew blood endlessly, unable to defend himself. His injury, which still hadn't healed completely from two or three months ago, became even more serious. Even if he was a Divine Realm expert, he wouldn't be able to defeat him.

Ling Xiao was advancing even faster than him. Others are jealoused of him but he was even more jealoused of Ling Xiao, who doesn't have to cultivate to advance.

凌霄最后一句话说完，传音石的光芒就暗淡了下去。

凌霄本来想说不用，听到他的话突然一阵意动，“那就给我一枚。”
Ling Xiao had planned on rejecting, but a thought occurred to him as You XiaoMo was talking, "Then give me a pill."
凌霄果然被逗乐，猜中始作俑者却没有猜中过程，这么奇葩的问题也就只有他的夫人才说得出来。

凌霄欣慰的点点头，“我想我知道为什么你能继承赤血家族的传族之宝，而游震天这些人却继承不了的真正原因。”
Ling Xiao nodded gratefully. "I believe I know the real reason why you can inherit the Vermillion Blood Clan's Inheritance Jewel and why people like You ZhenTian cannot."
凌霄正在看游小默炼丹，突然发现血玉有了动静。
As Ling Xiao was watching You XiaoMo refine pills, he suddenly felt the movements of the Blood Jade.
凌霄正经八百的道：“你就当没有，有的话就是惊喜了。”

凌霄正经道：“而且跟你一样二，你不收他谁收？”

凌霄正色道：“古叔，我实在上次与你分别之后突破的。”

凌霄沉吟了半晌，“你把地图拿出来，试着将三种颜色的线连一连，看看有什么发现，水元素之心很可能藏在里面。”

Ling Xiao muttered to himself irresolutely for quite some while, "Take out the map and try to connect the three colored lines to see if you can find anything. The Water Elemental Essence is probably hidden inside there."
凌霄沉吟地说道：“知道太多对你没好处。”

凌霄沉吟的道：“理论上应该去参加，但是……”
Ling Xiao said in a low tone. "Theoretically we should, but..."
凌霄沉吟道：“先找个无人的地方再说。”

凌霄沉默了。
Ling Xiao fell silent.
凌霄没<t0/>想到他这么机灵，沉默了两秒才追过去。

凌霄没什么表示，嘴角一直挂着一抹似笑非笑，“不错，正是我们。”

凌霄没好气的敲敲他脑袋，“你这颗脑袋成天都在想什么，我有说要救她们吗？”

凌霄没有十分的把握能<t0/>从玄龟族哪里<t1/>得到一滴精血，如今玄威二人自动送上门来，有无人知道他们的行踪，岂有放过的道理。

Ling Xiao didn't have a hundred percent certainty that he could condense even a single drop of blood from a black turtle. Now that two had come willingly with no one knowing of their journey, there was no reason to show mercy.
凌霄没有反对。
Ling Xiao didn't oppose it.
凌霄没有反驳，反而听话的放他下来，然后顺手抹掉嘴角的血迹，为了控制住四股力量的平衡，他受了内伤。

Ling Xiao did not retort. Instead, he obediently let You XiaoMo down, then he wiped off the bloodstain at the corner of his mouth in passing. He had suffered an internal injury in order to control the equilibrium of the four forces.
凌霄没有回答他，目光却落在他的怀里。
Ling Xiao did not answer him, but his gaze fell onto his chest.
凌霄没有异议，“小心一点。”
Ling Xiao didn't object. "Be careful.'
凌霄没有意见，他对游小默的想法还是很了解的，错过这次机会，下次要想联系<t0/>上莫景就<t1/>不知道是什么时候了。

Ling Xiao did not have any objections. He understood You XiaoMo's way of thinking quite well. If they missed this opportunity, they did not know when the next opportunity to contact Mo Jing would come.
凌霄没有意见，他对游小默的想法还是很了解的，错过这次机会，下次要想联系上莫景就不知道是什么时候了。

Ling Xiao did not have any objections. He understood You XiaoMo's way of thinking quite well. If they missed this opportunity, they did not know when the next opportunity to contact Mo Jing would come.
凌霄没有理他，这是他第一次越阶斗圣境强者，压力确实有，但是更多的却是跃跃欲试的兴奋，他准备利用这次机会试一试四种血脉的威力，之所以跑到这里，就是不想让太多人看到。

Ling Xiao ignored him. This was his first time challenging a Sacred Realm expert. Although the pressure was indeed present, there was more of an eager happiness than anything else. He was prepared to use this chance to test the power of four different bloodlines. The reason he had run to this place was just because he didn't want too many people to witness it.
凌霄没有直接回答他的问题，反而问道：“你知道白虎为什么要常年沉眠于此吗？”
Ling Xiao didn't directly answer his question. Instead, he asked, "Do you know why the White Tiger hibernates for so many years?"
凌霄没有看他，扶着额头将玉简递给他，不忍直视的摸样，“你自己看看吧。”
Ling Xiao did not look at him. He passed the jade drive to You XiaoMo while supporting his head with a hand, as if he could not bear to look at him, "Take a look for yourself."
凌霄没有看到黑衣人消失的尸体，不过他能感觉到这里刚刚经历过一场大战，看了不远处的莫雪等人，便问：“发生什么事了？”
Ling Xiao didn't see the man in black's vanished corpse, but he could tell that a major fight had happened here. Looking at Mo Xue's group in the distance, he asked, "What happened?"
凌霄没有看姬凤，他朝门口看过去，平静地道：“还不快过来。”
Ling Xiao didn't look at Ji Feng. He looked towards the doorway instead and said calmly, "You still don't come here."
凌霄没有立刻接他的话，目光突然往门口的方向扫了一眼，正好撞上游小默那双贼溜溜的眼睛，后者几乎是下意识的缩回门后。

贼溜溜Ling Xiao didn't response immediately but instead his gaze suddenly sweeped over towards the door, concidently meeting You XiaoMo's prying eyes (贼溜溜). The latter instinictively retreated back behind the door.
凌霄没有说什么，倒是给他一个稍安勿躁的眼神。
Ling Xiao did not say anything. Instead, he gave him a look telling him to patiently wait (稍安勿躁).
凌霄没有采取防御，两种颜色的火焰在他拳头上跳动起来，当他的拳头碰撞在一起的时候，霎时涌起一道巨大的火浪，火浪像一把镰刀由上而下劈向游震天的拳头。

Ling Xiao didn't defend. Instead, two different-colored flames burst from his fist, and when their fists collided together, a huge wall of flame surged up immediately. The wall of flame swept up before slicing downwards towards You ZhenTian's fist like a scythe.
凌霄没理他，将两枚灵晶递给老头，“给我几串糖葫芦。”
Ling Xiao ignored him and handed two spirit gems to the old man. "Give me a few sticks of those candied fruits." (糖葫芦)
凌霄没说错，一开始他的确是猜的，但是在见过老人的反应后，他就已经确定老人不是一般的渔民，按他的猜测，老人很可能是通灵玄龟安排的探子。

Ling Xiao was right. It was truly a conjecture in the beginning, but after seeing the old man's reaction, he became sure that the old man was not just an ordinary fisherman. According to his guess, the old man was probably a scout sent by the Psychic Black Turtles.
凌霄淡定地说道：“就像你脱光脱衣服躺在我面前一样吸引我。”
