凌霄淡定地说道：“灵丹不一定全是救人治伤的丹药，总有些人会发明一些稀奇古怪的东西，尤其是春药之类的灵丹。”

Ling Xiao calmly replied, "Magic pills may not necessarily be a cure for people and their injuries. There are always some people who will invent some strange things, especially for magic pills like aphrodisiacs and such."
凌霄淡定的回道：“我在锻炼脸部的肌肉。”
Ling Xiao replied calmly, "I'm practicing my facial muscles."
凌霄淡定的说道：“制作空间符对空间之力的控制很严格，我还没试过，不知道能不能成功。”
Ling Xiao calmly said, "Creating teleportation talismans requires a lot of finesse with controlling spacial force. I haven't tried it yet, so I don't know if I can succeed or not."
凌霄淡淡的回道：“就叫小乌龟。”
Ling Xiao indifferently replied, "Just call it Little Tortoise."
凌霄淡淡的扫了夏音一眼，“称呼就不必了，圣女记得请夏玛部长严加管教他女儿，出言不逊，随意挑衅，没取她的性命已经是看在古玛部落的面子上，下次可就没这么好运了。”

Ling Xiao faintly swept a glance over Xia Yin,"An adress is not necessary. Holy maiden, remember to ask the Chief Mo Ma of the Guma Tribe to strictly discipline his daughters. 凌霄淡淡的眯了眯眼，他口中的主子怕是那个人，当初他便猜测黑蜘蛛会不会和那个人关系，因为黑蜘蛛的手段和行事作风太像那个人。

Ling Xiao narrowed his eyes indifferently. The 'Master' he was talking about was most likely that person. 凌霄淡淡的瞥了他一眼，“九玄铁是用来锁住什么人的？”

凌霄淡淡的瞥他一眼，突然哂笑道：“亲手杀死一名手下就是为了跟我说这两句废话吗？
Ling Xiao shot him an indifferent glance. He suddenly smiled. "Did you personally kill one of your subordinates just to speak nonsense with me?
凌霄淡淡的解释道：“通天大陆其实还有一种职业是酒师，他们酿造的灵酒有助于灵力的恢复，但是酒师这个职业并不热门，而且酒师多数是酒鬼，他们酿造的酒一部分买卖，剩下的多半会留着自己喝。”

Ling Xiao explained dryly, "There's actually another occupation in the TongTian Continent and that was sommeliers. 凌霄淡淡的说道：“依我看，最好是尽快将连心蛊炼化掉，如果这是游震天炼制的，上面很可能有他留下的印记，他现在或许因为太远而发现不了，但以后就不一定了。”

Ling Xiao calmly advised, "In my opinion, it is best to refine the Heart Linking Gu as soon as possible. If this was created by You ZhenTian, it is likely that he left an imprint on it. Maybe he can't find it now because he's too far away, but this will not necessarily be so in the future."
凌霄淡淡的说道：“拳头就是硬道理！”

Ling Xiao was now at three star Sacred Realm (圣境三星). When he stimulated the Dragon Clan’s bloodline, it directly caused his cultivation to jump from one star to three stars. Ling Xiao eyed him suspiciously, and then his eyes immediately moved to the spirit wine in his hands. The aroma of a transcendent level spirit wine had always been rich. He could already smell it inside the house when they had just been drinking outside.

凌霄的外公麟天表示玄龟族和傅苍穹不该参与别人的私人恩怨，否则没有强者的风范之类的。

Ling Xiao's grandfather Lin Tian announced that the Black Turtle Clan and Fu CangQiong shouldn't have gotten involved in someone else's personal grievances, or else they wouldn't have the demeanour of an expert.
凌霄的实力越高，对救出他父亲的几率就越高，这正是他最希望见到的，所以在他小时候，男人就不断的嘱咐他一定要不停的提升修为才能救出他的父亲。

The stronger Ling Xiao was, the higher the chance that he would rescue his father. This was exactly what he hoped to see, the man would endlessly tell him that he absolutely had to keep raising his cultivation level so that he could rescue his father.
凌霄的手从他身后伸过来并接住盒子，打开盖子，里面果然躺着一种通体莹白的蛊，不过拇指大小，像发胖的虫子，散发着森寒冰冷的气息。

From behind him, Ling Xiao’s hand stretched out. He accepted the box and opened the lid. There really was a glittering white Gu lying inside, looking just like a fat worm about the size of a thumb. It exuded an ice-cold air.
凌霄的火焰是特殊神火，拥有吞噬之力，只有亲自尝过才会知道这是多么痛苦的事情。
Ling Xiao's flames were a special type of Godfire, which had the power of devouring (吞噬之力). Only when one has experienced it personally can one know how painful it is.
凌霄的父亲后来被取消了继承的资格，但是凌霄体内既然有麒麟族的血脉，那就代表他也是有资格竞争的，尽管麒麟族并不承认他，但是只要谷主承认他有这个资格，就算其他人再怎么反对也无济于事。

The right to succession for Ling Xiao's father was revoked, but Ling Xiao was also qualified to compete in the succession since he had the bloodline of the Qilin Clan in his veins. Even if the Qilin Clan did not acknowledge him, it would be of no use no matter how the other members of the clan opposed as long as the Valley Master recognized his right.
凌霄的父亲在麒麟族的地位很高，深受麒麟族谷主的宠幸和期望，不过也正是因为这一点，所以在犯错后才会被终审囚禁于麒麟族之中。

Ling Xiao's father had a high status in the Qilin Clan and was greatly favored by the Qilin Clan's Valley Master who had high hopes for him. However, it was precisely because of this that they had ruled that he would be imprisoned within the Qilin Clan after making a mistake.
凌霄的父亲据说被关在麒麟族，麒麟族又是四灵之首，想从他们手中夺回他的父亲，除非凌霄成为七星强者或许还有可能吧。

Supposedly Ling Xiao's father was imprisioned by the Qilin Clan, and the Qilin Clan were the head of the Four Ancient Beast Clans. If they wanted to steal his father from their hands, Ling Xiao would have to be at least a seven star expert to stand a chance. (七星强者)
凌霄的空间随着他的修为暴涨而扩大，现在已经比游小默的空间大几十倍，辽阔无边。
Ling Xiao's dimension had expanded alongside his cultivation skyrocketing, and by now, it was already several dozen times bigger than You XiaoMo's dimension, vast and boundless.
凌霄的脚步突然停了下来。
The footsteps of Ling Xiao stopped suddenly.
凌霄的表情顿时变得很微妙。
Ling Xiao's expression instantly changed slightly.
凌霄的视线随意的瞥了一眼，目光落在走在中间的青年身上，一种眼熟的感觉划过心头，随即在一个记忆的犄角旮旯里找到对应此人的名字。

Ling Xiao causally glanced at them. His gaze fell onto the youth walking in the middle. A feeling that the youth was familiar-looking crossed his mind and he immediately found the name corresponding to the person in a corner of his memory.
凌霄的话还没说话，下方的黑雾突然剧烈的翻滚起来，下一秒，一道黑芒突然从黑雾里冲出来，化为一张鬼脸，一脸狰狞与贪婪，张牙舞爪扑向游小默。

Ling Xiao hadn't finished speaking when the black fog below suddenly began to violently churn. In the next second, a wave of black light suddenly rushed out from the black fog and dissolved into a demon's face. The face was savage and greedy, and it charged towards You XiaoMo threateningly.
凌霄的身影出现在那个方向，也不见他有什么动作，斗篷人的拳头在距离他只剩下三四米的时候突然错开了轨道，最近落在他左后方二十几米远的地方，海水瞬间爆开。

Ling Xiao's figure appeared in that direction, yet he did not make a single movement. The cloaked man's fist suddenly diverted from its path when it was only three or four meters away from him, before landing more than twenty meters behind his left, causing the seawater to burst apart in an instant.
凌霄的身影在斗篷人后退的时候瞬间消失，再出现时，人已经在他身后，尽管受了内伤，但是对他的速度却没有任何影响。

Ling Xiao's figure disappeared instantly when the cloaked man retreated. When he reappeared, he was already behind the cloaked man. Although Ling Xiao had internal injuries, it had no effect on his speed.
凌霄的速度太快，游小默好不容易看清楚了，乌梅镇已经看不见了，取而代之是一道愤怒的身影，一开始是一个小黑点，但是后面越来越接近；虽然仍然看不清楚是谁，但是他确定那个人一定是游震天，现在可以肯定他的便宜爹是安全的。

Ling Xiao was too fast, and You XiaoMo finally managed to see clearly. Ebony Plum Town was already no longer visible, replaced by a wrathful figure. At first it was just a small black dot, but then it started getting closer and closer; even though he still couldn't tell who it was, he was certain that that person was You ZhenTian. He could confirm for sure now that his clingy dad was safe.
凌霄皱了皱眉，玉简的主人大概不想让得到玉简的人轻易的看到里面的东西，所以才会设下如此复杂的禁制。
Ling Xiao frowned. The owner of the jade drive probably set up such a complicated seal because they did not want let the people who found it to see the things inside easily.
凌霄皱眉思索了一秒，旋即遗憾的说到：“说的也是，那么只好……不吃晚餐了，反正一餐不吃亦不会怎么样，你说是不是？”
Ling Xiao frwoned and thought for second before saying with lament, "That's true. I guess I have no choice... but to forgo dinner. It isn't like anything will happen if I miss a meal, no?"
凌霄目不转眼，“玄龟族离这儿太远，而且路上未必会很顺利。”
Ling Xiao did not even blink, "The Black Tortoise Clan is too far from here and the journey there may not necessarily go too smoothly."
凌霄目光深深的看了他一眼，说：“他的心愿已经完成了，过不了多久，他留在妖坟场那抹执念应该就会消失了。”
Ling Xiao looked at him deeply for a moment and said, "His wish has already been completed. In a little bit, the obsession keeping him in the Demon Beast Graveyard should disappear."
凌霄盯着他扭来扭去的腰。
Ling Xiao stared at his hips, which were shaking.
凌霄盯着装龙血的瓶子，皱着眉头就是不说话。
Ling Xiao silently stared at the bottle of dragon blood while frowning.
凌霄盯着这张万年不见的脸，心中不起一丝波澜。
Ling Xiao stared at this face, which he hadn't seen in many years, his heart calm.
凌霄直接将两枚塞给他，问：“问你个问题，乌山集镇哪里有卖灵草？”
Ling Xiao just stuffed the two spirit gems over (塞给他), and asked, "I'm just going to ask you a question, where do they sell magic herbs in the WuShan Town?"
凌霄直接将他拎起来就往外走，“不要妨碍他们办事，你要是真想看，等一下我让你亲身体验一把。”
Ling Xiao directly picked him up and walked out, "Don't hinder them from doing things. If you really want to see it, I'll let you personally experience it later."
凌霄直接扔给他两个字：“拍吧。”
Ling Xiao directly threw two words to him, "Bid ba."
凌霄直接放出紫色火焰与红色两种火焰融合在一起，又是变异神火，温度在原来的基础上骤然升高几万度，火焰瞬间将白虎的尸体包裹起来，在火焰的的炽烤下，尸体下面的玉床竟然固执的抵挡了一个时辰才融化。

Ling Xiao directly released purple and red flames before fusing the two together, this was another variation of the Godfire. The temperature suddenly rose by tens of thousands of degrees (温度在原来的基础上骤然升高几万度) as the flame instantly engulfed the body of the White Tiger. The jade bed beneath the body actually stubbornly withstood the heat of the flames (火焰的的炽烤下) for an hour before melting.
凌霄眉毛一扬“收服他们干什么？”游小默说：“帮手啊，你想想，我们的敌人是赤血家族，俗话说双拳难敌四手，多一个帮手就多一份助力，对我们也不是没有好处吧。”

Ling Xiao raised an eyebrow, "Why should I subdue them?" You XiaoMo replied, "For them to be helpers ah. Our enemy is the ChiXue Clan. As they say, it is difficult to resist four hands with two fists. One more helper is an additional assistance, it’s a good thing for us."
凌霄眉毛一挑，“你确定？”
Ling Xiao raised an eyebrow, "Are you sure?"
凌霄看了他一眼。
Ling Xiao glanced at him.
凌霄看了他一眼，“你刚刚表现出对空间符很大的兴趣，现在买了黑玉就不买空间符，不是在告诉别人你买的黑玉是准备制作空间符的吗？

Ling Xiao glanced at him. "You just showed a lot of interest in teleportation talismans, but now that you bought the black jade, you aren't buying any more teleportation talismans. Isn't this equal to telling everything that you're buying black jade to create teleportation talismans?
凌霄看了他一眼，接着在晶石板输入价格。
Ling Xiao looked at him and started to input the price in tablet.
凌霄看了他一眼，这吃货估计已经忘了计划的事情。
Ling Xiao glanced at him, this glutton (吃货) had probably forgotten about all their plans.
凌霄看了看自己的盘子，又看了看游小默的。
Ling Xiao stared at his plate then at You XiaoMo's.
凌霄看了眼游小默，后者立刻会意的把莫景交给他们的牌子拿出来，也不管老人看不看得懂就递给他，“这是灵龟族的东西，不知道您认不认识。”

Ling Xiao glanced at You XiaoMo. The latter immediately understood the glance. He took out the card (牌子) that Mo Jing gave to them and passed it to the old man, disregarding whether the old man could understand it or not, "This is something from the Mystic Tortoise Clan. I do not know if you recognize it or not."
凌霄看他这么纠结，便说：“不如我们来修炼吧。”
Seeing him so conflicted, Ling Xiao said, "How about we cultivate?"
凌霄看出他的疑惑，“妖兽们一直生活在水中或岛上，这种人类用的东西自然很少见到，会感兴趣也是正常的。”

Ling Xiao saw his doubts, "Demon beasts have always been living in the water or on an island. Naturally, they rarely see these kind of things that humans use, so it's normal that they will be interested in them."
凌霄看向柴天四人，微微一笑：“还差两个，只要再两个就行了，你们是要自己选，还是我来选？”
Ling Xiao looked at Chai Tian and the other three, his lips curling into a slight smile. “I still need two more, just two more. Are you going to choose between yourselves or should I choose for you?”
凌霄看着他的背影，嘴角露出一抹笑意，还真是睚眦必报啊！
Ling Xiao gazed after him as he left, a smile curling on his lips. How vindictive!
凌霄看着他落荒而逃的身影，勾了下嘴角，眼中的欲望一瞬间又消失了，似能收发自如一样。
Ling Xiao gazed at his fleeing figure and smirked. The desire in his eyes disappeared in an instant, as if he was able to freely receive and attack. (似能收发自如一样)
凌霄看着他被烧得红通通的脸颊，严肃地道：“实话。”
Ling Xiao looked at his face which had been roasted red by the heat of the flames and sternly demanded, "Speak the truth."
凌霄看着他隐忍的表情，失声笑了起来，重新将内丹送到他面前，“既然你都跪下来求我了，那我就勉为其难，把这枚内丹给你好了。”

Ling Xiao couldn't help but laugh as he tried to hold back his pain (隐忍的) and once again put the Life Crystal in front of him, "Since you even kneeled to beg me, then I'll very relunctantly (勉为其难) give you this Life Crystal."
凌霄看着前面几乎不超过一百个的坟墓，偏头问道：“哪一个？”
Ling Xiao looked at the graves in front of him, which couldn't have been more than a hundred of them, and he tilted his head to the side and asked, "Which one is it?"
凌霄眼中闪过一丝晦涩的暗芒，身形蓦然消失在原地。
Something unintellible flashed across Ling Xiao's eyes as his figure suddenly disappeared. (一丝晦涩的暗芒)
凌霄眼疾手快的捂住他的嘴巴，顺着他的视线看上去，顿时觉得他大惊小怪了。
With sharp eyes and agile hands, Ling Xiao covered his mouth, followed his line of sight, and immediately felt that he was making a fuss about nothing.
凌霄眼角上挑，眼中带着明显的嘲讽，就像他之前一样，同样轻蔑的眼神，或许斗篷人没想到他的处境会反过来。

The corner of Ling Xiao's eyes lifted, and there was obvious mockery in his eyes. Just like what had happened before, there was the same contemptuous look in his eyes. Perhaps the cloaked man did not think that his situation would be reversed.
凌霄眼角看到他一脸错愕的表情，表情却很淡定，仿佛没看懂他内心的想法一样。
Ling Xiao saw his stunned expression from the corner of his eyes, but his own expression was very calm and collected, as if he didn't understand what You XiaoMo was thinking.
凌霄睃了他一眼，那颗脑袋在想什么他不用掐指就知道了，“想当个酒师你确实有那个条件，这些灵酒据说都是用灵草酿造的，不过不是有灵草就能酿造，还需要配方。”

Ling Xiao glanced over and without thinking, he knew exactly what was going on in that head of his, "You do meet the requirements, if you want to be a sommelier. Supposedly, all of these wine were brewed from magic herbs, but thats not enough, you are going to need recipes too."
凌霄睇了他一眼，“不是还有吗？”
Ling Xiao cast a sidelong glance at him, "Don't you still have more?"
凌霄瞥了他一眼，“下次问这种问题的时候记得不要用嘴巴说，不然我会怀疑你是故意的。”
Ling Xiao shot him a glance, "Next time, when you ask this sort of question next time, remember not to use your mouth to say it. Otherwise, I will suspect that your actions are deliberate."
凌霄知道古叔在考验自己，笑着回道：“哦，发生了一点点事情，不过今天之内应该就能完成了，到时我会立刻出现在你面前的。”

Ling Xiao knew that Uncle Gu was testing him, and he laughed as he answered, "Oh, something very minor happened, but it should be finished by the end of today. After that I will instantly appear in front of you."
凌霄突然伸出手弹了他的脑门一下，“蠢货，你以为被邀请的人只有赤血家族？”
Ling Xiao suddenly reached out and flicked him in the head. "Idiot, do you think the ChiXue Clan will be the only ones invited?"
凌霄突然停下来，狐疑的看着他的脸，“你这么兴奋做什么？”
Ling Xiao suddenly stopped and suspiciously eyed his face, "What are you so excited about?"
凌霄突然冷下脸，“阁下这话是什么意思？”
Ling Xiao's expression suddenly chilled, "What does Your Excellency (阁下) mean by saying this?"
凌霄突然咳了一声，一副病态的样子。
Ling Xiao suddenly gave a cough, pretending to be ill.
凌霄突然固定住他的腰，喝道：“别动！”
Ling Xiao suddenly grabbed hold of his waist as he ordered, "Don't move!""
凌霄突然将他拉到怀里。
Ling Xiao suddenly pulled him into his arms.
凌霄突然就失去了耐心，瞥向姬芮的目光充满了恶劣的杀意。
Suddenly, Ling Xiao lost his paitence and his looked at Ji Rui with scurvy killing intent. (恶劣的杀意)
凌霄突然抬起头，嘴角勾着一抹坏笑，“慢吞吞的，我还以为你准备把水从我头顶淋下来。”
Ling Xiao suddenly raised his head and a smirk graced his lips, "You were being so slow that I thought you were going to pour water onto my head."
凌霄突然挡在他前面，那种感觉霎时消失了。
Ling Xiao suddenly stepped in front of him and the feeling disappeared.
凌霄突然握紧他的手，低声道：“不着急。”
Ling Xiao suddenly grabbed his hand, saying in a low tone, "Don't panic."
凌霄突然皱了下眉，犹豫了一瞬间便冲到男子面前，随手弹出两缕火焰将锁链干脆的烧断了。
Ling Xiao suddenly frowned, hesitating for a moment before charging in front of the man and flicking two embers at the chains, melting them.
凌霄突然皱起眉，抬头朝游小默看了过去，眼神很微妙。
Ling Xiao frowned abruptly and raised his head to give You XiaoMo a strange look.
凌霄突然笑了起来，“啊，那就太可惜了，本来还想称赞你一下。”
Ling Xiao suddenly laughed, "Oh, that's too bad. I wanted to give you a compliment."
凌霄突然说：“答应他。”
Ling Xiao suddenly said, "Do it."
凌霄突然露出一抹意味深长的浅笑。
Ling Xiao suddenly revealed thin smile, heavy with meaning.
凌霄立刻带着游小默迅速的往后退，游小默抓着凌霄的手臂，整个人的重量都靠在他身上。
Ling Xiao instantly retreated backwards quickly with You XiaoMo. You XiaoMo grabbed Ling Xiao's arm, and the entire weight of his body was resting on Ling Xiao.
凌霄立刻知道他在想什么了，笑骂道：“蠢货，这点胆量都没有。”不过他还是帮忙看了一下。
Ling Xiao immediately knew what he was thinking about and he derided and taunted, "You dunce, you don't even have this much guts." However, he still helped You XiaoMo take a look.
凌霄立刻移开手，让他扑了个空：“但是你前不久才升级，现在又用不了这枚内丹，给了你也没用。”
Instantly, Ling Xiao pulled his hand away + (扑了个空), "You just leveled up recently, so you can't even use this Life Crystal right now. There is no point in giving it to you."
凌霄立刻走过来，“怎么了？”
Ling Xiao instantly walked over. "What's wrong?"
凌霄站在洞口看着这一幕，终于看不下去，主动走过去说要帮他的忙，结果却反被游小默给推开。

Ling Xiao stood at the entrance of the cave and watched this scene. Finally, he could not bear to watch it anymore and took the initiative to walk over to say that he wanted to help, but he was pushed away by You XiaoMo.
凌霄端着茶杯喝了口茶，淡淡的说道：“不能！”
Ling Xiao picked up his cup of tea and took a sip before saying blandly, "You can't!"
凌霄笑<t0/>了起来。
Ling Xiao started laughing.
凌霄笑呵呵地道：“日后？
Ling Xiao chuckled. "In the days to come?

Ling Xiao was laughing so much that his shoulder wouldn't stop shaking.
凌霄笑得肩膀直抖。

凌霄笑得肩膀直抽。
Ling Xiao laughed till his shoulders were shaking (笑得肩膀直抽).
凌霄简单的说了下。
Ling Xiao gave a basic explanation.

As Ling Xiao finally walked towards him, You XiaoMo edged backwards, all the way until he hit a wall and was unable to retreat any further.
凌霄终于笑出了声，“这不是挺好的吗？
Finally, Ling Xiao laughed out lour, "It turned out well, didn't it? His ability is pretty nice and..."
凌霄给他一个赞赏的眼神。
Ling Xiao shot him an admiring look.
凌霄给他们的任务是，若是找到花姑和她的小弟就把他们交给天刀，花姑心思缜密是个好苗子，她的小弟则是好帮手，训练他们的最直接的办法就是让她跟着天刀学习，将来若有用得着他们的地方就可以直接用了，所以这个任务也叫做便宜训练法，又名能者多劳。

The task that Ling Xiao gave them was that if they found Hua Gu and her little brothers, they should hand them over to Tian Dao. Hua Gu was a good child (苗子), careful and considerate, and her little brothers were good assistants. The most direct method of training them would be to let them follow Tian Dao and learn from him, so if there was ever a time he needed them in the future, he could just use them right away. So this task was also called the 'Advantageous Training Method' (便宜训练法), or in other words, the more fit one is, the more they should do.
凌霄继续往前走，一边漫不经心的说道：“急什么，买灵草的铺子是少，但不可能一个都没有，乌山集镇既然是古玛部落的大本营，这里一定有卖灵草的地方。”

Ling Xiao continued walking and said, unconcerned, "What's the hurry? Sure there was only a few of those shops, but they can't not have one. After all, the WuShan Town was the headquarters of the Guma Tribe, they must have a place that sells magic herbs."
凌霄耻笑道：“之前我跟你说的时候你还否定了我的提议，怎么现在突然改变注意了，你不是说你已经让别人帮你找灵草了吗？”
Ling Xiao sneered, "When I suggested it to you earlier, who was the one who rejected my proposal and now you changed your mind? Didn't you say you already had someone help you find the magic herbs?"
凌霄脸上灭有一丝意外，反而露出一抹古怪的笑意，“外面应该也在传我的事情吧？”
There wasn't a trace of surprise on Ling Xiao's face. Rather, he revealed a strange smile. "They should be spreading information about me outside as well, right?"
凌霄脸上露出一个奇异的笑容，脚尖使力便朝他迅速的冲了过去，一身强悍的气息倒是丁点不泄露，顷刻间便冲到游双面前，后者震惊的脸瞬时放大，由于估算错误，他根本来不及躲避，一只闪烁的紫光与红色火焰的拳头便狠狠地砸到他脆弱的腹部上……

A strange smile appeared on Ling Xiao's face and, pushing off with the balls of his feet, he charged forwards and quickly arrived in front of You Shuang, not letting even a sliver of his overwhelmingly powerful presence leak. The other's shocked face was immediately magnified. Due to his miscalculation, he didn't have time to dodge at all. A fist, flashing with purple and red flames impacted with his fragile abdomen harshly...
凌霄脸上露出一抹冷笑。

凌霄自信地说道：“在客栈的时候，虽然她隐藏得很好，但是我看得出来她对莫雪姐妹早有杀意。
Ling Xiao said confidently, "In the inn, though she hid it well, I could clearly see that she had been wanting to kill them for a long time.
凌霄虽然同意<t0/>让花姑三人<t1/>追随，但是并未让他们跟在身侧，而是让他们去邪教，名字就是叫邪教，正是他父亲的手下创建的势力。

Though Ling Xiao had agreed to let Hua Gu and co follow them, he didn't mean for them to travel together, but for the three to go to The Evil Cult. The Evil Cult's name was The Evil Cult, the group that his father had left to him.
凌霄补充道：“不过游震天是个多疑的人，近日不做些奇怪的举动，等他回赤血城就没事了。”
Ling Xiao supplemented, "However, You ZhenTian is a suspicious person. We can't do anything out too attention grabbing while he's still here. It'll be fine once he goes back to ChiXue City."
凌霄表情似笑非笑，“你该不会忘了，我们这趟过来可不是为了找帮手，而是找古叔问父亲身上龙族血脉的事情。”

Ling Xiao gave a smile that was yet not a smile, "You couldn't have forgotten that we made this trip not to find helpers, but to look for Uncle Gu to ask about the Dragon Clan bloodline from my father?"
凌霄表情凝重起来，他在万年前就听说过游震天这个人，他有一成名绝招正是和猛虎有关，据说拥有吞天灭地的能力，很多强者就是败在这招之下。

Ling Xiao's expression became focused. He had heard of You ZhenTian ten thousand years ago, and he had a famous unique skill which just happened to be related to the ferocious tiger. Rumor had it that it had the ability to swallow the heavens and destory the earth, and many experts had lost before it.
凌霄表情很严肃，用火焰将它包裹起来后，在众人看不到的地方，他又往火焰加了一缕真龙之息。
Ling Xiao's expression was serious. After he used the flames to wrap it up, when no one was looking, he added a sliver of The Breathe of the True Dragon (真龙之息).
凌霄表情有些古怪，顿了下才说：“下次她要是再找你，不要管她。”
Ling Xiao’s expression contorted into something a little odd, and he hesitated before saying, “Next time she tries to talk to you, ignore her.”
凌霄被他撞得往后退了一步，被他感染了喜悦，不过嘴上却说：“我有眼睛看，你不用一直强调。”
Ling Xiao was knocked back a step by him and was infected with his joy too but the words that came out was, "I can see with my eyes, you don't have to tell me twice."
凌霄见他一脸失落，严重闪过一道光芒。
Seeing his disappointed expression, Ling Xiao's eyes flashed.

Four brutes swarmed inside, blocking the exit.
四个黑袍人藏身在几百米外，他们已经确定炼丹之人就在洞府。
The four people in black hid themselves several meters away. They were already certain that the person refining pills was inside the Immortal’s Cave.
四个黑袍人身体一僵，他们用0.1秒的时间反应，还真像是被惊乍到的老鼠，四人一下子窜出百米远，分四个方位站定，而背后正是洞府，不过他们顾不了那么多，竟然能无声无息的靠近他们，这个突然出现的人实力毋庸置疑，很强！

The four people's bodies froze, and they reacted in 0.1 seconds, really just as if they were startled mice. They fled a hundred meters away, splitting in four different directions. The Immortal’s Cave was right behind them, but they couldn't care less about it anymore. The person who had suddenly appeared was undoubtedly very powerful, if he could just soundlessly get close to them!
四人中只有姬云琅连一丝反抗之力都没有就被火焰缠得死死的。
Among the four of them, there was only Ji YunLang who had no ability to resist at all and was burned to death by the flames.
四人将两名外来者身上的钱财都搜刮出来，只有两个储物袋。
The four striped them of all their riches and there were only two magic bags.
四人恍然大悟的点点头。
The four nodded in wide-eyed realization.
四人神色一凛，姬芮很快反应过来，右手瞬间出现一枚空间符，这是一枚中等空间符，除了距离比低等空间符长，传送的人数也比较多，最重要的是安全性与稳定性也比较高。

The four people's expressions froze before Ji Rui quickly reacted. A teleportation talisman appeared instantly in her right hand. This was a medium grade teleportation talisman, and not only was the distance longer than a low grade teleportation talisman, it could also transport more people. The most important part was that it was fairly safe and stable.
四人立刻分头行动，好来客栈就是传说中的黑店。
The four split up and got to work. The HaoLai Inn was one of those 'shady' shops.
四人警惕的看了看四周，发现对方只有一人，目光落在他身上。
The four of them looked warily in all directions, but they discovered that their opponent was only one person, and their gazes landed on his body.
四人蹑手蹑脚的靠近目标的房间，掌柜修为最高，发现里面什么动静都没有，假意敲门询问了一声，还是没有人回应，立刻猜到他们铁定是中招了。

The four crept towards their target's room. The owner had the highest cultivation base and sensed no movement from the room. She knocked on the door, and there was no answer. They must've fallen for it.
四人迅速的动身了。
The four of them quickly moved.
四周到处都是郁郁葱葱的茂密树木，刚好将山峰覆盖得严严实实，因此就算有人从上空飞过，也未必看到他们。
They were surrounded by a dense canopy and undergrowth of greenery, so even if someone flew overhead, they probably wouldn't see them.
四灵生来便有突破圣境的资质，所有能与四灵订立本命契约，方迟尧这个的气运一定很强大，当然，气运这种飘渺的东西是不会一直跟着一个人，时间慢慢的流逝，距离宴会开始的时间已经所剩不多，上来的人也越来越少，不过一直没看到赤血家族的人。

The Four Divine Emperor Beasts had the aptitude to break through the Sacred Realm from birth. All who could contract with the Four Divine Emperor Beasts, Fang ChiYao's fate/destiny was very strong. Of course, these sort of ethereal thing like fate will not follow one person forever. As time slowly flowed by, there was not much time left before the banquet started. There were fewer and fewer people arriving, however there had been no trace of the people from the Vermillion Blood Clan.
四道能量正是代表着四灵，每一只帝王兽的血脉都是相互排斥的，他们的能量永远不可能融合在一起，除非强制性，但是同样会带来不小的伤害。

The four energies represented the Four Ancient Beast Clans. The bloodline of every Emperor Beast was mutually repulsed each other (相互排斥). Their energies can never be fused together unless through force, but doing this can bring about great harm.
四长老一脉世代都是辅助妖凰族族长的人，若是得族长的信任，几乎相当于在妖凰族拥有不凡的地位，但是轮到姬凤这一代，四长老一脉却一直处于被压制的状态，所以他们需要一个机会，姬宁禹的出现正是他们的机遇。

Generations of the fourth elder's bloodline were all people who supported the Demon Phoenix Clan's clan head. If they earned the clan head's trust, it was the same as earning an uncommon position in the Demon Phoenix Clan. But by the time it was Ji Feng's generation, the fourth elder's bloodline had continously been repressed, so they needed an opportunity. Ji NingYu's appearance just happened to be their opportunity.
回到住处，青年拿起茶桌上的杯子和茶壶摔了一地，有的碎片甚至飞出去，一屋子狼藉却仍然无法消弭他心中的怒气。

When he returned to his residence, the youth picked up the cup and teapot on the table before smashing it on the ground. Some of the broken pieces even flew outside, but even though the entire room was in chaos, it was still unable to put an end to the anger in his heart.
回到小屋，游小默让吞金兽和乒乓球去外面看着，然后拿出一枚灵丹服下，开始像平常一样修炼。
Once he turned to the cabin, You XiaoMo told the Metal Swallowing Beast and Ping Pang to take at look outside. After that, he took a metal swallowing beast and started his daily cultivation.
回到小木屋，凌霄还在里面调养没出来。
Once he returned to the small wood cabin, Ling Xiao was still inside recuperating.
回到房里，游小默终于想起掌柜反常的行为，集九镇压的人对外来者那么木刻，竟然会免费送宵夜给外来者？

Once he was back in his room, You XiaoMo finally realized the abnormality in the shopkeeper's actions. The people of the JiJiu Town were very excluding of outsiders, why would one suddenly give him free snacks?
回到房间，夏音遣走牛徐阳并让他顺便把她的女侍叫过来，过了会，女侍便推门走了进来。
Returning to the room, Xia Yin sent Niu XuYang away and asked him to call her attendants over. After a while, the attendants pushed the door and walked in.
回到正题，从他们的对话之中，他们的师傅应该就是让颜辉去逍遥院监视他们的幕后人，可是对方是什么身份却不得而知，但是有一点很明显，对方可能对他们比较了解，这样敌人在暗他们在明，对他们不利，所以还是得确认他们师傅的身份。

Back to the main point. From their dialog, their Shifu had probably let Yan Hui go to XiaoYao Institution to monitor their behind-the-scenes movements. However, they still did not know the identity of the other side, but it was obvious that the other probably understood them. This type of situation where the enemy was hidden in the shadows while they were in the light was disadvantageous to them. Therefore, they had to verify the identity of his Shifu.
回到逍遥院后，游小默第一件事就是跑去申请注销自己的名字，因为不确定会在南陆待多久，所以为避免意外就干脆一不做二不休，不过遇到了点阻碍。

After returning to XiaoYao Academy, the first thing that You XiaoMo did was to apply to remove his name from the challenges. He wasn't sure how long they'd be at the Southern Continent, so to avoid any accidents, he decided to be direct. However, they met some obstacles.
回到酒楼，天已经快亮了。
It was almost dawn after they returned to the hotel.
回应他的却是更猛烈的动作。
The reply was an even faster movement.
回应他的是凌霄的嘲笑，“你以为人人都跟你一样晚上睡觉还要盖被子，又不是弱不禁风的人类，这床也不是准备来睡觉的。”

Ling Xiao responded to him in ridicule, "Do you think everyone needs to be covered by a quilt to sleep at night like you do? It's not like those abroad are extremely delicate humans and this bed is not for sleeping."
回应他的是天恨从椅子上狼狈的摔下去，发出好大的声响，<t0/>除了天刀和<t1/>天修紧绷的表情，其他人都是一脸被雷劈到的摸样，难以置信的瞪着游小默。

What replied to him was Tian Hen falling off his chair in a most ugly fashion, creating a huge noise. Apart from Tian Xiu and Tian Dao's tense looks, everyone else looked like they had been struck by thunder, looking at You XiaoMo in utter disbelief.
回应黑熊的是一道犀利的罡风，直逼向他的脑门，如若被击中，整个脑袋能像西瓜一样爆开。
The reply Hei Xiong got was a piercing wind blade(罡风), aimed directly at his head. If he got hit, his whole head would have exploded like a watermelon.
回房后，游小默让乒乓自己去玩，又把小乌龟从衣服里掏出来，让他感到满意的是，小乌龟全程都很安静。

Once back in his room, You XiaoMo told Ping Pang to play by themselves and pulled the baby turtle out from his shirt. What was to his satisfaction was that the whole time the baby turtle had stayed very quiet.
因为<t0/>盗云那<t1/>句游小哈，整个拍卖场就超过半数的人都在看他们，毕竟<t2/>师传闻中的<t3/>主角，有很少出现在公共场合里，所以他们这次一定要目睹一下两人的真容。

Because Dao Yun had yelled You XiaoHa, over half of the people in the auction house were looking at them. After all, the main character of all those rumors very rarely appeared in public. They had to take this chance to get a good look at the two and their true appearances.
因为上面有吞金兽和金翅虫守着，所以它不敢有太大的动静，每次总是一点一点的吸收湖中的灵水，智商简直可以和狡猾的人类一比。

Since the Metal Swallowing Beast and Golden Winged Insects were guarding from above, it didn't dare to move too much. It only sucked in a tiny bit of the spiritual water in the lake each time, and its IQ could even be compared to a cunning human.
因为不论是人类还是妖兽，只要吸收了贪狼的内丹，他们身上会永远带着贪狼的气息，直到下一只贪狼出世为止。
No matter human or demon beast, if they absorbed the Life Crystal of the Wolf of Gluttony, they would gain the aura of the Wolf of Gluttony until the next Wolf of Gluttony was born.
因为人形的实力不如本体，他能感觉得出，游小默的实力尚在他之上，所以只能用本体耗死他。

That was because his human form wasn't as strong as his original form. He could tell that You XiaoMo was stronger than him, thus his only option was to use his original form and win by stamina. (本体耗死他)
因为从这些人身上他感觉得出他们并不全是强者。
Because many of these people weren't all that powerful.
因为他<t0/>补确定灵<t1/>草堂会不会同意用灵丹换，就像黑蜘蛛，他们<t2/>补喜欢<t3/>以物易物，偏偏就喜欢灵晶，然后他们<t4/>才前往<t5/>灵草堂。

He did this because he wasn't sure if the Magic Herb Shop would be willing to take magic pills as payment. They might be like the Black Spider, refusing to trade goods and only accepting spirit gems. Afterwards, he headed to the Magic Herb Shop.
因为他仇恨的对象不仅杀了自己，而且还觉得他做了件好事，甚至觉得自己应该感谢他的好心之举。
His hated person not only killed him, and even thought that he was doing a good deed. Just to rub salt onto his wounds, You XiaoMo even thought that Jiang Liu should be grateful for his kind act.
因为他们一直都是独来独往，加上与赤血家族结仇，身份已经明了，所以没人觉得他们很富有，顶多就是一笔一亿灵晶左右的资产吧。

Since they were always alone, their identity has been found out and combined with their grudge against the Vermillion Blood Clan, no expected them to be rich. At most they had around a hundred million, probably.
因为他们带着面具，黑衣人大概不知道他们是谁，所以连脸也没蒙就出现救走了苏郎，虽然只有一瞬间，但他相信自己没有看错。

They were wearing masks, so the man in black probably didn't know who they were. That was probably why he didn't cover up his identity when he took away Su Lang. Even though it was for a split second, You XiaoMo knew he saw it correctly.
因为他们有特殊的消息来源，知道黑蜘蛛拍卖的东西都有哪些，搂住看中其中一件东西，现在和他爹正在想办法凑灵晶。

From their special information source, they knew what items was going to be autioned and their head (楼主) wanted one of those things, so now he and his dad was trying to gather enough spirit gems for it.
因为他发现地图上的线连接起来竟然也是一只白虎，不同的是，三条线最后都汇聚到白虎的心脏部位，而地图上显示白虎的心脏部位是在宫殿的正中央。

This was because he found when the lines on the map were connected, it formed a white tiger. However, the difference was that the three lines eventually converged at the position of the heart of the white tiger and the map showed that the heart of the white tiger was in the center of the palace.
因为他得到的资料上说凌霄是在不久前进阶圣境强者的，他的潜力再怎么厉害也不可能在短短一年内就晋级四星。

This was because the information he got said that Ling Xiao had advanced to a Sacred Realm expert not long ago. No matter how high his potential was, he could not have advanced by four stars in just one year.
因为他总是出现一段时间就消失一段时间，导致一些人不知道怎么判断他的实力。
Since he always disappeared from the limelight after doing anything big, no one was sure of how to judge his abilities.
因为他认识一个人，他比苏朗更早成为彩级一品丹师，听说他现在已经是二品了。
Because he knew someone who had become a Grade One Rainbow Level mage before Su Lang. He heard that he was already Grade Two now.
因为以往每发现一个荒蛮位面，过程都是腥风血雨。
It had always been the case that with the discovery of a (荒蛮位面) bloodshed ensued.
因为傅苍穹叮嘱过叶农要他亲自将东西交到他手里。
Because Fu CangQiong had warned Ye Nong over and over that he was to personally hand the item over to him.
因为光团里面有四股能量在冲撞，所以行进速度比较缓慢，距离之剩下三分之一。
It traveled slowly as there were four different energies colliding with each other in the light ball. There was only a third of the distance between it and the tiger.
因为凌霄不喜欢吃别人炼制的灵丹，所以游小默对从别人那里搜刮来的灵丹向来不是很重视，至于功法技法他也不是很需要，将等级高的挑出来，剩下的就被他扔到角落里了。

Since Ling Xiao didn't like to eat pills refined by other people, You XiaoMo never paid much attention to magic pills they scavenged. Other than that, soul/skill training manuals weren't all that useful either, so he picked out the higher leveled ones and left the others in the corner.
因为在听到他们的对话，水妖顿时怒了。
Thus, when it heard their conversation, the Water Demon was furious.
因为太过震惊，玄泽没发现他的速度慢下来反而给游小默制造了机会。
Xuan Ze was so distrubed that he hadn't realized that by slowing down, he was creating an opening for You XiaoMo.
因为如果不让他们知道都有些什么宝贝，这些大势力等于没有动力去筹灵晶，届时拍卖品的价格下降，损失的反而是黑蜘蛛。

Because if they didn't let them know what treasures they had, it would mean that these major powers wouldn't have a motive to prepare spirit gems. When the time came to auction off the items, the prices would drop, and the one to lose would be Black Spider.
因为如果李管事无意将心灵花草卖给他们，最后一句根本没必要告诉他，现在说了，是不是表示他还有机会？
Because if Manager Li had no intention of selling them the Heart Flower Herb, there would be no need to tell them that last sentence. Since he said it, did that mean he still had a chance?
因为守卫都是固定在每层楼的，所以他们<t0/>擅<t1/>离岗位也是有风险的，好在，这里的守卫都是各管各的，而且身上的铠甲也将脸遮了大半。

Because the guards were stationed in a set place on each floor, it was risky for them to leave their positions. It was good that the guards here didn't really butt into each other's business, and the armor they wore covered over half their face.
因为宫殿是<t1/>被结界托着<t2/>悬浮在水里的，所以结界<t3/>一<t4/>晃动，宫殿就跟着剧烈的晃动起来。
Since the palace was held, floating in the water, by the barrier, when the barrier shook, so did the entire palace with it.
因为封城一事，自然城的人怨气颇重，特别是那些急着出城的人都被困在城内，他们有怨气，首当其中便是下达封城的黑熊。

Because the city had been closed, the citizens were all rather irritated, especially those who had pressing business outside the city walls. The primary target of their irritation was Hei Xiong, who had given the order.
因为就算是以物易物，也要先用灵晶衡量一下。
SInce, even in a bartering system, you would still weight the exchange by spirit gems.
因为很多嗜酒的酒鬼之所以喜好灵酒，一半原因是因为灵酒恢复灵力的效果，另一半则是冲着灵酒的滋味。
The reason why many chronic drunkards (嗜酒的酒鬼) preferred spirit wine was partly because of the effect of restoring spiritual power, and partly because they found the taste of spirit wine irresistible.
因为早有登记，所以他们不需要邀请卡就能参加这场拍卖会，不过多数人都是来看热闹的，当然，能成为黑蜘蛛固定的客户，说明他们的本事也不小。

Since they had been registered before, they didn't need invitations to attend. However, most people were just there to watch. Of course, if they could become one of the Black Spider's regulars, then they must be talented.
因为有些顶级灵草生来就拥有自我保护手段，比方说骷髅花草这种生长在特别地方的灵草便要慎重。

This was because some transcendent level magic herbs naturally had defenses to protect themselves with. For example, one should be even more cautious with magic herbs like the Skull Flower Herb (骷髅花草) which grew in special places.
因为有杂色的金翅虫的能力是有限制的，比如它们产下的金丝不再像传说中无坚不摧，而且还有使用年限，也就是时候不知何时它就会失去它原有的功效。

This was because those tainted with other colors had a limit to their power. For example, their golden threat wasn't unbreakable like in the the legends, and had an expiration date, so you had no way of knowing when it would stop working.
因为有空间符，所以他们赶路的时间缩短了很多，去西境到回来整个过程只不过花了一个半月而已，比游小默想象中的还要快。

Because they had the teleportation talisman, the time they had to spend on the road was shortened by quite a bit. The entire journey to and from Xi Jing had only taken half a month, and it was even faster than what You XiaoMo had imagined.
因为李管事为了灵草堂赚了将近两千万灵晶，所以上面决定奖励他一百万灵晶，这个数目就是张管事干一年都未必能赚到，补嫉妒是补可能的，眼下李管事自己找上门来，他正好也有事情要质问他。

Since Manager Li earned almost twenty million spirit gems for the Magic Herb Shop, so the higher ups decided to reward him with a million spirit gems. This was an amount that Manager Zhang couldn't even earn by working an entire year, so it was impossible for him not to be jealous. Seeing that Manager Li himself came to find him, he just happened to also have something to ask him.
因为楼层越高，人数就越少，三十层楼的人架起来还没有第十层楼的多。
This was because, the higher it got, the fewer the people on the level. The total number of people on level ten were lesser than the total number of people on the thirtieth level.
因为每三个月才有一次比赛，所以积分对很多人是至关重要的，否则，花完就要重新等上三个月，意味着白白浪费了三个月，所以如无必要，没人愿意没事消费积分。

Since the challenges only occurred once every three months, points were very valuable to most people, otherwise, you'll have to wait three months if you spent it all. That meant three months would be wasted, so unless it was absolutely necessary, no one would be willing to use up points.
因为每个势力在进入桃源遗迹后便分开走，所以是理解参差不齐，五个势力之中就属赤血家族总体实力最差，难怪黑蜘蛛不愿平分。

Since each major power had split off into separate paths after entering Peach Blossom Ruins (桃源遗迹), it was understandable that the attendance was uneven. Among the five major powers, only the Vermillion Blood Clan's total strength was the weakest, so it was no wonder that the Black Spider was unwilling to split it evenly.
因为每天乘坐空间传送阵的人实在太多，立即报名后，一般需要等两个时辰左右才能轮到。
One would usually need to wait for around two hours for their turn after registering immediately as there were too many people taking the dimensional transport circle everyday.
因为游小默只需要顶级灵草，所以他直接前往灵山山顶，虽然晚了两个月，但是山顶的洞府都不是一般洞府，两个月要全部破解是不可能的。

As You XiaoMo only needed transcendent level magic herbs, he directly headed to the top of the Spirit Mountain. Although he was two months late, the Immortal’s Caves at the top of the Spirit Mountain were not ordinary Immortal’s Caves. It was impossible to break into (破解) all of them in just two months.
因为知道游小默是九十层的院生的人很少，在判断不出某个院生是哪一楼层时，导师和长老们一般是不会漫天开价的。

This was because very few knew that You XiaoMo was a student on the ninetieth floor. If the teachers and elders could not determine which student was from what floor, they would not normally ask for an exorbitant price.
因为要求太高，导致总是没有院生去他的铺子，所以有一些长老总喜欢那这事调侃他。
Since he had too high requirements, no students ever visited his stand and some of the elders liked to taunt him.
因为距离太远，传音石起不了作用，所以只能派他自己亲自过来把消息告诉老家主，他的愤怒是可以预料的，谁会想到自己走后，大庄园后脚就遭到了偷袭，不仅禁地失守，被逃走了半数的犯人，连游安泰都死了。

Because of the distance, they couldn't use transmission stones, so he could only come personally to inform the old Family Head. His anger was understandable. Who would've thought that the estate would be attacked right after he left and, not only did the guards fail to defend it, half of the prisoners had escaped and You AnTai had been killed.
因为过于恐怖，所以很少有妖兽敢踏足炼狱，而鬼哭涯就在炼狱的深处，因此就算有人知道那个神秘势力就在鬼哭涯里，也很少有人敢亲自进去探听真相。

Not many demon beasts dared to tread into Purgatory because it was too terrifying. In addition the Weeping Ghost Shore was located at the depths of Purgatory. Thus, even if people knew that the mysterious fraction was at the Weeping Ghost Shore, few dared to venture inside to inquire about the truth.
因为这不仅仅只是一个能让人陷入的幻觉的阵法，风变成了利刃，地上的情操也变成了夺人命的东西，到处都是杀机，除非找到阵眼，否则会被活活耗尽灵力而死。

It wasn't just an array that creates illusion, the wind became razors, the grass became lethal, it was a death trap everywhere. Unless they found the core (阵眼) and destroyed it, they were going to die of spiritual energy depletion.
因为黑袍人是黑蜘蛛五人中实力最强的，既然洞府的宝贝被他们收刮了，那些宝贝十之八九在黑袍人的储物袋里。

Because the person in black was the strongest among the five people from the Black Spider, and since the Black Spider was the one who had taken most of the treasures from the cave dwelling, the majority of those treasures were in the black-robed person's magic bags.
因此有可能坐落于山脚下，半山腰等地，外观可能华丽耀眼至极，也可能毫不起眼，这种情况便也讲究机缘二字，当然，有时机缘也可能是死门。

Thus, they could be at the foot of the mountain, in the middle, they could have a lavish exterior or a plain one. It was all dependent on luck (机缘) or if it's meant to be or not, and of course, that sometimes meant death.
因此，万厨师的厨艺顶多就限于寻常人家饭桌上能看到的几道家常菜，像昨天的酸辣鸡丁之类的，别说吃过，他连见都没见过。

Thus, Chef Wan's cooking skill was at most what you would see on the tables of a normal household. As for the Spicy Sour Chicken(酸辣鸡丁) they ate yesterday, he hadn't even heard of it before, much less tasted it.
因此，大部分人总会不自觉的泛起一股寒意。
Thus, most people would feel a chill descend over them.
因游小默要在这里炼丹，凌霄不想让任何人打扰到他，所以让黄鼠兽守在外面。
Since You XiaoMo was refining pills here, Ling Xiao didn't want anyone to interrupt him and thus had the Weasel Beast stand guard.
因距离有点远，所以这边只能听到一个轻微的雷声。
As they were a little far off, so there was only a faint rumble of thunder.
围观的人窃窃私语，无一不是在抱怨，毕竟宝藏就在前面，如果能进去，他们说不定也能得到一段机缘，这些人把入口堵住了，简直就是丧心病狂，凭什么不让他们进。

The Heart Fortification Pill was a second grade rainbow pill, primarily focused on reducing the negative effects of a cultivation base that grew too quickly. A full-powered attack of a Sacred Realm expert was not to be underestimated. The cloaked man quickly increased the distance between them. The qi and blood in his body churned and he could not help but spit out a mouthful of blood, the blood spread out in a halo in the sea. (血在海里晕开了)

The strength of a high star Sacred Realm expert was really frightening and they were nearly unable to bear that oppression.
圣女在部落的地位极其崇高，仅次于古玛部落的部长夏玛。
The holy maiden's position in the tribe was extremely high, second only to the Chief of the Guma Tribe, Mo Ma.
在一亿一千万灵晶石沉大海后，凌霄这一次并没有立刻出手，看着价格不断往上攀升，他眉毛动都不动一下，淡定得好像不准备出手一样。

After the 110 million spirit gems sank into the sea, Ling Xiao didn't immediately act this time. When he saw the price continuing to rise endlessly, his eyebrows didn't even move, remaining unperturbed as if he wasn't going to bid again.
在三片叶子的包围下，中间是一朵未开放的小花包，传闻当花苞开放之际，围绕着他的三篇骷髅叶子会变成一个笑脸，恐怖异常。

在下甚是想念她们。”
This humble subordinate dearly misses them."

If they could stretch out the distance even after them chasing at full power, they had to be a Sacred Realm practitioner as well. It was highly likely to be the man Xia Yin saw in the small town.

While they were speaking, Mo Xue had already noticed them. She couldn't speak, but there was no way the thin layer of the veil could block the resentful, bone-deep hostility in her eyes. She probably thought they couldn't tell, so the hatred in her gaze was undisguised.

在他满脸骇然的时候，搭在他肩膀上的手突然用力将他扳倒了，摔倒再低的时候，玄威看到男人一掌轰了下来，眼睛霎时瞪大到极致，他想要运转体内的灵力，但是心念一动却什么反应也没有。

在洞府的后方有一片清澈的湖泊，湖泊周围开辟着大片的灵草田，上面种植着大量的顶级灵草，大概常年被瘴气侵蚀，灵草的叶子和根茎多呈现灰黑色，其中有一小块灵草田看起来最为阴森。

There was a clear lake behind the cave dwelling. A large magic herb field had been established near the lake, and numerous transcendent level magic herbs grew in the field. You XiaoMo washed away the stains on his body in the lake before he took out a new set of clothes from the magic bag and put them on. After tidying himself up, he took a wooden basin out from his dimension, filled it with clear water from the lake and walked over to Ling Xiao.
在灵草堂里，管事也是有等级的，地位越高，负责的灵草去就越重要，真要计较起来，上面也会偏向地位比他高的李管事，而且他前不久还为灵草堂立下大功劳，只能吃下这个亏了。

In the Magic Herb Shop, there were different tiers of managers too. The higher the tier, the more important the magic herbs were that they were responsible for. Even if they really did start arguing, the higher ups would favor Manager Li, whose status was higher than his. Plus, he had provided a generous contribution to the Magic Herb Shop not too long ago, so Manager Zhang could only suffer this loss.
在玄威的身体化为本体前，凌霄将其收进空间里。
Before XuanWei's body could return to its true form, Ling Xiao shoved him into the pocket dimension.
在甲板看了一晚夜景，顺便吹了一宿冷风，天刚亮，游小默终于被凌霄拎着回船舱，就算没看过这个世界的海上夜景，也不要表现得这么愚蠢，会把他的智商也拉低了。

Having remained on the deck to admire the night view for the entire night, and also got a night of being buffeted by the cold wind. The sky was just brightening, and Ling Xiao finally dragged You XiaoMo back to the cabin. Even if he had never seen this world's ocean nights, he still shouldn't behave so foolish; it'll pull his IQ down further.
在绵绵山住了两天，两人没再留下来的意愿，就准备向熊笑他们告辞。
They stayed in the Amaranthine Mountain for two days. The two did not have the desire to stay longer and were preparing to bid their farewells to Xiong Xiao and the rest.
在西境认识他们的人没几个，所以他们直接用原来的容貌行走，其实游小默也不太喜欢脸换来换去，还是用自己的脸比较舒服。

They were walking about with their original appearance as only a few people knew them in Xi Jing. As a matter of fact, You XiaoMo did not like to keep changing his face and felt that it was the most comfortable to use his own face.

The sun soon set after staying in the lobby of the restaurant for more than an hour. The sky and clouds was dyed red by the setting sun and the light reflecting off painted the people's faces in a red hue. (天空被云霞染得红通通一片，映得人们脸也红红的。)
在酒楼里住了两天。

It wasn't Ji Rui who had acted, but Ji YunLang's grandfather, Ji He. From the beginning, he had been very calm and composed, allowing Ji Rui to make all the decisions. Yet, when the auction was coming to a close, he had acted.

The Demon Phoenix Clan was located at the Hundred Birds Valley (百鸟谷). They generally did not allow outsiders to enter their territory, unless it was for the purpose of joining with other forces (依附势力).

The Demon Beast Graveyard was just like a black purgatory. (黑色的人间炼狱) Deteriorating graves were everywhere, and even the mud was black without a single trace of a weed. Some graves were already split open or only half of it was left, and every two steps they could see a ghastly white skeleton.

妖猫一族都很珍惜自己的小名，特别是像老板娘这种第一美女，她都还没享受够，怎么可以死在这里！

The demon cat clan (妖猫) were known for treasuring their lives, especially for people like the proprietress who is known as the number one beauty. She hadn't even enjoyed her life to the fullest, how could she die here!
妖猫非常重视自己的容貌，失去容貌对他们来说是一件生不如死的事情！

姑且不说大妖兽收集的宝贝有多么珍贵，就冲着那些宝贝都是从远古流传下来的这一点，就足以让西境的妖兽们趋之若鹜。

Leaving aside how precious the treasures collected by the great demon beasts were, just the fact that these treasures were passed down from ancient times was enough to make the demon beasts of Xi Jing scrabble madly for these unobtainable treasures.

Ji YunLang didn't notice the mockery and opened his mouth to repeat before being stopped by Ji Wen. In a whisper, he said, "Young master, (公子)you can't, his toying you."
姬云琅的腿虽然没了，但是他想离开百鸟谷并不难。

姬云琅瞄了眼眼神宛如一口古井，外表却艳丽无比的姬芮，神情一凛，遂同意了。
Ji YunLang glanced over at Ji Rui, who had eyes that spoke of ancient history (神宛如一口古井) yet she had a glamourous appearance. Feeling his heart tighten (一凛), he agreed.
姬凤一无所觉，他深深的看了眼游小默，犹犹豫豫的说道：“他让我给你们传达一些话，内容是——我现在在妖凰族过得很好，虽然每天都有一个不长眼的家伙过来挑衅我，但是他很蠢，比某某还蠢，我只要跟大长老哭诉一句，他就惨了，所以你们不用担心我哦，等我长大了，我会去找你们哒。”

Ji Feng was completely unaware, and he shot a deep look at You XiaoMo before saying hesitantly, "He wanted me to tell you guys a few things. What he wanted to say is -- I'm currently doing very well at the Demon Phoenix Clan. Even though some careless fellow will come over every day to provoke me, he's very stupid, even more stupid than so-and-so. As long as I go and complain tearfully to the elders, he's ruined, so you don't have to worry about me. Wait until I grow up and I'll go find you guys."
姬凤不慌不忙的从身上拿出一根火红色的羽毛，“这是信物！”

姬凤摇摇头，“这个我也不知道，问他也不告诉我是谁，只是说你听了就会知道。”

姬凤是妖凰族年轻一辈的佼佼者，继承了妖凰族的好相貌，但却十分妖娆，一颦一笑，一举一动都透着一丝天然的魅惑，明明是凤凰，却有着比蛇类还要诱惑的水蛇腰，走过来的时候，一扭一扭的，把许多雄性生物看得血液都沸腾了起来。

Ji Feng was a well-known figure in the younger generation of the Demon Phoenix Clan. He/she had inherited the good looks/handsomeness of the Demon Phoenix Clan, but was extremely alluring. Every frown and every smile, each and every move was enveloped with a trace of natural charm. She was clearly a Phoenix, but had a slender and supple waist/lithe body (水蛇腰) that was even more enticing than those demon serpents had. As she walked over, it swung from side to side, and the blood of many male organisms were close to boiling as they saw this.
姬凤款款走到他面前，魅惑的笑道：“哎呀，听你这话好像我不能出现在这里似的，别忘了，这里可不是麒麟族，奉劝你一句，在这里最好收起你的爪牙，免得继续丢人哦。”

"Ji Feng leisurely walked to him and gave an enchanting smile, "Ai ya, hearing you put it that way makes it seem like I shouldn't be here. Don't forget, this is not the Qilin Clan. Let me offer you some advice, you had better put away your claws and teeth here, lest you continue to be shameful/shame your clan."

Ji Feng knew that it was his turn to come on stage now, and when he saw them all look over, he smiled leisurely. "Brother Ling, Fellow Brother You, could I borrow you two and have a chat?"
姬凤说：“我曾经看到他想给你们传消息，后来他才告诉我说是你们救了他，没有你们就没有他。”

Ji NingYu was actually someone who could become an heir for the Demon Phoenix Clan's clan head, and this was exactly the opportunity Ji Feng needed to earn the future clan head's trust. That was why he voluntarily chose to help Ji NingYu deliver information.
姬文和姬武却不傻，他们看得出来芮长劳受了内伤。

Ji Wen and Ji Wu had seen how Ji Rui's Godfire was engulfed by Ling Xiao's Godfire. Although they were afraid, they could only use their own Godfire to ward his off in order to save their lives. But in the end they were engulfed as well, and both of them received internal injuries too.
姬武二话不说就拉着姬云琅跟随姬芮往外跑，姬文紧跟其后，唯一没有动作的人就是姬凤，视线追随这他们仿佛他是一个局外人。

Ji Wu didn't need to be told twice before grabbing Ji YunLang and running after Ji Rui, Ji Wen following close behind. The only one who didn't move was Ji Feng, his gaze following after them as if he had nothing to do with them.
姬翁一脸纵容的表情，甚至还帮他调整位置。
Ji Weng had an expression of indulgence and even helped him adjust his position.
姬翁也点了点头，在他怀里的胖娃娃也小大人似的点了点头。
Ji Weng nodded too. The fat baby in his arms also nodded as if he was a tiny adult.
姬翁从容不逝的说道：“姬云琅失踪之前一直在百鸟谷里养伤，如果有人潜进百鸟谷偷偷把他带走，我不可能发现不了，唯一可以解释的，就是他自己离开了百鸟谷。”

Ji Weng calmly stated, "Ji YunLang he had been recuperating from his injury in the Hundred Birds Valley before he went missing. It's impossible for me to fail to discover someone if they sneaked into the Hundred Birds Valley and secretly took him away. The only other explanation is that he left the Hundred Birds Valley by himself."
姬翁抚着花白的胡子，张口正在解释，一只嫩白如藕，胖嘟嘟的小手突然从桌下伸出来。
Ji Weng stroked his grizzled beard and just as he opened his mouth to explain, a tender, chubby and white little hand suddenly reached out from under the table.
姬翁接着道：“唯一可以解释的，就是有人用借口把姬云琅找出去，并且让他一个去，这个人必定是姬云琅的熟人，而且关系匪浅。”

Ji Weng continued, "The only explanation is that someone used an excuse to draw Ji YunLang out and made him go alone. This person must be Ji YunLang's acquaintance and have a close relationship with him."
姬翁是妖凰族地位最崇高的人，拥有绝对的威信，地位仅次于已经闭关五百年的妖凰谷主，现在谷内一切大小事宜都要经过他的首肯才能做，所以他反对的话，就是姬赫也不能直接反抗他。

Ji Weng was the most respected person in the Demon Phoenix Clan and had absolute authority. He was second only to the Master of the Demon Phoenix Valley who had already been in secluded cultivation for five hundred years. Now, all trivial and major matters in the Valley had to gain his nod of approval before it could be done. Thus, even Ji He could not directly rebel against him if he opposed it.
姬翁笑着摸摸他的小脑袋，眼睛却看向脸色越来越阴沉的姬赫，“如果你执意要找天狗算帐只会中敌人的圈套，如今他们在暗我们在明，我们必须更加小心谨慎。”

Ji Weng smiled and stroked his little head, yet he was looking at Ji He whose expression was becoming increasingly overcast, "You will only fall into the enemy's trap if you insist on getting revenge on the TianGou. Now that they are in the shadow and we are in the light, we must be more prudent."
姬翁老僧般睁开微阖的眼眸，表情犹如一口沉淀千万年的古井，半点波澜不起，过了会他才开口打破楼阁僵硬的气氛，“姬云琅不是天狗杀的。”

Old Monk Ji Weng (姬翁老僧) opened his partially-closed eyes. His expression was without the slightest ripple, akin to a well that had been steeping (沉淀) for thousands of years. He started to speak after a while, breaking the tense atmosphere in the building, "Ji YunLang was not killed by the TianGou."
姬翁让人乖乖的不捣乱，这才回答姬赫的问题：“姬云琅一直在谷中养伤，他应该也知道自己的情况不能随便出去，何况他的伤也还没完全好，那么他又为何要私自出谷，甚至连姬文武都没带在身边，二长老可有想过这个问题？”

Ji Weng made him obediently sit and stop making trouble before he answered Ji He's question, "Ji YunLang had been recuperating from his injury in the valley. He should also know that he could not go out as he pleased in his situation, what's more his injury had not completely healed. Then why would he secretly go out of the valley and not even bring Ji Wen? Has the Second Elder thought about this?"
姬芮之所以没有发现凌霄的真实修为，一来她修为比凌霄低，二来凌霄习惯性的自己留一手，所以他的修为目前是压制在十二阶一星这道坎上。
The reason for Ji Rui's misconception was that she was not only weaker than Ling Xiao but also that Ling Xiao habitually held back. Thus, his level appeared to be at Level Twelve one star.
姬芮喉咙突然涌起一股血气，铁锈的味道在她嘴巴里漫延开来。
A mouthful of blood suddenly welled up from Ji Rui's throat, and the coppery taste spreaded all throughout her mouth.
姬芮是一名十二阶强者，她是妖凰族中为数不多的女性，在妖凰族的地位可谓一人之下万人之上，这次拍她出来就是为了确保任务万无一失，而他们的任务就是把凌霄带回去，如果反抗得太厉害，那么就就地正法。

Ji Rui was a Level Twelve practitioner and one of the few females in the Demon Phoenix Clan. Her position was truly second to none. Having her here was to guarantee the sucess of the mission, and the mission was to bring Ling Xiao back. If he was being too diffcult then, he would be dealt with on the spot. (如果反抗得太厉害，那么就就地正法)
姬芮是很厉害，这年头每个圣境强者都是通天大陆高高在上的强者，他们翻手为云覆手为雨，然而圣境强者也有强弱之分。

Ji Rui was strong. At this point in time, every Sacred Realm practitioner was the best of the best of the TongTian Continent. You could say that they could do whatever they wanted (翻手为云覆手为雨) but even then, there was a difference in level between Sacred Realms.
姬芮没有得到凌霄的回应，眼神微沉，“不想你的同伴出事的话，现在跟我们走，我可以保证绝不动你同伴一根寒毛。”
Seeing no response, Ji Rui's eyes darkened slight, "If you don't want your comrade to be injuried then come with us right now. I can promise that he wouldn't be harmed.
姬芮淡淡的瞥了姬云琅一眼，对他的行为不置一词，目光又落在凌霄身上，虽然看起来很有强者的风范，但是在眼睛深处却隐藏着与姬云琅一模一样的傲慢与轻视，下一句她便说道：“实力倒是不错，只可惜还不是我的对手。”

Ji Rui glanced over at Ji YunLang but didn't comment on his actions. Then she shifted back to Ling Xiao. Although she had the air of a powerhouse, deep within, her eyes spoke of the same arrogance and disdain as Ji YunLang. Then she spoke, "You're not bad, but still not a match for me."
姬芮的脸色顿时像抹了一层黑炭似的，眼神阴冷下来，虽然她的年纪已经一大把，但是她姬芮仍然是妖凰族最美的女人，最忌讳的就是别人叫她老太婆，凌霄成功的激起她的杀意。

As if Ji Rui's face had been brushed over with charcoal, her eyes turned cold. Although her age was up there, she was still the prettiest women in the Demon Phoenix Clan and her taboo was others calling her an 'old hag'. Ling Xiao had sucessfully enraged her.
姬芮知道这一点，所以她认为就算他们的修为同等，她的神火也会强于凌霄，与修为无关，因为血脉，一个是纯种，一个是杂种，孰强孰弱几乎一目了然。

Ji Rui (姬芮) knew this, so she thought that even though their cultivation was of the same rank, her Godfire would still be stronger than Ling Xiao's. It had nothing to do with their cultivation bases, but rather their bloodlines; one was a pureblood, while the other was a hybrid. Who was stronger and who was weaker should be clear at first glance.
姬赫看着他们祖孙之间的互动，眼中闪过一丝冷意。
Ji Hei looked at the interaction between the grandparent and grandson and a cold glint flashed through his eyes.

Every chair has a noticeable number in front of it. Once you participate in the bid, the seat number and bid amount would be reflected in the auctioneer's tablet.
每株灵草都装在一个玉盒子里，成熟的灵草反而比幼苗要多一些，虽然质量只有下品和中品，但已经很不错了。
Every stalk was placed in a jade box, with more mature herbs than saplings. Although there was only mid and low grade herbs, it was already pretty good.
每次游小默都会敲打他们一番，但下一次又会犯。
Every time You XiaoMo would scold them, but then they would just do it again next time.

每经过一个无人发掘过的洞府，凌霄先是粗暴的轰了禁制，然后又以迅雷不及掩耳之势将灵草田整片灵草都挖了，欣欣向荣的灵草田往往变成一片未开发的泥土。

Every time he passed by an unexploded and uninhabited Immortal’s Cave, Ling Xiao would violently bombarded the restriction first, before he dug up the whole magic herb field at the speed of lightning. The flourishing magic herb field would often be turned into a field resembling a plot of undeveloped soil.

比如为什么他们会突然离开，为什么王老板这条街本该毁得最严重却一点事情也没有，两者是不是有什么关系？

For example, sitting diagonally opposite them was Ji Rui, who they had fought a mere half month ago. With her constitution as a member of the Demon Phoenix Clan, her internal injuries had long since healed, but her broken reputation wasn't something she could easily get back.
比如大量的炼制灵丹时，那个时候他需要连续炼丹，一般都会用灵水补充，而不需要大量炼制的时候，他会让灵魂之力自然恢复。

Like when he had to refine a large number of pills, he needed to do so continuously, so he would use spiritual water to replenish his soul force. But when he wasn’t going to refine so many, he would let his soul force recover by itself.
比如江流，他生前有太深的执念，死前还不忘仇恨游小默，所以死后这个执念便深深的烙在脑海里，变成水妖后，他最想做的就是杀死游小默。

Like Jiang Liu for example, his grudge was so strong from his previous life, (wanting to kill You XiaoMo even as he was about to die) that even after death, it was deeply imprinted into his mind. Even after he became a Water Demon, the first thing he wanted to do was to kill You XiaoMo.
比如那位叫天恨的男人，仿佛吃了大亏一样，知道凌霄和那<t0/>位谷叔出去<t1/>了，他突然哼地一声，抬起两条腿不爽的搁在桌上。

比菜市场还要热闹吵杂的地方。

比起他这个亲爹，他儿子似乎更信任他男人，所以如果他敢说也包括儿子怕是不会理他了。

比起懵懂的木元素之心，拥有成人智商的水元素之心显然更清楚落入别人手里后会遭遇什么样的待遇，亿万年才形成的灵智，野心勃勃的它，一心想化形，岂会甘心被抹掉灵智，可惜它遇到了凌霄。

Compared to the ignorant Wood Elemental Essence, the Water Elemental Essence had the intelligence of an adult, so it knew the outcome of being captured. It took hundreds of millions of years to form an intelligence, and it was ambitious in wanting to shape shift (化形). Of course it didn't want to be wipe of his intelligence, but too bad it met Ling Xiao.
比进城还要贵，游小默还是从储物袋里摸出二十枚扔给他，“现在可以让我们进镇了吧？”
That was even more expensive than a city's entry fee, but You XiaoMo still took out twenty spirit gems and handed it over. "We can enter now, right?"
毕竟培养出一颗强大的棋子并不容易的。

毛球将他们在酒楼遇到的事情绘声绘色的说给其他人听，还包括她怎么整治老板娘，怎么让她毁容。
MaoQiu gave a lively retelling of what happened outside of the inn, including how she punished the proprietress and how she disfigured her.
毛球当他默许了，眼睛不怀好意的看向老板娘。

毛球抿唇一笑，脸上魅惑十足，“大人的魅力依旧不减，连这位魅力的老板娘都会您有好感。”
With a smile on her lips, MaoQiu's face was full of charm, "Boss's charmingness is still as destructive as ever (大人的魅力依旧不减). Even this alluring proprietress was attracted to you."
毛球有笑盈盈的退回他们身边。
MaoQiu returned to them, smiling softly.

毛球笑盈盈的告诉她道，她可是难得会跟一个讨厌的人说这种好心肠的话，她果然还是太善良了。
MaoQiu said this with a smile. It was very rare that she would be so nice to such an annoying person and issue to them such a warning. She really was too nice.

毫无疑问，这个叫凌默的男人绝对是一个可以在西境横着走的强者，若有他护送小主人回玄龟族，他绝对可以放一百二十万颗心。

This man named Ling Mo was undoubtedly an expert who could do whatever he wanted in the Western Continent. If he protected the Young Master and sent him to the Black Turtle Clan, he could definitely be 1.2 million percent at ease. (放一百二十万颗心)

Jiang Liu let out blood-curdling screech, his hands grabbed his face as he rolled around on the ground. But in a few seconds, one side of his face had decomposed to reveal the white bones beneath. The bright red blood was dyed black as it flowed down his neck, looking exceptionally terrifying.

Jiang Liu's state was much better now, but because his eyes were too frightening, so he was wearing an elegant mask that covered half his face. It was much better than if he didn't wear it.
江流的想法不难猜，他已经猜到游小默来到通天大陆，方宸乐作为游小默敬佩的大师兄，如果他知道方宸乐落在他手里，一定不会袖手旁观。

Jiang Liu's thoughts weren't hard to guess. He had guessed that You XiaoMo had come to the TongTian Continent. Since Fang ChenLe was the other's respected da shixiong, You XiaoMo definitely wouldn't be able to sit by if he knew that Fang ChenLe had fallen into Jiang Liu's hands.
江流的脸已经被处理过了，两只窟窿眼睛被湿布盖着，从游小默的角度看起来到没有那么惨了，最多就是脸色比较苍白。
Jiang Liu’s face has been treated and his eye sockets (两只窟窿眼睛) were covered with a damp cloth. It did not seem that bad from the You XiaoMo's point of view. At most, his face was a little pale.
江流知道自己已经变得很扭曲，他没有回头路，所以他只能让自己变得更加扭曲，如果他的眼睛没有瞎，他也会不计一切代价杀了游小默。
Jiang Liu knew he had become twisted. He had no way out, so he could only twist himself further. If he had not been blinded, then he would kill You XiaoMo no matter what he had to give up to do it.
江流突然停下脚步，一脸震惊的盯着对面缓缓走过来的男子，散漫的走路姿势，黝黑带笑的眼晴仿佛不经意的瞥过周围的人，视线随即与他对上，眼中的笑意似于不减反增。

Jiang Liu's steps suddenly stopped and he stared in shock at the man across them who was slowly walking over. That sloppy walking posture and that pitch black smiling eyes seemed to carelessly sweep over the people around him and immediately met Jiang Liu's eyes. The smiling expression in those eyes appeared to be increasing unabatedly.
江流终于回过神来，一个绝佳的念头在他脑海里成形了，震惊之色渐渐转换为欣喜，他指着凌霄激动的说道：“快把他抓起来！”

Seeing that 'Fang ChenLe' seemed unfazed and was even smiling, an unsettled feeling rose in Jiang Liu's chest. It was especially strong when those eyes looked at him. It felt like even his soul was being looked through.
江流见他们迟迟不动手，隐约知道他们在顾忌什么，当即压低声音略微焦急的说道：“这个我认识，他是中级位面的人，他的身份很特殊，把他抓起来，对你们只有好处没有坏处。”

Seeing that they seemed unwilling to act, Jiang Liu realized the reason for their hesitation and said in a low, rushed voice, "I recognize this person. He's someone from the Middle Level Plane. His identity is pretty special. Capturing him will only do you good."
江流非常镇定的走到游震天面前，跪下才开口道：“小子江流拜见老家主。”
Jiang Liu calmly walked up to You ZhenTian and spoke only after kneeling. "Jiang Liu pays respects to the family head."
江流顿时如遭雷蛰，真是他，真是游小默最敬佩的大师兄方宸乐，不然他怎么会对他笑，可是他怎么会出现在通天大陆？

Jiang Liu immediately appeared to have suffered a thundershock (如遭雷蛰), it's really him! It was really You XiaoMo's the most admired Older Senior Brother, Fang ChenLe. Otherwise, why would he smile at him? But why did Fang ChenLe appear in the TongTian Continent?
没一会，两人就被游小默给解决了。
It didn't take long for You XiaoMo to finish them.
没人敢上前，看着莫雪这幅丑陋的模样，众人嫌恶的移开视线。
No one dared to go up to her and seeing the ugliness of her face, everyone shifted their gaze away in disgust.
没人注意到，一名身穿城主府守卫青盔甲的人突然从某个黑暗的角落走出来，悄无声息的跟上队伍。
No one noticed a man wearing the green armor (青盔甲) of the City Master's mansion guards suddenly walking out from a dark corner and quietly following the team.
没人注意到，谢俊眼神阴沉的看了牛徐阳一眼。
No one noticed Xie Jun darkly eying Niu XuYang.

The corner of You XiaoMo's mouth twitched. He had to get used to the adult PiQiu, and he soon said seriously, "No, you guys also saw how the small boats can only fit two or three people. Also, even if you guys go, you won't be much use. More people will only be a hindrance. If you guys stay here, you can also ask around River Town, and if you hear anything about the Psychic Black Turtle you can notify us."
游小默嘴角一抽，怎么觉得纯洁的友谊被他这么恶意说，好像多了点什么东西似的，是他的错觉吗？
You XiaoMo grimaced. Why did he feel that a clean and honest friendship had been described so maliciously (恶意说) by him, as if there was something added on. Was it his misconception?
游小默嘴角一抽，热闹的大堂突然安静下来。
You XiaoMo's mouth twitched. Suddenly, the noise in the lobby quieted down.
游小默嘴角一抽，真是自信过多的脑残，不过罪魁祸首还是凌霄，面具摘下来果然又招蜂引蝶，本以为洞域的女性应该不会很多，结果运气来也挡也挡不住。

You XiaoMo felt the corner of his mouth twitch, really, another brain-damaged-overly-confident person. But the chief culprit was still Ling Xiao. Without the mask, he really attracted people like bees to flowers. He had thought that there weren't many females in Dong Yu, but when luck comes around, you can't stop, can you.
游小默嘴角一抽，虽然老板娘死有余辜，但是这种情况下还要追过去，可见毛球也是个睚眦必报的人。

You XiaoMo's mouth twitched, although the proprietress was getting what she deserved, but chasing after her even in this situtiation, clearly MaoQiu was not someone who let people off the hook. (睚眦必报)
游小默嘴角微微一抽，这是想要他进去还是不想他进去，竟然用这么看不起人的语气说话，他也是有血性的好不好。
The corners of You XiaoMo's lips twitched slightly. Did he want him to go in or not? Ling Xiao actually used such a scornful tone of voice. You XiaoMo also was courageous and upright, alright?
游小默嘴角微抽，“不用了，我真的有重要的事情，你跟着不方便。”
The corner of You XiaoMo's mouth twitched. "No need. I really have some very important business to attend to. It won't be convenient for you to follow."
游小默嘴角抽了抽，他宁愿不要了解。
The corner of You XiaoMo's lips twitched. He'd rather not understand.
游小默嘴角抽搐，决定不再跟他说话了。
The corners of You XiaoMo's mouth twitched and he decided not to speak to him again.
游小默嘴角猛地抽搐起来，瞬间起了一身鸡皮疙瘩，忍无可忍道：“你在想什么啊，我是说他可能会废了你的修为之类的，你想成什么啊？”

The corners of You XiaoMo's lips twitched fiercely, and goosebumps appeared all over him in an instant. He said, exasperated, "What are you thinking, I meant that he would probably cripple your cultivation base or something like that, what did you think I said?"
游小默嘴角直抽搐。
You XiaoMo's mouth twitched violently.
游小默回头对凌霄他们说道：“我去了，你们记得等我。”
You XiaoMo turned back and said to Ling Xiao and the others, “I’m off, remember to wait for me.” .
游小默回头就看到一朵巨大的蘑菇云出现在游震天站的位置上，爆炸的威力在不断的扩散，蘑菇云迅速的膨胀，明明他们在往后退，可是他却能看到蘑菇云在变大，可见爆炸的威力有多么大。

You Xiaomu looked back and saw an immense mushroom cloud appear where You ZhenTian was standing. The power of the explosion unceasingly spread out as the mushroom cloud rapidly expanded. It was obvious they were retreating, yet he could see the mushroom cloud growing bigger. It was evident how powerful the explosion was.
游小默回头看了他们一眼，还以为需要身份验证之类的，感情是用来摆设的。
You XiaoMo turned around to take a look, he thought that they would need to prove their identity or something, but it looks like they're just for show.
游小默回头看了眼蘑菇云的方向，游震天随时有可能追上来，想到这，他立刻拿出一枚空间符，“我们用这个离开。”

You XiaoMo looked back in the direction of the mushroom cloud. You ZhenTian could catch up to them at any time. He immediately took out a teleportation talisman once he thought of this, "We'll use this to leave."
游小默回头看着他，骄傲的说到：“看我的心情。”
You XiaoMo looked back at him and said, proudly, "That depends on my mood."
游小默回头说：“两个月没去乌山集镇，我想去看看，说不定灵草堂的李管事已经找到黑莲草，正愁着找不到我们。”

You XiaoMo turned his head, saying, "It's been two weeks since we've been to WuShan Town. I want to visit. Manager Li of the Magic Herb Shop might've already found the black lotus herb and is freaking out about not being able to find us."
游小默回头，刚好看到凌霄脸上还没来得及收起的笑容，笑得真是夸张，心中的疑惑越来越深，皱着脸道：“你在笑什么？”
You XiaoMo turned around only to see Ling Xiao's yet to be retracted smile. It was so exaggerated that he was even more confused. With a scrunched up expression, he asked, "What are you laughing at?"
游小默回身，一拳就砸了过去，虽然跟个弱者计较有失他的身份，但这种人必须给个教训，否则他们只会变本加厉，集九镇最强的人是吗？

You XiaoMo turned back and sent a fist smashing at the man. Although it was beneath him to argue with a weak man, such people must be taught a lesson. Otherwise, they would only go from bad to worse. The strongest man in JiJiu Town, right?
游小默囧囧的想着，应该不会吧，但这种事情凌霄确实做得出来。
You XiaoMo's face was like '囧囧' as he thought about it, but it was true that Ling Xiao could do this kind of thing.
游小默在<t0/>玉简里七挑八选的<t1/>，还真被他找到这种丹方，从低级灵丹到高级灵丹，每一等级都有好几种，他是不是应该惊叹一声先祖的魄力，连这种药效的丹方都收。
You XiaoMo flipped through the recipes in the jade drive and managed to find quite a few of these. From low level magic pills to high level magic pills, there were several for each level.
游小默在上面看得佩服不已，这个花姑具备了很多人都没有的东西，心思比男人还狠，做事非常果断，这种人若在乱世之中绝对会成为一方枭雄霸主。

You XiaoMo watched on in endless admiration from up the tree. This Hua Gu possessed traits that many people did not have. Her mind was more merciless than a man's, and she handled matters in an extremely decisive manner. This sort of person would definitely become a fierce and powerful overlord (枭雄霸主) if they were in turbulent times.
游小默在下面踢了凌霄一脚。
You XiaoMo kicked Ling Xiao's foot under the table.
游小默在中心城的时候偶尔听人提起过。
When You XiaoMo was in Central City, he had occasionally heard people mention this.
游小默在九十层楼梯口告别九夜，随后一头钻进房间再进入空间，给灵草田的灵草存好足够的灵水，再拔掉重新长出来的杂草才离开空间。
You XiaoMo bid Jiu Ye farewell at level ninety, entering his room and then his dimensions. He watered his fields and got rid of the newly sprouted weeds before leaving.
游小默在内心愤怒的吼道，他才没有跪着求他，不过下一秒他就将内丹抢了过来。
In his heart, You XiaoMo screamed out, he didn't kneel to beg him, but right after that, he aggressively took the Life Crystal.
游小默在听到两个熟悉得耳朵都快生茧的字后第一时间就躲到凌霄身后，动作毫不迟疑。
The instant You XiaoMo heard those two familiar words, which were familiar to the point that his ears were almost bleeding, his first response was to hide unhesitatingly behind Ling Xiao.
游小默在船舱里能感觉到船在摇晃，连商船都有感觉，怪不得老人不让他们乘小船出海，怕是刚到这片海域，小船不会解体了。

You XiaoMo could feel the ship rocking while in the hold. It was no wonder the old man did not let them go to sea by boat if they could even feel the waves in a merchant ship. The old man was afraid that the boat would disintegrate as soon as they arrived at this area of the sea.
游小默在院子里挖里一个洞，然后将坛子埋进去，再将土踩得严严实实的，确保没问题后才拿着剩下半瓶灵酒离开空间。

You XiaoMo dug a hole in the courtyard, then he buried the jar in it and stomped the earth level to make sure that there was no problem before leaving the dimension with the remaining half bottle of spirit wine wine.
游小默坐在炉鼎前方，双手在胸前结着道道复杂却又熟练无比的手印，在他面前的炉鼎里，一百多株灵草已经被他提炼成一团团五颜六色的粘稠液体，黑色的杂质落在炉鼎周围，堆积了不少。

You XiaoMo sat in front of the cauldron, and his hands formed complex yet extremely practiced hand signs (手印) in front of his chest. In the cauldron, he had already refined the hundred magic herbs into round balls of colorful, sticky liquid. Quite a bit of the black impurities landed on the edges of the cauldron.
游小默坚决不承认他的表情传达的其实是‘刚称赞过你，智商又掉回去’的意思，突然问他这种问题，他怎么可能会猜得到。

You XiaoMo absolutely refused to acknowledge that his expression actually carried the meaning of 'I just praised you, but your IQ just dropped back down.' How could he guess what the answer was if Ling Xiao suddenly asked him this kind of question?
游小默坚定的握紧拳头，眼睛里冒着奋斗的火花，“你放心，我一定会不遗余力的拍到它的。”
You XiaoMo clenched his fist in determination and sparks of combativeness ignited in his eyes, "Rest assured, I will definitely so spare no pains or effort to get it."
游小默垮下脸，“你怎么这么确定？”
You XiaoMo stared at him in suspicion (垮下脸), "How are you so sure?"
游小默大概猜到他的顾虑，“这样吧，我最后再加五百万灵晶。”他刻意强调‘最后’这两个字。
You XiaoMo roughly guessed what his misgivings were. "How about this, lastly I'll add another five million spirit gems." He purposefully emphasized the 'lastly.'
游小默大概的提了下自己的要求。
You XiaoMo approximately raised his own requirements.
游小默大概看衡量了一下，白虎的身体长约十米，宽约三米，同理可证，他的床也是这么大，他现在终于相信白虎是个超级享受的主，死了也不愿意亏待自己。

You XiaoMo roughly measured the White Tiger. The White Tiger's body was about ten meters long and approximately three meters wide. Using the same method, his bed was also that big. He now finally believed that the White Tiger was a individual who totally enjoyed his comforts and was unwilling to treat himself shabbily even when he was dead.
游小默失望，果然还是得用两只脚。
You XiaoMo was disappointed, at the end of the day, they still had to walk.
游小默头痛的扶了下额，他突然有点羡慕凌霄了，他不喜欢的人从来不会去理会，更加不会委屈自己去附和对方，他要是也能这么潇洒就好了。

You XiaoMo held his forehead. He could feel a headache coming on. He suddenly felt a little jealous of Ling Xiao. He would just ignore people he didn't like and wouldn't push himself to give in to the other. If only he could be so blunt.
游小默头皮发麻，总觉得这个人很不一般，不过听到他们的对话，他总算知道刚认识凌霄那会她说的话是什么意思，眼前这个看起来很诡异的人竟然就是促使凌霄前往龙翔大陆的罪魁祸首，看起来还不是一般的劲敌。

You XiaoMo's scalp prickled. He felt as if this person was very unusual, but when he heard them speaking, he finally knew Ling Xiao meant during their conversation when they had just met. It seemed that this extremely strange person was actually the arch-criminal who drove Ling Xiao to Long Xiang Continent. It also seemed that he wasn't your typical formidable adversary.
游小默夹在一群妖兽中间，气息反而被掩盖了，守城的士兵也没有发现他是人类。
You XiaoMo was sandwiched in the middle of a group of demon beasts so his aura had been concealed. Thus, the soldiers guarding the city did not find out that he was a human.
游小默奇怪的看着他的笑容，“你笑什么？”
You XiaoMo looked at his smile weirdly. "What are you smiling at?"
游小默好奇的看着他们装上船的货物，都是些陆地上常见的东西，比如香料，胭脂等日常生活用品，让他惊讶万分，商船交易的对象好像是妖兽，妖兽们也喜欢这些东西？

You XiaoMo looked at the cargo they loaded on the boat with curiosity. They were common items seen on land, such as spices, rouge and other daily necessities. He was astonished. The client of these merchant ships (商船交易的对象) were demon beasts. Did this mean that demon beasts liked these things too?
游小默委屈，谁在玩啊，他明明很积极地在找水元素之心，不过他还是老老实实到边上待着，看凌霄这阵仗就知道他接下来要有大动作。

You XiaoMo felt wronged. Who was playing ah? He was obviously very active in searching for Water Elemental Essence. However, he still obediently went to one side and stayed there. He knew what Ling Xiao's next big move was upon seeing his behavior (阵仗).
游小默威胁般的哼了一声，“没好处我也要知道，你说完就是我的事了，与你无关，你要是不说，这只叫化鸡我就自己一个人享用了，你再怎么求我，我也不会给你的。”

You XiaoMo made a threatening sound, "Even if it's not good for me, I want to know. After you tell me, then it's my problem, not yours. If you don't, then this Beggar's Chicken is all mine. No matter how you beg me, I won't share it."
游小默害羞的将头埋在凌霄怀里，听到颜辉这么夸奖他，他都有点不好意思了，虽然颜辉别有用心，但是哪个人不喜欢听好听话。

You Xiao shyly buried his head into Ling Xiao's chest. He was a little embarrassed to hear Yan Hui praise him so much. Although Yan Hui had an ulterior motive, there was none who did not like to listen to people praising them.
游小默对姬凤的印象还挺好的，而且刚刚他从头到尾都没有参与其中，最后还被姬芮给抛下了，这是太可怜了！
You XiaoMo's impression of Ji Feng was still pretty good, and furthermore, he hadn't participated at all just then. In the end he had even been thrown aside by Ji Rui, this was too pitiful!
游小默对此有一点小小的怨念，因为凌霄每次都跑在他前头。
You XiaoMo held a little resentment for these things, as Ling Xiao was always running ahead of him every time.
游小默对这个人的职业大概有些了解了，正好他确实缺一个<t0/>熟悉集九<t1/>镇的人，平时倒是可以和凌霄慢慢逛，不过现在不行，<t2/>凌霄受<t3/>了伤。

You XiaoMo had a basic understanding of this man's job now, and they needed someone familiar with JiJiu Town. Usually, they could take it slow and explore, but now that Ling Xiao was hurt, they didn't have such a luxury.
游小默对这个任务做了评价，它最厉害的地方就是可以气到被占了便宜的天刀。
You XiaoMo assessed this task. Its most impressive point was how it could anger to death Tian Dao, who would be taken advantage of.
游小默将一瓶高级灵丹举到凌霄面前。
You XiaoMo raised a bottle of high level magic pills towards Ling Xiao.
游小默将他推离火堆，“你还是站着看就好，我一个就行了。”
You XiaoMo pushed him away from the fire, "You had better just stand here and watch. I'll do it by myself."
游小默将储物袋收起来，在毁掉黑衣人的尸体，然后一脸思考的看着莫雪一群人。
You XiaoMo took the magic bag and destroyed the body, then looked thoughtful at Mo Xue.
游小默将叫花鸡从土里挖出来放到一边，隔着一层厚厚的泥还能闻到叫花鸡散发出来的那股浓浓郁的香味，香味被风卷得到处都是，有的飘向森林，估计老远都能闻得到。

You XiaoMo dug out the Beggar's Chicken from the ground. Even with a layer of mud, one could still smell that rich fragrance as it was carried away by the wind into the forest. By the feel of it, even from afar one would still be able to smell it.
游小默将叫花鸡端到桌上，然后拿出刀在鸡腹上切开一道大口子，里面的调料立刻顺着口子递到盘子里，看的众人食指大动。
You XiaoMo placed the Beggar's Chicken onto the table and used a huge knife to slice the turkey's belly open. The spices came pouring out onto the plate, making their mouths water. (食指大动)
游小默将吞金兽从怀里领出来扔出去，后者在半空中翻了个身轻盈的落地，姿势还颇帅气，这是练了半个多月的结果。

You XiaoMo threw out the Metal Swallowing Beast from his lap. The latter, as if as light as a feather, made a mid-air turn and landed gracefully on the floor. That was the result of the past two weeks of training.
游小默将吞金兽和两只金翅虫从衣服里掏出来，自从回到中天后，他们的行为就被他限制住，大概憋坏了。

You XiaoMo took the metal swallowing beast and golden winged insects out from his clothes. Ever since they returned to Zhong Tian, he had restricted their actions. They were probably dying of boredom.
游小默将吞金兽和乒乓球挤到宝座边上，一屁股坐了下去，不知道是什么妖兽的绒毛，竟然真的很柔软，而且还带着一丝清凉的感觉。

You XiaoMo shoved the Metal Swallowing Beast and Ping Pang to one side of the throne and down on it himself. He didn't know what demon beast's fur this was but it really was soft, and even had a somewhat cool feeling.
游小默将坛子的盖子塞上，随即搬到院子里藏好，配方上说一坛上好的极品灵酒酿制成功有两个重要的因素。
You XiaoMo stoppered the lid on the jar and then moved it to the yard to hide it. The recipe stated that there were two important factors for the successful production of a first-rate spirit wine.
游小默将小乌龟放在桌上，吞金兽和金翅虫也都跑出来，猫球被皮球他们带走，所以他身边都是些不能或不会化形的小妖兽。

You XiaoMo placed the baby turtle on the table. The Metal Swallowing Beast and the Golden Winged Insect both also ran out. CatQiu (猫球??) was taken away by PiQiu and the rest, so there were only a few small demon beasts at his side who couldn't or didn't know how to change shapes.
游小默将清洗干净的灵草放到一个筛子里，他担心一次性无法成功，所以多准备了一份，几百株灵草，数量非常多。

You XiaoMo placed the magic herbs, which he had washed cleanly, into a sieve. He was worried that it wouldn't succeed in one try, so he prepared several portions. There were several hundred magic herbs, an extremely large amount.
游小默将灵丹收起来，然后又把炉鼎和剩下的灵草收进空间，打扫完地上的残渣，这才走到后方，却看到美好的沙滩变成了坑坑洼洼的月球表面，大大小小的深坑，一不小心很可能会摔倒。

You XiaoMo kept the magic pill, then put the cauldron and the rest of the magic herbs into his dimension before cleaning up the debris on the ground. He walked to the back of the house and saw that the beautiful beach had turned into a pitted surface like that of the moon. There were big and small deep pits and one was likely to fall down if they were careless.
游小默将灵草掉落的种子栽种到同一块灵草田里，这块灵草田天天被他以灵水浇灌，土壤里饱含着丰富的灵水成分，即便不用浇灵水，种子也会自动吸收土壤里的水分快速的增长着。

You XiaoMo re-planted the seeds that the magic herbs dropped in the same magic herb field. Since he constantly watered this field, the soil contained a rich amount of spiritual water. Even if he didn't water them, the seeds would absorb the spiritual water in the soil on their own and grow quickly.
游小默将炼丹所需的所有灵草和天公鼎都拿出来。
You XiaoMo took out all of the magic herbs as well as the Heavenly Cauldron.
游小默将猎兔子兽时顺便捡回来的柴火堆在一起，还有架子都摆好，动作很熟练，这也是被游柏逼着练出来的手艺，弄好后他立刻冲着山洞里的凌霄喊道：“我弄好了，你出来帮我个忙。”

You XiaoMo he had also gathered some firewood in passing while he was hunting for the rabbit beast. He piled up the firewood he had gathered and arranged the stand (还有架子都摆好). His actions were quite practiced. This was also a skill he was forced to train in by You Bo. When he finished, he immediately dashed to Ling Xiao who was in the cave and shouted, "I've ready, come out and help me."
游小默将玉简里的信息扫了一遍，然后按照惯例递给凌霄，浑然不知他的便宜爹在一旁很幽怨的看着他。

You XiaoMo swept over the information in the jade drive once before handing it to Ling Xiao as usual, completely unaware that his clingy dad was currently standing to the side, looking at him with hidden bitterness.
游小默将甜点和碗筷放下，将一副筷子塞到他手里，说：“那个万厨师做的饭菜才没有我做的好吃，这都是我一个人做的，他们还看得流口水，不信你尝尝看。”

You XiaoMo set down the dessert and tableware, shoving a pair of chopsticks into his hand. He said, "The food that Chef Wan cooks is nowhere near as good as mine. I made everything. They were drooling over it. Don't believe it then try some."
