You XiaoMo raised his head and looked towards the sky. A figure suddenly appeared there, suspended in midair. Seeing his face, You XiaoMo could help but feel shocked.
游小默抬脚走了过去。
You XiaoMo walked over.
游小默抬起头怔愣了一秒，表情霎时垮下来，眼神幽怨的看着被他压在身下，却仍然一脸惬意的男人，嘴角抽搐的说道：“我说，至少穿上衣服再进来吧。”

You XiaoMo raised his head and stared blankly for a second, with stupefied shock on his face. (表情霎时垮下来) He looked at the man, who was looking satisfied despite being pressed down by him, with hidden bitterness in his eyes. The corner of his mouth twitched as he protested, "I say, we should at least wear clothes before coming in ba."
游小默抬起头，“你是怎么知道圣女想杀莫雪姐妹？”
You XiaoMo raised his head. "How did you know that the holy maiden wanted to kill Mo Xue and her sister?"
游小默抬起头，“你知道我想说什么吗？”他这次一个字都没有说，他就不信凌霄这次能猜到他想说什么。
You XiaoMo raised his head, "You know what I want to say?" He did not believe that Ling Xiao would be able to guess what he wanted to say this time when he had not even uttered a single word.
游小默抬起头，游震天已经看不到了，难道说在他们聊天的时候，凌霄已经把游震天甩掉了？
You XiaoMo lifted his head, and he couldn't see You ZhenTian anymore. Could Ling Xiao have thrown You ZhenTian off while they were chatting?
游小默抬起手给了他一记，“虽然你品种不明，但肯定不是狼，嗷呜嗷呜的叫什么，又没人给你颁奖。”
You XiaoMo wacked him. "Though we have no idea what sort of beast you are, but you definitely aren't a woof. What are you howling for, no one's going to give you a prize for it."
游小默抬起手，它死活不肯松口，笑过后，他忍不住叹气道：“小乌龟啊小乌龟，今晚可能是我们最后一次相处，明天开始你就要回玄龟族，到时你要乖乖的，还要努力变强，把族中的坏人统统都赶跑了。”

You XiaoMo raised his hand, and the baby turtle refused to loosen his jaws. After You XiaoMo laughed, he couldn't help but sigh. "Baby turtle, ah, baby turtle. Tonight is probably the last time we'll meet. Starting from tomorrow, you'll return to the Black Turtle Clan. When that time comes, you must be obedient, and you must do your best to become strong so you can chase out all of the bad people in the clan."
游小默抬起眼皮看了他一眼，“你知道要怎么浇水吗？
You XiaoMo lifted his eyelids and looked at him. "Do you know how to water them?"
游小默抬起脚，对准第一个朝他冲过来的打手，重重一踹，后者闪躲不及，身体倒飞出去撞到后面的人，一群人顿时摔得东倒西歪，惨叫声此起彼伏的响起，还有骨头咔嚓的声响，一脚就把四个打手都搞定了。

You XiaoMo raised a foot and took aim at the first brute that charged towards them, kicking out. The other didn't even have a chance to dodge, his body flying backwards into the three behind him. The group was immediately bowled over, screams resounding along with the cracking of bones. He had dealt with all four in one kick.
游小默抱紧吞金兽撒腿就跑。
You XiaoMo tightly hugged the Metal Swallowing Beast as he scampered off.
游小默抹了下嘴角，即便他服下心脉丹，但是白虎的精血远比他想象的还要狂暴，而且一滴精血中蕴含的能力非常庞大，能量在他体内四处碰撞，简直就像一匹脱缰的野马。

You XiaoMo wiped the corner of his mouth. Even though he had taken the Heart Meridian Pill, the White Tiger's Life Blood was even more violent than he had imagined. Moreover, there was an immense amount of power contained in one drop of Life Blood, and the energy collided with itself all throughout his body, as if it were an unbridled wild horse.
游小默抹了下额头的汗水，从空间里拿出照明的夜明珠，由于天已黑，整个山洞也黑漆漆的，伸手不见五指。

You XiaoMo wiped the sweat from his forehead and took out the illuminating (夜明珠) Night Pearl from his dimension. As it was nighttime, the entire cave was so dark that one could not even see their fingers right in front of their face.
游小默抹了把脸，猩猩果然是皮糙肉厚，为了把剑刺进他的身体里，他使尽吃奶的力气，差点没气了。
You XiaoMo wiped his face. Gorillas were truly tough with a thick skin. He had use so much force to plunge that sword in, he almost ran out of breath.
游小默抹掉脸上的表情，“你刚刚出价多少？”
You XiaoMo rubbed away the expression on his face. "What price did you just offer?"
游小默抽了抽鼻子，越是靠近他就越觉得那股吸引力越强大，虽然不会像吸毒一样让他控制不住自己，但是是一直被催促，他有种心慌慌的感觉，所以在听到凌霄的提议后，他仅犹豫了两秒就同意了。

You XiaoMo rubbed his nose. The closer he got, the stronger the lure felt, and although it wasn't like he had taken drugs and couldn't control himself, it felt as if something was continuously hurrying him along. He had a kind of panicked feeling, so after hearing Ling Xiao's suggestion, he only hesitated for two seconds before agreeing.
游小默担心他会被水流给冲走，吓得连忙将他拎回来，小家伙可没有武力值，而且海底广阔无边，被冲走后他到哪里去找他啊，不得哭死他。

Fearing that he would be washed away by the current, You XiaoMo freaked out as he hurriedly dragged the little guy back. The little guy had no fighting power in him at all and with the vastness of the ocean, if he was swept away, there was no way he was going to find him again. What was he going to then. (不得哭死他)
游小默担忧的看着凌霄的背影，不知道他能不能对付得了游震天，他是挺想相信凌霄的，但是游震天跟以往的对手不一样，他的实力比凌霄超出两星，是至今为止最强大的对手。

You XiaoMo looked at Ling Xiao's back worriedly. He did not know if Ling Xiao would be able face up to You ZhenTian. He would like to believe in Ling Xiao, but You ZhenTian was different from the previous opponents they had faced before. His strength was higher than Ling Xiao's by more than two stars and he was by far their most powerful opponent.
游小默拍了下脑袋，犹豫了两秒，“呃……口渴？”
You XiaoMo patted himself on the head and hesitated for a few seconds. "Uh... thirsty?"
游小默拍了拍窝在他怀里鼓动个不停的吞金兽，顺着人流跑过去，当距离目标越来越近的时候，他才发现那是酒楼的方向。

You XiaoMo patted the Metal Swallowing Beast, who was wiggling in his hold, as he ran, following the crowd. When he got closer and closer to the target, he realized that it was to the direction of the hotel. (酒楼)
游小默拜托他做的正是找轮回丹剩下的几味灵草，还有炼彩丹的灵草，不论种子，成长期，还是已经成熟的灵草都可以。

What You XiaoMo had requested of him was to find the few remaining magic herbs for the Samsara Pill and find magic herbs for refining rainbow pills. No matter whether they were seeds, immature and even mature magic herbs, all were fine.
游小默拿了一张卡片，直接写下自己的名字和那颗十级灵丹。
You XiaoMo took a card and wrote down his name and that level ten pill.
游小默拿出一枚玉简，里面记录着一张<t0/>彩级一品<t1/>丹方。
You XiaoMo took out a jade drive with a first grade rainbow level recipe inside.
游小默拿出二十枚灵晶放到柜台上，说：“灵晶我已经付，我想二位应该没有异议，那么再也不见。”
You XiaoMo took out twenty spirit gems and put them on the counter before he said, "I've paid the spirit gems. I believe that you two should have no objections. Then may we never meet again."
游小默拿出他之前复制的玉简，果然在里面找到转生丹。
You XiaoMo took out the jade drive he had copied before and sure enough, he found the Reincarnation Pill inside.
游小默拿出邀请卡。
You XiaoMo handed over their invite.
游小默拿着储物袋喜笑颜开的离开了空间。
You XiaoMo held the magic bag and beamed with happiness as he left the dimension.
游小默拿着地图看了几遍，最后确定它真的只是宫殿的地形，上面连哪个地方有宝贝都没有标明，只有一些奇怪的线条，线条分为红黄蓝三种，像迷宫似的九拐十八弯。

You XiaoMo looked over the map several times before finally determining that it really did only display the topography of the palace. It didn't even indicate where the treasure was. There were only a few strange lines, split into red, yellow, and blue colors, and it twisted and turned like a labyrinth.
游小默拿着灵酒重新出现在房屋前，鼻子特别灵敏的吞金兽立刻从屋顶滚下来，朝他怀里的灵酒扑过来，千钧一发之际被他躲开，吞金兽扑了个空，四肢着地。

You XiaoMo reappeared in front of the house with the spirit wine. The Metal Swallowing Beast who had a particularly keen nose immediately rolled down from the roof and pounced towards the spirit wine in his arms. You XiaoMo dodged at the eleventh hour, and the Metal Swallowing Beast closed in on empty air before it landed on all fours in the ground.
游小默拿起放在旁边的瓶子喝了口灵水，干涸的灵魂之力顿时慢慢的恢复了。
You XiaoMo picked up the bottle next to him and drank a sip of spiritual water. His dried up soul force slowly recovered in a moment.
游小默拿起旁边早就准备好的顶级灵草，这些灵草比较珍贵，他不敢大意，所以一次只扔十株进去，虽然提炼比高级灵草困难一些，但是这种程序他已经驾轻就熟，难度不大。

You XiaoMo picked up the transcendent level magic herbs that he had prepared long in advance. These magic herbs were fairly valuable, so he didn't dare to be negligent, and he only threw in ten at a time. Even though it was a bit harder to refine these compared to high level magic herbs, he was already extremely familiar with the procedure, so it wasn't too bad.
游小默拿起龟壳摇了摇，这个小家伙还是挺机灵的。
You XiaoMo picked up the shell and shook it a little. It seemed that this little fellow was actually pretty clever.
游小默指着柴火堆，“给我点火。”这就是物尽其用。
You XiaoMo pointed to the firewood pile, "Help me light it on fire." This was the method to make the best use of everything.
游小默按照凌霄的吩咐，将他们要说的话刻在玉简里，包括轮回丹的消息及条件，然后交给叶农让他尽快送到傅苍穹手里。

Following Ling Xiao's order, You XiaoMo put everything they wanted to say in a jade drive, which contained info on the Samsara Pill and their conditions. He then handed it to Ye Nong, telling him to sent it off quickly to the hands of Fu CangQiong.
游小默按照配方上的步骤将所有的灵草都塞进坛子里，再按比例对一些灵水进去，配方上并没有说要用灵水，毕竟灵水是极其稀缺的东西，他只说要用普通的水就可以了。

You XiaoMo stuffed all the magic herbs into the jar according to the steps of the recipe, before proportionally pouring some spiritual water into the jar. The recipe did not say that spiritual water should be used. After all, spiritual water was an extremely scarce good. It only stated that ordinary water should be used.
游小默挑了一套勉强能入眼的蓝色衣服，白色那套则是给凌霄的，然后才请老板娘结账。
You XiaoMo selected a blue set of clothing that was passably acceptable. The white set was for Ling Xiao to wear, and then asked the proprietress to ring up the bill.
游小默挑了一家人来人往的酒楼。
You XiaoMo picked a restaurant (酒楼) that was bustling with people (人来人往).
游小默挑了几张彩级一品丹方出来，视线却不由自主的朝玉柜瞄了一眼，他的空间虽然有一些顶级灵草，但还是凑不齐几张丹方的任何一张。

You XiaoMo picked out a few first grade rainbow level(彩级一品) recipes but his gaze, uncontrollably brushed over the jade cabinet. Although he had some pinnacle level magic herbs in his dimension, it wasn't enough for any of the recipes.
游小默挑了半刻多种才确定目标----坐在墙角，一个正在吃糖葫芦，看起来只有七八岁的小男孩。
After picking around for a few minutes You XiaoMo finally found his target---a seven/eight year old that was sat by a corner, eating a candied fruit.
游小默挥手，“那就不必了，我身边不缺牛马。”
You XiaoMo waved his hand. "Then there's no need, I don't need anyone to do physical labor for me."
游小默捂着脑袋，深深地觉得一家之主真的不好当，动不动就被家暴，他要向妇联投诉。
You XiaoMo clutched his head. Being in control was too hard, and too often met with domestic violence. He was going to complain to the Woman's Federation (妇联).
游小默捏住他的脖颈拎起来，大鹏鸟立刻扑腾着双翅挣扎起来，他平静的说道：“我记得凌霄很喜欢吃烤鸟。”
You XiaoMo pinched his neck and lifted him up. The Roc promptly flapped its wings in a struggle. You XiaoMo serenely commented, "I remember that Ling Xiao really likes to eat roasted chicken."
游小默换了新面孔，知道他的人就更少了，这位宫长老确实没有见过游小默，但是他却知道九夜的大名以及他背后的丹师工会。
You XiaoMo had changed to a new face and few people recognized him. This Elder Gong had never seen You XiaoMo, but he knew of Jiu Ye's name and the Mage Association behind him.
游小默捧着他花了三千万灵晶换来的心灵花草，这是他买过最贵的灵草，身上的灵晶都被掏空了，现在只剩下五六百万灵晶，根本买不起黑莲草。

You XiaoMo held the Flower Heart Herb that he had spent thirty million spirit gems to buy in his arms. This was the most expensive magic herb that he had ever purchased, and he had used up almost all of the spirit gems he had on him. Now he only had five or six million spirit gems left, and there was no way it was enough to buy the Black Lotus Herb.
游小默掀开黑<t0/>鸦<t1/>右边的羽毛，果然在脚上看到一张巴掌大小的黑色帖子，颜色和黑<t2/>鸦<t3/>的羽毛是一样的，<t4/>难怪一<t5/>开始没人发现。

You XiaoMo lifted the feathers on the right side and, as expected, there was a note about the size of his palm on its foot. The color was as black as the feathers of the Black Crow, so it was no wonder no one noticed at first.
游小默掠过一根枝桠，回头看了眼紧追不舍的唐中华，像讨债鬼似的，又不是城主府的守卫，干嘛这么卖命啊！

You Xiaomo swept past a branch and looked back at Tang ZhongHua who was hot on his track, like a debt collecting nuisance (讨债鬼). You're not even the City Master's guard, why are you working yourself to the bone ah?!
游小默探头，“这只蛊有什么作用？”
You XiaoMo stretched his head out, "What's the purpose of this Gu?"
游小默探头，“这玩意有什么问题？”
You XiaoMo peeked over. "Is there something wrong with this?"
游小默接下来的动作却明明白白的告诉他们，他们的担忧是多余的，若连杨丁和王华都解决不了，凌霄会嘲笑死他的，决不能给他嘲笑他的机会。

However, what You XiaoMo did after told them clear as day that their worry was unfounded. If he couldn't even beat Yang Ding and Wang Hua, Ling Xiao would mock the hell out of him, he was definitely not giving him the chance.
游小默接过地形图，想到老板之前赠送的茶跟酒，他不懂酒，但是稍微懂点茶，那半斤确实是极品，当即从怀里掏出一枚十级灵丹递给他。

You XiaoMo took the map and thought of the wine and tea he had recieved earlier. He wasn't knowledgable about win but he knew a bit about tea, that half a catty was truly extradonary and pulled out a level pill from his pocket to hand over.
游小默接过牌子，其实他对小乌龟挺感兴趣的。
You XiaoMo took the card. Actually, he was pretty interested in the Baby Turtle.
游小默接过瓶子，最近他一直觉得修炼的速度太慢，照现在的速度，就是一年后也未必能成为四品丹师，昨天他还在考虑要不要吞服增长修为的灵丹。

You XiaoMo took the bottle. Lately he had been worried about the speed of his cultivation. Given the speed he was progressing at, he may not be at four stars even after a year. Just yesterday he was wondering if he should take a magic pill that increased one's levels.
游小默接过，发现是一张邀请卡。
You XiaoMo accepted it and found that it was an invite.
游小默推开门走进去，凌霄诧异的看着摆着床边的菜，因为没有桌子，所以只好放在床上了。
You XiaoMo pushed open the door and walked inside. Ling Xiao was looking at the dishes on the bed strangely. They had to be put on the bed since there was no table.
游小默掰着手指细数了几遍，发现每天晚上起码得有七八波人被扔到酒楼后院当花花草草的肥料的人几乎超过九成。

You XiaoMo counted on his fingers several times and discovered that every night they threw about seven or eight waves, or ninety percent, of people into the inn's backyard to be fertilizer for the flowers and plants.
游小默揉了揉脸颊，“你看错了，你继续继续。”
You XiaoMo rubbed his cheek, "You're mistaken. Continue, continue."
游小默揉了揉鼻子，说：“金翅虫吐丝是从菊花吐出来的吗？”
You XiaoMo rubbed his nose, saying, "Do Golden Winged Insects spit out their golden silk from their Chrysanthemum?"
游小默搓了搓手，“那好吧，你先调养一下，我帮你护法。”然后就搬了张椅子过来，坐在椅子上看着他。
You XiaoMo rubbed his hands together. "Alright then, you go and rest, I'll cover for you." Then brought a chair over, sitting on it and watching the other.
游小默搔了搔突突的太阳穴，回到内室看到凌霄侧着身，一只手支着脑袋在床上假寐，走过去脱鞋爬上床，再过三天便是中庭交易会的时间，在这之前他要准备好交易的灵草或灵丹，他立刻想到吞金兽和金翅虫偷来的东西。

You XiaoMo scratched his throbbing temples. Returning to the bedroom, he saw Ling Xiao lying on his side and dozing with a hand supporting his head. He walked by to discard his shoes and climb onto the bed. It would be time for the courtyard trade fair (中庭交易会) in another three days. He had to prepare the magic herbs or pills that he wanted to trade before the event arrived. He immediately thought of the things that the Metal Swallowing Beast and Golden Winged Insect had stole.
游小默摆出凌霄常用的招牌笑容看着他。
You XiaoMo pulled out the salesman smile that Ling Xiao often used and looked at him.
游小默摆摆手让他赶快拿出去。
You XiaoMo waved his hand to shoo him away. (摆摆手让他赶快拿出去。)
游小默摇摇头，“不用……”
you xiaomo shook his head, "No need..."
游小默摇摇头，“没有，你们来得刚刚好，我不打算闭关了，刚要出来就看到你们了，真是好巧。”
You XiaoMo shook his head. "No, you came just in time. I don't plan on continuing my isolation. What a coincidence that you're here just when I come out."
游小默摇摇头，“没笑什么啊！”他才不会说，要不然凌霄一定会借口又折腾他。
You XiaoMo shook his head, "I'm not laughing at anything ah!" He would not say it, or else Ling Xiao would definitely use it as an excuse to torment him.
游小默摇摇头，“那三区的价位是不是在六到九积分之间？”
You XiaoMo shook his head, "Then wouldn't Block 3's price be between six to nine points?"
游小默摇摇头，这种行为分明就是强盗式。
You XiaoMo shook his head. This sort of behavior was clearly that of a robber.
游小默摊开地形图仔细看了一遍。
You XiaoMo laid out the map and clearfully went over it again.
游小默摊摊手：“这还用得着问，你一定是不想赤血家族的人看到你，所以想躲他们，我说的对不对？”
You XiaoMo shrugged. "Do I even need to ask? It as to be because you don't want any of the ChiXue Clan to see you, so you're avoiding them, right?"
游小默摸摸脸皮。
You XiaoMo rubbed his face.
游小默摸摸鼻子。
You XiaoMo rubbed his nose.
游小默摸摸鼻子问道，说好听点是混血，说难听点是杂交。
You XiaoMo touched his nose. To put it nicely, he would be a mixed blood. To put it offensively, he would be a crossbreed. (说好听点是混血，说难听点是杂交)
游小默摸摸鼻子，“好吧，天心，其实我想告诉你一件事。”
You XiaoMo rubbed his nose. "Alright, Tian Xin, I actually need to tell you something."
游小默摸摸鼻子，“我做了什么你不是看到了吗？
You XiaoMo rubbed his nose. "Didn't you see what I did?
游小默摸着下巴直点头，说的太有道理了！
You XiaoMo rubbed his chin, nodding. What a smart idea!
游小默摸着下巴，“这么说来，有人背叛你们的可能性非常大。”
You XiaoMo rubbed his chin. "So you're saying that it's very likely that someone betrayed you."
游小默撅起嘴，真小气，“你要的灵丹叫什么名字。”
You XiaoMo pouted, so stingy, "What's the magic pill that you want called?"
游小默撇了撇嘴，我知道你其实在嫉妒我猜得到而你猜不到，我非常谅解你的心情，所以我不与你计较。
You XiaoMo’s lips curled, I know that you're actually jealous that I could guess it but you couldn’t. Since I really understand how you feel, I won’t bicker about it with you.
游小默撇嘴不理他，端着杯子喂小乌龟喝茶，吞金兽也过来凑热闹。
You XiaoMo pouted and ignored him. He lifted the cup and fed the baby turtle some tea, and the Metal Swallowing Beast also came over to join the fun.
游小默收回吞金兽和金翅虫，人已经迅速的撤离了战场。
You XiaoMo took back the Metal Swallowing Beast and the Golden Winged Insects. He had already speedily evacuated from the battlefield.
游小默收回目光，他现在只能祈祷凌霄的动作不要太过明显，好在他们只约定半个月而已。
You XiaoMo retracted his gaze. Now, he could only pray that Ling Xiao's movements would not be too obvious. Fortunately, they promised that it would only be for half a month.
游小默收回目光，转头朝谢俊一群人的方向看过去，他早就发现他们的存在，只是当时没空理会而已。
You XiaoMo retracted his gaze, turning his gaze towards Xie Jun and co. He had noticed them ages ago. He simply didn't have the time to bother with them before.
游小默收回邀请卡，难怪他总觉得最下方的那些人的背影都很眼熟，而且那一带比较空，其他人好像都在避开那个地方。
You XiaoMo took back the invite. No wonder the people at the very bottom seemed so familiar, and the area was more empty. The others all seemed to be avoiding that area.
游小默收起地形图，说：“鬼哭涯在鬼冢山脉的西南方向，据说西南方是古战场厮杀最惨烈的地方，也是死人最多的地方，有强大的冤魂一直在哪里徘徊，距离这里不近，要不用空间符？”

You XiaoMo put the map away and said, "The Weeping Ghost Shore was southeast of the Ghost Tomb Mountain Range. Supposedly the southwest was where most of the action occurred in the Ancient Battlefields and most of the deaths too. (古战场厮杀最惨烈) A lot of powerful evil spirits (冤魂) wandered around there, it wasn't too faraway, should we use a teleportation talisman?"
游小默收起视线看向他的左手边，卫白那张苍白的脸顿时引入眼帘，见他终于把注意力放到这边，卫白冷然的表情露出一丝淡淡的笑容。

You XiaoMo retracted his gaze and looked towards his left. Wei Bai's pale face was the first thing he saw. Seeing that his attention was finally on this side of the room, Wei Bai's cold expression revealed a hint of a smile.
游小默攻击的时候没有留手，就像凌霄说的，对敌人仁慈就是对自己残忍。
You XiaoMo hadn't shown mercy when he attacked. As Ling Xiao said, kindness to an enemy is cruelty to oneself.
游小默整理好身上的衣服，转移话题道：“你有没有找到古叔？”
You XiaoMo tidied himself up and said to switch the topic, "Have you found Uncle Gu yet?"
游小默无所谓的耸耸肩“那外面三具尸体怎么办，要是就这么扔了，他们的同伙找上门来会以为和我们有关系，要不你去烧了？”

You XiaoMo shrugged nonchalantly, "Then what are we going to do about the dead bodies outside? if we just leave them there, when their comrades arrive, wouldn't they think we had something to do with it? Maybe you can burn it?"
游小默无视游震天那双阴沉的眼睛，又将手放在晶石板上，想了想便加了一个重磅炸弹上去。
You XiaoMo ignored You ZhenTian's dark gaze and put his hand on the crystal slab again. He thought about it for a moment before adding a heavy bombshell.
游小默无语的翻了翻白眼，大哥，你的计划早在几个月前就已经破产了，别太异想天开了。
You XiaoMo speechlessly rolled his eyes. Dage, your plan went up in smoke several months ago. Don't indulge in wild fantasies too much.
游小默无语，这是人身攻击啊！
You XiaoMo was speechless. This was a personal attack!
游小默早上与老夫妇下田时粗略的算过，一亩灵草田可以种植上千株灵草，以二级灵草为例，满打满算也才两枚灵晶，他挖了胡村安全的保障，只给两枚<t0/>灵晶他<t1/>也过意不去，所以他决定编个好点的故事，把灵草田也买了。

You XiaoMo had calculated things with the old couple beforehand. One acre of farmland could be used to grow over a thousand magic herbs, mostly level two magic herbs. When filled up, it was only two spirit gems. He had accidentally dug up the thing keeping the village safe, so just two spirit gems didn't seem enough. Therefore, he decided to make up a nicer tale and buy their fields as well.
游小默早就想过这种情况，听到老人的话并未感到意外。
You XiaoMo had expected this sort of situation and wasn't surprised upon hearing the elder's words.
游小默早愣住了，他没想到鲁长老会一口气拿出这么多积分，甚至附赠了两样东西，但是想到他们对丹方的重视就释然了。
You XiaoMo was stunned. He hadn't been expecting Elder Lu to offer so many points at once, even adding two additional offerings. However, it made sense, considering how much they valued pill recipes.
游小默早猜到他会这么问，通灵玄龟可能已经知道莫景带着小乌龟在中途被人袭击一事，毕竟小乌龟是玄龟族的延续，身份地位非同一般，这么久都没回去，玄龟族的人恐怕担心不已。

You XiaoMo had long since guessed that he would ask about this. The Psychic Black Turtle most likely already knew of how Mo Jing had been attacked while bringing back the baby turtle. All in all, the baby turtle was the Black Turtle Clan's descendant, and its status and position were both not ordinary. The Black Turtle Clan's people were probably extremely worried that it hadn't come back for so long.
游小默星星眼，“喜欢！”
You XiaoMo's eyes sparkled. "I like it!"
游小默晋级<t0/>六级丹师的<t1/>消息传出去后，那些整日在他面前乱晃的人终于消失了，再也没有人跑到他面前刻意讽刺他的等级不如腾<t2/>梓<t3/>心。
After the news of his breakthrough had spread, those who kept coming to bother him disappeared, and no longer did anyone come to mock him about his level being lower than Teng ZiXin’s.
游小默晚上不准备做饭，不过为了不打击到他的小妖兽们的积极性，他还是决定犒劳他们一下，毕竟这次要不是他们当下那些突袭过来的妖兽，他炼丹的过程肯定没有那么顺利。

You XiaoMo was not intending to cook at night, but in order not to douse the enthusiasm of his little demon beasts, he decided to reward them with food. After all, if they had not intercepted those demon beasts which launched a surprise attack, his process of refining pills would not be so smooth.
游小默暗暗的窃笑，现在更加肯定青年是知道小乌龟的。
You XiaoMo laughed secretly to himself. Now he could confirm even more that the youth knew about the baby turtle.
游小默暗道一声固执，不过他也知道老人说的不是没有道理。
He was a really stubborn old man, You XiaoMo thought to himself, but the other's words were reasonable.
游小默更加不好意思了，却还是忍不住辩驳道：“随让你正门不走，偏偏要翻窗进来，我还以为是什么不怀好意的人。”

You XiaoMo felt even more embarrassed, but he could not help refuting, "Who asked you to enter by flipping over the window (翻窗) instead of entering from the door. I thought you were a person harboring malicious intentions."
游小默最不缺的就是丹方，要不是因为其他长老开出的条件他都没有办法达成，其实他也不想把丹方拿出来遭人惦记。

The one thing You XiaoMo didn't lack was pill recipes. However, if it wasn't for the fact that he couldn't deliver anything else the elders were asking for, he wouldn't be willing to give away the pill recipe he had.
游小默最后还是没能拗过他。
In the end, You XiaoMo wasn't able to win the argument.
游小默最恶心的就是这个厨娘，因为人肉饭菜就是她做的，天知道第一天晚上他吃的花生和<t0/>糖藕片<t1/>是不是<t2/>有被沾过<t3/>什么，一想到这个他就恶心的不得了，一脚踢过去毫不留情。

You XiaoMo felt most disgusted about this cook because she was the one who made dishes out of human flesh. Who knew what the peanuts and sweet lotus roots he had eaten on the first night had been contaminated with. At this thought, he shuddered in disgust and didn't show any mercy as he kicked out.
游小默有一种深深的为他的小乌龟的未来感到担忧，通灵玄龟看起来也不是个太平的种族，争权夺势果然到哪里都能看到，照这样下去，他的小乌龟还能平安的长大么？

You XiaoMo had a sort of deep concern over the future of his baby turtle. The Psychic Black Turtle didn't seem to be a very peaceful clan either, and indeed, power struggles could be found everywhere. If things continued like this, could his baby turtle still grow up peacefully?
游小默有些不情不愿的跟他订立了契约。
With reluctance, You XiaoMo made a contract with him.
游小默有些失望，正要摇头，眼角余<t0/>光突然<t1/>瞥见一处位置比较偏僻的铺子下方悬挂的晶石板上的字样，愣了一下。
You XiaoMo was a little disappointed, about to shake his head when he noticed a rather out of the way stand and the words on the plate hanging underneath and paused.
游小默有些迟疑，“想，但又不想。”
You XiaoMo hesitated before saying, "I want it but also no."
游小默有点感兴趣，但是他不准备竞拍，他身上还有一颗神境高星内丹没用，再来一颗他也用不了。
You XiaoMo was a little interested, but he wasn't preparing to bid. He still had a Divine three-star level Life Crystal that he hadn't used yet, so even if he got another one he couldn't use it.
游小默有种他被鄙视的感觉。
You XiaoMo had a feeling that he was being looked upon with disdain.
游小默有预感，距离他突破成为彩级丹师已经不远了。
You XiaoMo had a premonition that it wasn't far anymore until the point he could break into the rainbow mage level. (彩级丹师)
游小默朝他们挥挥手，本来他提议立刻走人的，但凌霄不肯，说什么既然救了人家，至少露个脸，露个屁啊，他分明感觉凌霄是想看戏！

You XiaoMo waved to them. He had proposed to leave immediately, but Ling Xiao refused, saying that since they had already saved the two, they should at least show their faces. Show what shit ah! He clearly felt that Ling Xiao just wanted to watch a good show!
游小默朝他笑了笑。
Xiao Mo smiled at him.
游小默朝集镇的方向看了一眼，果然热闹非凡。
You XiaoMo looked towards the town's direction, it was truly bustling with energy.
游小默期盼的看向凌霄，眨眨眼睛。
You XiaoMo turned to Ling Xiao with anticipation, and blinked his eyes.
游小默本想像来时一样从上空穿过去，但没等他靠近，心中徒然升起一股奇怪的感觉，好像妖坟场里有什么东西吸引他过去一样，上次明明没有这种感觉的。

Originally You XiaoMo wanted to just fly across like how they did before, but just when he got close, a strange feeling suddenly rose in his heart, as if something in the Demon Beast Graveyard was luring him in. Last time there clearly hadn't been this kind of feeling.
游小默本来以为这家伙对灵酒的配方也很感兴趣，对方察觉到他的视线就看了过来，眼神带着挑衅，他就知道这家伙绝对是故意的。
At first he thought that Lin HaoWu was also interested in the recipe until they looked over with a provoking gaze. Then he knew it was intentional.
游小默本来只打算每种挖两到三株即可，但是得知他们的打算后，他便欣然同意了，自己不用刻意卖给别人。
At first, You XiaoMo was only going to take two-three stalks of each, but after hearing their decision, he gladly agreed.
游小默本来可以利用自己对空间的掌控进行栽种，但是容易精神疲惫，而且人必须在空间里面他才能进行作业，在外面他顶多只能做到摄取实物出来，最后，不奴役凌霄一下他心里不平衡。

Of course, You XiaoMo could have used his control over the dimension to plant the magic herbs, but he would quickly become mentally exhausted and he had to be inside the dimension for him to do this. He was only be able to taken objects in and out from outside the dimension. Furthermore, if he did not enslave Ling Xiao from time to time, his mind would feel out-off-balance (心里不平衡).
游小默松了一口气，原来是来买容颜丹的，本来他就准备拿去买，既然她说了，现在卖给她也无妨，旋即拿出瓶灵丹，“学姐要几颗？”

You XiaoMo gave a small sigh of relief. So, she was just here to buy the beauty pills. He was going to go sell them anyways, and since she asked, it doesn’t matter if he sells them now to her. He took out a bottle of beauty pills. “How many does xuejie want?”
游小默松了一口气，然后继续回去奋斗，好在凌霄的火很给力，兔子兽它不像万灵地羊肉那么多讲究，不到一刻钟，浓浓的肉香味就飘了出来，绝对可以把人馋得口水直流。

Xiao Xiao breathed a sigh of relief before went back to his struggle. Fortunately, Ling Xiao's fire was very strong and the rabbit beast meat was not as particular as the meat of the Thousand Spirit Earth Sheep. In less than fifteen minutes, the strong smell of roast meat was drifting out. The scent was definitely able to make people salivate in gluttony.
游小默枕着凌霄的肩膀，肚子吃得比凌霄还要圆，撑得他有点睡不着，轻碰的时候还能听到打鼓一般的声音。

You XiaoMo pillowed his head on Ling Xiao's shoulder. He had eaten until his stomach was rounder than Ling Xiao's and was so full that he found it a little uncomfortable to sleep. He could hear the sound akin to the beating of a drum when he lightly bumped his stomach.
游小默果断拒绝了，他们是去找宝藏的，有外人在可不行，而且最重要的是，他非常讨厌双胞胎看着凌霄的眼神。
You XiaoMo rejected him outright. They were here for the treasure, they couldn't be having outsiders into their team. Of course, the main issue was that he hated how the twins looked at Ling Xiao.
游小默根据眼睛的部位，确定了两个方位，因为那场大战将白虎地形的头部劈出一道深深的峡谷，他不清楚是哪边，他指着地图一处对凌霄说道：“我们分头行动，你去这个位置，我去那个地方……”

Judging by the position of the eyes, You XiaoMo picked out two directions it could be. Due to the grand battle from before, the white tiger's head was split in halves, creating a deep canyon. He didn't know which side it was on so he said to Ling Xiao, pointing at the map, "We'll split up, you go there and I'll go here..."
游小默根本没有反应过来。
You XiaoMo could not even react. (游小默根本没有反应过来)
游小默欣喜的跑进去，凌霄果然睁开了眼睛，“现在感觉怎么样，内伤是不是好多了？”
You XiaoMo ran in delightedly. Sure enough, Ling Xiao's eyes were open, "How do you feel? Is your internal injury much better now?"
游小默欣喜，“那真是太好了，现在可以把船只借给我们了吧？”
You XiaoMo rejoiced, "That's great! Can you lend the boat to us now?"
游小默正准备收起传音石的动作又停了下来，凌霄现在应该很想找到他才对，所以不可能会主动掐断与他的联系，除非……凌霄已经知道他在哪里。

You XiaoMo was about to prepare to put away the transmission stone when he stopped again. Ling Xiao should be yearning to find him now, so it was impossible for him to take the initiative to cut off his connection, unless... ...Ling Xiao already knew where he was.
游小默正想找人问问，“你们这里有没有心灵花草和黑莲草？”
You XiaoMo just happened to be looking for someone to ask things to. "Do you guys have the Heart Flower Herb (心灵花草) or the Black Lotus Herb (黑莲草)?"
游小默正斟酌着要怎么开口，老人就说话了。
You XiaoMo was deliberating on how to to start a conversation when the old man spoke.
游小默正要跟他说再接再厉。
You XiaoMo wanted to tell to him to continue persisting.
游小默步伐比较慢，洗完手和脸上的油渍才端着最后一道甜点和碗筷走出来，刚走到船舱门口，迎面有三个人走出来，和他们一样是外来者的身份。

You XiaoMo was a little slower, washing the grease from his hands and face before leaving with the dessert and cutlery. Just as he arrived at the cabin, three people walked out, heading in the opposite direction. These people were also outsiders like him.
游小默气得撸起袖子就冲过去抓他们，丝毫没有注意到传音石已经不闪了，表面冒着一层淡淡的光芒，是联系已经接通的征兆。

You XiaoMo was so angry that he pulled up his sleeves rushed over to catch them. He did not notice that the transmission stone had already stopped flickering and the surface was shimmering with a faint glow, which was a sign the connection had been established.
游小默气急的掐住凌霄的脖子，这个混蛋竟然又骗他，早知道就不把玉简给他看了，害他好一阵失落。

You XiaoMo saw red as he grabbed Ling Xiao by the throat. This bastard actually deceived him again. If he had known earlier, he would not have passed the jade drive to Ling Xiao to look, resulting in him feeling a sense of loss for quite a while.
游小默求助看向乔无星。
You XiaoMo looked at Qiao WuXing for help.
游小默求救的看向凌霄。
You XiaoMo sent an SOS signal towards Ling Xiao's direction.
游小默汗了一把，他其实是想让他们去啃通灵玄龟的脑袋，而不是啃硬邦邦的龟壳，因为就算他们真的能啃动龟壳，也无法给通灵玄龟致命的伤害。

You XiaoMo felt three black lines going down the side of his face. (汗了一把)He was hoping they would take a bite out of the Psychic Black Turtle's head and not its hard shell. Even if they could bite through the shell, it wasn't going to do any critical damage to it.
游小默沉默了一会，默默的掏钱。
You XiaoMo fell silent for a while, quietly getting out his money.
游小默沉默了一瞬，“……那还是算了吧。”
You XiaoMo fell silent a moment, "...Let's forget it."
游小默沉默了两秒：“不会。”
You XiaoMo was silent for two seconds. "No."
游小默没再继续追问，将餐盘碗筷放下就回去了。
You XiaoMo didn't pursue it, setting the tableware down before leaving.
游小默没多想就同意了。
You XiaoMo agreed without much thought.
游小默没心思去照<t0/>顾他便宜爹脑子里那根纤细的神经，花了五分钟立刻把自己<t1/>整理好了。
You XiaoMo was not in the mood to look after the delicate mental state of his cheap dad and spent five minutes to immediately tidy himself up.
游小默没心思跟他们计较这些，先付了一晚，然后吩咐掌柜不要让任何人来打扰他们。
You XiaoMo didn't bother arguing with them, paying for one night first before telling the owner that they weren't to be disturbed.
游小默没想到半路会杀出一个程咬金，而且他看起来在胡村似乎挺有地位的，这样的人很难缠，要说服他们不容易。
You XiaoMo didn't expect that halfway through a troublemaker would appear, and it seemed that this one had quite the position in Hu Village. A person like this would be hard to deal with.
游小默没时间和他玩，正准备将他塞回衣服里的时候，身下的通灵玄龟突然剧烈的颤动了几下，速度竟然慢慢的降了下来。
You XiaoMo didn't have time to play with it, but just as he was about to stuff it back into his shirt, the Psychic Black Turtle beneath him suddenly shook violently and started slowing down.
游小默没时间等，心想浪费就浪费，而且其实灵水渗透灵草田，土壤吸收了灵水，以后培育出来的灵草即便间隔一段时间不浇水也能长得很好。

You XiaoMo didn't have time to wait, so he figured that if it was wasted, then it was wasted. Plus, the spiritual water would seep into the magic herb field and be absorbed by the soil, so the magic herbs that would be cultivated later would still grow very well even if they weren't watered for a certain period of time.
游小默没有兴趣，他修炼的拂柳幽典本身就是顶级功法，不过让他意外的是，没想到中庭交易会的含金量如此之高，这让他更加期待最后一件压轴物品的真面目。

You XiaoMo did not have any interest in this. The Buddha’s Willow Standard that he was cultivating was already a pinnacle level soul training manual. However, what surprised him was the fact that the valuable of the items at the Courtyard Trade Fair would be so high. This made him look forward to what the last item would be.
游小默没有发火，反而笑眯眯的看着老板娘：“老板娘可以麻烦你再说一次吗？”
You XiaoMo didn't release his anger. Instead, he looked at the proprietress and smiled. "Proprietress, do you mind saying that one more time?"
游小默没有吊大家的胃口，他在七亿的基础上非常不识相的加了两千万灵晶，虽然每次加价不得低于五百万，但他不想别人以为他不是在恶意抬高价格，所以就加了两千万。

You XiaoMo did not keep everyone in suspense. He tactlessly added another twenty million spirit gems (两千万灵晶) on top of the last bid of seven hundred million. Although every increase in the bid price must not be less than five million, he added twenty million as he did not want others to think he was maliciously raising the price.
游小默没有告诉他红色玉简的事情，只是说得到过他留下的东西。
You XiaoMo didn't tell him about the red jade drive. He only said that he had received something that Dan Qing had left behind.
游小默没有和水妖对战过，这是青年给他的建议。
You XiaoMo had never fought with a Water Demon before, it was the young man's suggestion. (青年)
游小默没有在酒楼或巨无霸里<t0/>炼丹。
You XiaoMo did not refine pills in the hotel or the Giganticus.
游小默没有将剑插在他的心脏上面，否则现在他已经死了，而不是还留有一口气，他想知道这个人为什么要偷袭他，是不是和峡谷下面那道闪光有关系。

You XiaoMo hadn't shoved the sword into his heart, otherwise he would've been dead by now and not on his last breath. He wanted to know why the man had ambushed him and if it had something to do with the flash at the bottom of the canyon.
游小默没有将玉简递给他，只是简单的介绍了下<t0/>赤<t1/>火丹。
You XiaoMo didn't hand the jade drive over, simply describing the Red Blaze Pill.
游小默没有就此罢休，抡起拳头又用力的砸了几下，把玄泽砸得嗷嗷叫个不停，剧烈的晃动着脑袋想把他晃下来。

游小默转头看一眼前方茂密的林子，林子黑漆漆的看起来没几个人，但闯进去就真的变成瓮中捉鳖，犹豫了下还是拐向一处人迹较少的建筑。

You XiaoMo turned his head and looked at the dense forest ahead. The inky-black forest seemed to be sparsely populated, but he would truly become a fish in the barrel (瓮中捉鳖) if he burst in. After hesitating for a moment, he turned into the direction of a building that had fewer signs of people.

You XiaoMo wasn't afraid of him, after all, when they met Jiang Liu in Xing Luo City, he was still level nine, upper grade (九级上品). Even now he was just level ten, lower grade, so during their time apart, it didn't change much.

Xuan Sheng stroked his grizzled beard and put on an insincere smile, "This old man just wanted to ask, is Sir (公子) certain that Mo Jing is at the ChuYun Mountain Range?"
玄盛显然也知道这件事，他的话反而让游小默怀疑，说不定他们和邢七是一伙的。
Xuan Sheng obviously knew this too, but his words made You XiaoMo suspect that maybe Xing Qi and them were in cahoots.
玄盛看到他的模样不禁沉下脸，入魔者的战斗力虽然会翻倍增长，但是后果他亦十分了解。
Xuan Sheng's expression could not help darkening when he saw Xuan Ze's appearance. Although the fighting strength of devil-path cultivators would double, he knew the consequences very well.
玄盛眼中透出一丝晦暗的喜色，“老夫从龙老那里听说了，是灵龟族的莫景找你们来的，说是有话要传达与我们，不知是何事？”

A trace of dark joy (晦暗的喜色) was revealed in Xuan Sheng's eyes, "This old man heard from Old Long (龙老) that it was Mo Jing from the Mystic Tortoise Clan who asked you to come. He said that there was something you had to convey to us. May I know what the matter is?"
玄盛眼中闪过一丝异样，似乎被年轻男子的话动摇了，但也仅仅一瞬间，声音便冷厉下来，警告道：“阿泽，你忘了我们玄龟族的规矩吗，怎么可以对帮助我们的恩人说这种话！”

A peculiar glint flashed through Xuan Sheng's eyes and he seemed to be swayed by the young man's words. However, it was only for a moment. Then his tone chilled as he warned, "Ah Ze (阿泽), have you forgotten the rules of our Black Turtle Clan? How can you say such words to the benefactor who helped us?!"
玄盛眼神一历，神色有些阴晴不定，却没有第一时间反驳他的话，这一犹豫反而坐实了凌霄的话是对的。
Even though Xuan Sheng's expression was obscure, he did not immediately refute Ling Xiao's words. This hesitation confirmed the truth of Ling Xiao's words.
玄盛脸一沉，阴森森的说道：“看来无路如何也不能放过你们，你们知道得太多了，只有死了我才能安心。”
Xuan Sheng's expression darkened as he sinisterly admitted, "It seems that I cannot let you go no matter what happens. You both know too much. I'll only feel at ease if you're dead."
玄盛虽然知道莫景遇险的事情，但是他并不知道救走莫景的人就是凌霄和游小默。
Although Xuan Sheng knew that Mo Jing had met with danger, he did not know that the people who rescued Mo Jing were Ling Xiao and You XiaoMo.
玄盛被说服了，他们出来的时间不能太长，否则族人会怀疑，所以这件事必须速战速决，玄泽的战斗力不必玄明差，等他打败那个少年，正好可以来帮他。

Xuan Sheng was convinced. They could not be away for too long, otherwise their clan members would become suspicious, so this matter must be resolved quickly. Xuan Ze's fighting strength was not any lower than Xuan Ming's. When he defeated that young man, he could go over to help him.
玉仙城才刚遭逢大难，作为大公子却跑到这种偏远的地方来，据他所知，星罗城再过不久就要举办选拔赛，这个时候他不应该出现在这里才对，除非有什么东西比选拔赛更重要。

The Immortal Jade City had just encountered a great catastrophe. Though he was eldest young master (大公子), he ran over to such a remote place. From what he knew, the Silk Star City (星罗城) would be holding a selection trial (选拔赛) in the near future. He should not have been out here at this sort of time unless there was something more important than the selection trial.
玉床太坚硬，切成两部分显然不可能，游小默干脆从底部下手，因为石床是固定在地上的。
The jade bed was too hard to be cut into two parts. You XiaoMo thought he might as well start from the bottom because the jade bed was fixed to the ground.
玉柜里的顶级灵草都是中级灵草，上品一株都没有，大概都被丹房的主人带在身上。
All of the pinnacle level magic herbs in the jade cabinet were of mid-grade quality, none of the high-grade ones. (上品) They were probably on the person who owned this room.
玉简里记录的正是许多灵丹的丹方，文字很古老，和凌霄从丘冉那里偷来的天魂经一样，以前他又对比过翻译和原本，所以他看得懂一些字。

Recorded within the jade drive were the pill recipes of many magic pills. The characters of the pill recipes were ancient, looking just like characters from the Heavenly Soul Scripture that Ling Xiao stole from Qiu Ran. He could comprehend a few characters as he had compared the translation and original text in the past.
王老板一想到里面的客人十之八九就是赶走白衣人和黑衣人的人，就狠心拿了半斤茶叶，还将他房间那套上等的紫色茶具带了上来。

Remembering that he was eighty/ninty percent sure the guest was the one who had chased away the man in black and man in white, he made his mind and took out half a catty of tea leaves. Not only that, he also brought along his high-grade purple tea set with him.
王老板一愣，立即回道：“有点。”
Owner Wang was taken back for a second before answering, "A few."
王老板不是个喜欢说大话的人，八成人都相信他的话，还有两成持怀疑态度。
Owner Wang was not someone who exaggerated so most of them believed him while a few were skeptical.
王老板推开门走进去，看到坐在桌边的男人，他亲自将男人要的茶沏好，随后他又将两坛上百年的花雕拿出来。
When owner Wang opened the door and stepped inside, he saw the man sitting by the table. He even personally brewed the tea for the man and brought his two jars of hundred year Shaoxing wine.
王老板满腹疑惑，撇下杨老板急匆匆的跑到二楼，那间房的门依旧紧闭，里面的人也不知道有没有离开。
With a stomach full of questions, owner Wang left owner Yang and hurriedly ran up to the second floor. The door was still closed shut, and he wasn't sure if the people inside left or not.
王老板猛吸一口气，这下他终于确定了，连忙说道：“小人是来问问，客人要不要喝酒，小人的酒窖里藏有上百年的花雕。”
Owner Wang violently took a breathe in, now he was sure and quickly answered, "I'm just here to ask if you wanted any drinks? In our wine cellar we have a hundred year old Shaoxing wine." (花雕) (小人)
王老板离开前偷偷的朝里面瞄了一记，透过屏风只是隐约看到一道人影盘腿坐在床上且一动也不动。
Before the owner left, he secretively took a glance inside and saw a faint sillouhette of a person sat crossed legged on the bed, unmoving behind the screen (屏风).
王老板笑呵呵，能不重建他是很高兴，不然又要花掉一大笔灵晶。
Owner Wang had a cheerful smile on, it was great that he didn't have to rebuild his inn, otherwise it would've been a huge investment.
现在他们已经不需要再改头换脸了，身份既然已经被拆穿了，也就没什么好隐藏的，光明正大的，别人反而认不出他们。
They no longer needed to change their faces as their identities has been exposed and they had nothing to hide. On the contrary, others may not recognize them with them walking about openly.
现在他又试着回想一遍，确实没有疏漏才开始。
Now, he tested it out and went through it again in his mind. Only after ensuring that there were no emissions did he begin.
现在他没心思像想那些，他从江流那儿偷听到一件事。
Nevertheless, he was not in the mood to think about these now as he had overheard something from Jiang Liu.
现在又增加了转生<t0/>丹这个<t1/>烦恼，要是把关系搞砸了，他就别想出现在东洲人多的地方了，那缺少的两株灵草要上哪去找？

Now he had the Reincarnation Pill added to his troubles. If he messed up and made more grudges, then he could banish all thought of going anywhere with many Dong Zhou people again, and then where would he go to find the two magic herbs he was missing?
现在回想起来，掌柜昨晚的行径其实很可疑。
Thinking back on it now, the concierge's actions last night were actually very suspicious.
现在外面的人都以为姬云琅只是失踪而已，实际上，只有妖凰族的人才知道，姬云琅已经死了，凰族有一座本命楼，楼里供奉的都是妖凰族所有成员的本命心火，所谓心火，有人死灯灭之意。

Currently, the people outside all thought that Ji YunLang was just missing. In actual fact, only those from the Demon Phoenix Clan know that Ji YunLang was dead. The Phoenix Clan had a Lifebound Tower (本命楼) and enshrined in the tower were the the Lifebound Heart Fires(本命心火) of all the members of the Demon Phoenix Clan. The Heart Fire(心火) would extinguish upon the death of that person.
现在大家想离开都不行。
Now no one could leave even if they wanted to.
现在就算游小默不杀它，把它晾在湖边，不用十天半个月它也会死。
Even if You XiaoMo didn't kill it then, just by letting it out to dry by the lake, in a few weeks, it would die.
现在很多人都在找他们的，他师傅也不例外。
Right now, a lot of people were looking for the two of them, and his shifu wasn't an exception.
现在的游族人其实已经不如远古那般正统，多数其实是远古游族人的旁枝，加上后世因为各种原因，现在就连赤血家族本家人也不够正统。

The current You Family members were not nearly as 'legitimate' as those of the ancient past. Most of them were from side-familes of the ancient You Family and along with many later reasons, even the main family/branch of the Vermillion Blood Clan were not very 'legitimate'.
现在这种情况说明自然城里正在发生什么麻烦事，而他们现在最需要的就是避免麻烦，所以是<t0/>为了莫景的<t1/>灵草沾上麻烦，还是现在就离开，凌霄把选择权交给游小默。

The current situation indicated that some troublesome matter was happening inside ZiRan City and what they needed the most now was to avoid trouble. Therefore, Ling Xiao passed the right to choose whether to attract trouble by getting Mo Jing's magic herbs or leave right away to You XiaoMo.
现在这种情况说明自然城里正在发生什么麻烦事，而他们现在最需要的就是避免麻烦，所以是为了莫景的灵草沾上麻烦，还是现在就离开，凌霄把选择权交给游小默。

The current situation indicated that some troublesome matter was happening inside ZiRan City and what they needed the most now was to avoid trouble. Therefore, Ling Xiao passed the right to choose whether to attract trouble by getting Mo Jing's magic herbs or leave right away to You XiaoMo.
现在，很多地方都在讨论一件事。
Now, many people were all talking about one topic.
现在，滕家全军覆没，柴家却还剩下四个人。
Now, the Teng family had been wiped out, but the Chai family had four still standing.
理想很丰满，现实很骨感！
His dreams were very ambitious, but reality was very harsh!
瓦片这种东西得轻拿轻放，不然<t0/>稍微碰撞就会发出声响，在寂静的夜里声音还会扩大几倍。
Things like tiles had to be gently handled, otherwise it would make a sound with just a slight collision and the sound would be magnified several times in the silent night.
甘长老一语便道出游小默的修为。
Elder Gan revealed You XiaoMo's cultivation with one sentence.
甘长老的目光顿时移到游小默身上，这一看不仅发出一个疑惑的声音，“彩级一品，而且即将突破二品，你这位朋友叫什么名字，怎么好像没看过？”

Elder Gan's gaze immediately moved to You XiaoMo. He could not help letting out a voice of doubt, "A Grade One Rainbow Level, and one that is one the verge of breaking through to Grade Two. What is your friend's name, why does it seem that we have not seen him before?"
甘长老等人由于身份地位比较高，他们每月能得到的积分相对校多。
Since Elder Gan and the others were in very high positions, the amount of points they could gain every month was comparatively higher.
生存在活水河界的强大并不是只有通灵玄龟一族而已，哈有许多从几万年前就生存在这里的老牌大妖兽，比如这片海域的领主赤雷海蛟。

The Psychic Black Turtle clan wasn't the only force to be reconize with in the Living Waters River Boundary. There was many ancient (老牌) demon beasts that has resided here from tens of thousands of years ago. The lord (领主) of this sea area(海域), the Red Thunder Mizuchi/Flood Dragon(赤雷海蛟), was just one of them.
由于一区的导师和长老比二区和三区多，所以面积又是最大，约莫有四五十个铺子，大多数铺子里都坐着一位导师或长老。

Since Block 1 had more teachers and elders than Block 2 and Block 3, they also had the most space. There were approximately forty to fifty shops, and most of the shops had either one teacher or elder sitting inside.
由于他们飞地高与快，水妖大概也能感觉到他们的修为，所以沼泽平静得不起一丝波澜。
Because they were flying both high and fast, the water demons most likely could also sense their cultivation level, so the swamp was peaceful without a single ripple.
由于在家里不受爸妈的重视，小时候的游小默就想着做点什么事吸引爸妈的注意力，那时候他的脑袋还不是很聪明，于是选择了做饭，事后差点没后悔的自杀，因为他没吸引到爸妈的注意，反而把游路和游柏给吸引来了，从此他过上<t0/>了悲催的<t1/>生活。

Since they rarely seemed to care about him, the young You XiaoMo wanted to do something to attract the attention of parent. He wasn't very smart back then, so he chose to cook, and definitely regretted it afterwards, because he didn't get his parents' attention, but instead You Lu and You Bai. From then on, he lived a miserable life.
由于居住在东洲的都是通天大陆原始的种族，他们思想补 开化，所以造成这里很多东西都比外面的落后，比如东洲的修炼者与凡人就分得很清楚，很少出现修炼者与凡人住在同一个城镇的情况，当然也有个别例外的。

Since most of those who lived in Dong Zhou were the most primitive races, they weren't open to experience, causing the development here to fall behind. For example, the practitioners in Dong Zhou segregated themselves strictly from normal people. It was very rare that practitioners and normal people would be found in the same town. Of course, there were some exceptions.
由于有人游震天三人的加入，地图的价格没过多久就超过了六亿，大家似乎都比较保守，每次加价的数目都在一到<t0/>两千万灵晶之间<t1/>。
Because You ZhenTian and the others had joined in, the price of the map went past six hundred million soon enough. Each increase was only ten to twenty million.
由于淬炼的灵草数量比较多，游小默比平时要小心一些，因此多花了一些时间，反复淬炼了四次，时间只过去了一个时辰，若是平时，他估计还要再花半个时辰才能完成。

You XiaoMo had to be more careful than usual since there was a larger number of herbs being distilled, so it took him more time, too. By the time he repeated his distillation for the fourth time, only an hour had passed. Usually, he would need another half hour to finish.
由于滕家与柴家有实力的都败了，所以他们的空缺就被其他人填上，有的甚至是排名在五十名之后的。
Since the Teng and Chai families were wiped out, the spaces left by them were filled in by others, even some who didn’t rank in the top fifty.
由于灵草的品质不一样，效果肯定也有很大的差别，所以难道肯定会比以前高一些，因此更需要小心。
Due to the different qualities of the magic herbs, the effects would greatly vary as well. Therefore, the difficulty level would be higher than normal, he would have to be more careful too.
由于炼丹房靠近外侧，如果有人经过一不小心是会被发现的，所以游小默捧着灵草和凌霄去了书房，书房的空间够大，只要小心点就行了。

Since the Pill Refining Room was closer to the outside, if someone came by accident, they would discover it, thus You XiaoMo carried the magic herbs and went with Ling Xiao to the study. The study had enough space so they just needed to be a bit careful.
由于通灵玄龟的动作太大，游小默为了稳住身形，根本无法做其他事情，偏偏他带出来的小妖兽们都帮不上什么忙，再这样下去，玄泽说不定会把他带到他的同伴那里去。

Due to the Psychic Black Turtle's large movements, it took all he had to stablize himself and not only that, all of demon beasts he brought along were useless. If this kept up, Xuan Ze could very well bring him to where his comrades were.
由于鼻子和眼睛太显眼，两人直接从嘴巴的缝隙前进去。
As the nose and eyes were too conspicuous, the two directly entered from a small crack at the mouth.
男人一脚踢开刑七的尸体，一边朝他看了过来，黑若深潭的眼睛仿佛含着一丝兴味之色，赤裸裸的杀气霎时令高殷浑身一冷，冷汗立刻浸湿了衣衫。

With one kick, the man kicked away Xing Qi's body and looked towards his direction. That dark-as-abyss eyes contained a sliver of interest (兴味之色) as the unreserved killing intent sent a shiver down Gao Yan's spine, instantly cold sweat drenched his shirt.
男人不是很适应的甩掉大刀上的血，方对他温和的说道：“接下来轮到你了，你喜欢清蒸还是煎炸？”
The man flicked off the blood on his large knife a bit unnaturally. He said to him warmly, "It's your turn next. Would you rather be steamed or fried?"
男人不相信，一看就有问题，他看向唯一表情正常的游小默，“能说一说发生什么事了吗？”
The man didn't believe it. It was clear something was wrong. He looked to You XiaoMo, who was the only one with a normal expression. "Could you tell me what happened?"
男人从座位上站起来，笑眯眯的说道：“好了，我么也去看看吧。”
The man stood up from his seat and smiled. "Okay, let's go take a look as well."
男人修长的腿突然借天明停顿的空挡，猛然朝他踢去。
The man's slender leg suddenly took advantage of the moment where Tian Ming halted and abruptly kicked at him.
男人偏头看了他一眼，脸上却没有丝毫意外，这个人不是别人，正是刚刚追杀另外两名黑蜘蛛成员的黑袍男子。

The white-robed man tilted his head and glanced at him, but there was no surprise on his face. He was no one else, but the man in the black robe who had just been chasing the two other members of the Black Spider.
男人却已经瞬移到他面前，手上的刀从他头顶劈下，黑袍人丁看到自己被劈成了两半，两秒后意识才完全消失。

But the man had already appeared in front of him in an instant. He sliced his knife from the top of his head down, and the fourth person in black watched as his own body was split into two. Two seconds later, his consciousness finally disappeared.
男人呵呵一笑，“现在还不是时候。”
The man chuckled and said, "It's not the time yet."
男人在听到他的话后不禁皱起眉，总觉得他话中有话一样，在鬼冢山脉不一定能立刻出现在鬼哭涯，可是他了解凌霄，绝对不是个会说大话的人，除非他有百分之百的把握。

The man couldn't help but frown after hearing this. He always felt as if his words had double meanings. In the Ghost Tomb Mountain Range, one couldn't necessarily instantly appear in the Weeping Ghost Shore, but he understood Ling Xiao and knew that he absolutely was not someone who would brag needlessly unless he was one hundred percent sure.
男人将少年放下，身形一闪便冲到两人中间，不到五秒就与两人交手了不下百次，看似简单、直来直往的动作，其实每一下都仿佛带起火一样，那股雄厚的灵力震得两人握着短刀和扇子的手微微发麻起来。

The man put the young man down before his figure flashed as it dashed in between the two. It was not even five seconds before he had exchanged no less than a hundred moves with the two. The moves which looked simple and straightforward appeared as if they contained flames. That strong and solid soul power (灵力) shook the two so much that their hands holding onto their dagger and fan became slightly numb.
男人平静地说道：“有什么事到笑阁再说。”
The man serenely said, “If there’s anything, bring it up when we go to the Smile Pavilion (笑阁)."
男人并没有制止他们，他相信，等他们亲眼看到凌霄的实力就会知道谁才是真正的强者。
The man didn't stop them. He trusted that when they saw Ling Xiao's strength with their own eyes, they would know who the real expert was.
男人应了一声，“应该就是他们。”
The man hummed in agreement, "It should be them."
男人悠然的目光从弯刀移到对方身上，带着一丝浅浅的打量，嘴角慢慢的弯起一丝弧度，露出浅笑：“所以？”
The man's leisurely gaze moved from the scimitar to the other party, giving him up with a shallow look. The corners of his mouth slowly curved a little, showing a faint smile, "So?"
男人惊叹的看着凌霄，女人则是一脸爱慕，这个世道谁不喜欢强者，有实力的人往往会很受欢迎。
The men looked at Ling Xiao was wonder, while the women looked at him with adoration. In this world, who didn't like experts? Powerful people would always be greatly welcomed.
男人拿出血玉，血玉和传音石有些相似，不同的是不能直接对话，只能一手握紧血玉，然后通过心神进行交谈。

The man took out the Blood Jade (血玉), the Blood Jade was like a transmission stone (传音石), but you can't talk directly into it. What you do is hold the jade tightly with one hand and using one's (心神) to communicate.
男人望着某个方向灿烂的笑起来，虽然没有名字，但他已经确信。
The man gazed into the distance with a brilliant smile. He was already convinced although he did not have a name.
男人沉默的瞥了他一眼。
The man glanced at him silently.
男人淡淡的瞥他一眼，“你不是我的对手。”
The man glanced at him indifferently, "You are no match for me."
男人满意的点了点头，他一直在期待他的突破，万年前其实是反对他去中级位面的，就是担心会影响到他的晋级。

The man nodded in satisfaction. He had always been looking forward to his breakthrough. Ten thousand years ago he was opposed to Ling Xiao going to the Middle Level Realm, fearing that it would affect his advancement.
男人点点头，“可以，我们到外面去说。”
The man nodded, "It is, let's go outside and talk."

The Jade Devil Snake was soon at the point where it was at it's last gasp and it dropped from the sky.
碧妖蛇惨叫一声。
The Jade Devil Snake let out a miserable shriek.
碧妖蛇的蛇毒对人类和其他妖兽或许有用，但是吞金兽和金翅虫并不是普通的妖兽，好歹都是远古的传说。

The venom of the Jade Devil Snake may be effective against humans and other demon beasts, but the Golden Winged Insects and the Metal Swallowing Beast were not ordinary demon beasts. For good or ill, they were still legendary beasts from ancient times.
碧妖蛇的蛇毒对他们没有太大的作用，吞金兽和金翅虫只感觉到一丝麻麻的感觉，然后就没了。
The venom of the Jade Devil Snake did not have much of an effect on them. The Metal Swallowing Beast and the Golden Winged Insects only felt a little numbness which soon disappeared.
磅礴的灵气在独眼刀疤面前形成一面障壁，下一秒，灵魂之力形成的大刀便狠狠的落在障壁上，风暴疯狂的席卷着，地上的沙尘都被刮起来，几乎令人睁不开眼睛，看样子似乎势均力敌。

Majestic spiritual energy formed a barrier in front of One-Eyed Scarface. In the next moment, the sword made of soul force descended harshly onto the barrier. It caused the air to whirl around wildly, picking up the dust and sand on the ground and making it near impossible for everyone to keep their eyes open. It seemed that the two forces were equal in strength.
祖玛是古玛部落上一代的圣女，修为比古玛部落现任圣女还要高，不过自从他卸任之后就很少有人再看到她。

Zuma was the holy maiden from the previous generation of the Guma Tribe. Her cultivation base was even higher than the current Guma Tribe's holy maiden, but ever since she had been relieved of her position, very few people saw her.
神火被吞噬比被打败更伤她的元气，内伤虽然不重，但是知道对方的神火拥有吞噬之力后，她不敢再与凌霄对持下去。

Having her Godfire engulfed hurt her vitality more than merely having it be defeated. Although the internal injuries weren't that great, she didn't dare to keep facing Ling Xiao after knowing that the opposing side had Godfire with the ability to engulf others.
禁制虽然可以阻止灵丹逃走，但是等级越强的灵丹，禁制阻挡的效果就越差，如果他再慢几秒，就真的要被他逃走了。

Although the restriction could prevent the magic pill from escaping, the higher the rank of the magic pill, the lesser the effect of the restriction was. The magic pill would really have escaped if he was slower by a few seconds.
离他们最近的老者突然睁开微阖的眼睛，一脸老神在在的微笑表情：“原来是九夜，这次是不是又有什么好东西要‘送’给我们这些老家伙？”

The elderly man nearest to them suddenly opened his partially-closed (微阖) eyes and smiled unperturbedly, "So it's Jiu Ye. Do you have something good thing to 'give' to us old fellows again this time?"
离别的岔口，卫白抓起游小默的手，“这一别不知道多少年才能见到，如果可以，我希望……”
At the junction where they were to part, Wei Bai grasped You XiaoMo's hand, “I don’t know how many years it'll be before we can see each other again. If it's possible, I hope...”
离开前，游小默扔给莫景一枚疗伤的灵丹，虽然无法完全治好他身上的伤，但至少可以保住他的性命。
Before leaving, You XiaoMo threw Mo Jing a magic pill that treated wounds. Although there was no way it could completely cure his wounds, it could at least protect his life.
离开前，游小默还是请李管事帮他留意一下黑莲草。
Before leaving, You XiaoMo still requested Manager Li to help him keep an eye out for the Black Lotus Herb.
离开前，游小默问了一个问题。
Before they left, You XiaoMo asked a question.
离开厨房之前，小助手把<t0/>游小默做剩的<t1/>东西藏起来，免得有人趁他们去送饭菜的时候把东西都吃了，那就亏了。
Before leaving the kitchen, the assistant hid the leftovers You XiaoMo made to prevent others from eating everything while they were delivering the dishes. That would be terrible.
离开港口后，藏不住心事的游小默立即问道：“凌霄，你为什么要把真相告诉那个老头，要是被他泄露出去，说不定会给我们添麻烦。”
After leaving the harbor, You XiaoMo who could not hide his worries and immediately asked, "Ling Xiao, why did you tell that old man the truth? It might cause us trouble if he leaked it out."
离开空间后，两人便直奔通往第十层的楼梯，正当他们要走上去的时候，上面突然传来一道冰冷的呵斥声，夹着一丝令人压抑的威压。
After leaving the dimension, the two headed straight for the stairs to the tenth floor. As they were about to go up, a coldly reproachful voice rang out, along with a suffocating spiritual pressure.
离开空间后，他们便启程会中天。
They set out for Zhong Tian after leaving the dimension.
离开空间后，游小默一不小心掉在凌霄身上。
You XiaoMo dropped onto Ling Xiao in a moment of carelessness after leaving the dimension.
离开空间后，游小默开始巩固四品的境界，一个月后，当他感觉差不多了，他才开始准备转生丹的材料。

Once he left the dimension, You XiaoMo started to consolidate his grade-four level. It was a month after when he felt that he was ready and started preparing the ingredients for the Reincarnation Pill.
离开笑阁后，游小默第一时间和凌霄分享菊花事件。
Once they left the Smile Pavilion, the first thing You XiaoMo did was to share with Ling Xiao the 'chrysanthemum' incident.
离开西面之前，游小默将高马远的人头交给了翁公。
Before leaving the west, You XiaoMo handed Gao Mayuan's head to Wen Gong.
秀<t0/>眉轻皱<t1/>了一下，滕梓心又问道：“叶长老，如果时间超过半个小时，那又要如何算，也是五分吗？”
Her sleek eyebrows furrowed, and Teng ZiXin asked, “Elder Ye, what if we manage more than half an hour. Is it still five points?”
私人交易所位于八十五层，正好在中间。
The private Exchange Quarter was on the 85th floor, right in the middle.
秉着不浪费的原则，游小默边走边拆了一串糖葫芦吃，他绝不承认早在看到小男孩吃的时候就已经馋的口水直流了。
Following his principal of not leaving anything to waste, You XiaoMo started to eat as he walked. He definitely won't admit that when he saw the kid eating it, he was already drooling over it.
种植灵草花不了多少时间，三人一起会更快。
Planting magic herbs took a lot of time and it would be even faster with three people doing it together.
积分用完自然是想方设法赚些积分，于是大家纷纷往私人交易所跑，诺大的交易所就热闹起来。

After the points were used, naturally they wanted to come up with a way to earn more points. Therefore, everyone ran towards the private Exchange Quarter, and the large Exchange Quarter became lively.
程向荣原名万俟荣，那么他很可能是万俟西元的儿子，身份地位非普通人可比的，所以在外隐形埋名很正常。

Cheng XiangRong's original name was MoQi Rong, so he was presumably the son of MoQi XiYuan. His status was uncomparable to that of ordinary people, so it was normal to hide his name in the outside world.
程向荣正准备回自己房间，听到这句话便皱起眉，“这是他的隐私，你怎么可以说这种话。”
Cheng XiangRong was prepared to return to his room and frowned upon hearing this. "This is his personal business, you can't suggest something like that."
程向荣比他们先走一步，万俟西元之子的头衔果然很有威慑力，那三名神境强者立刻放行了。
Cheng XiangRong went ahead of them. Truly the title of being the son of MoQi XiYuan held power, the three guards immediately let him through.
程向荣犹豫的看了他一眼，“因为说谎的人未必全是坏人，而且我也想知道你有什么目的。”
Cheng XiangRong looked at him hesitantly, "Because not all liars are necessarily bad people and I also want to know what your aim is."
程向荣皱了皱眉，意外的说道：“我知道你不是。”
Cheng XiangRong frowned and unexpectedly retorted, "I know you are not."
程向荣笑道：“从我跟你接触没多久就知道了，我虽然不是古玛部落的人，但是我了解他们，可是我观察了你几天，发现你完全不像东洲人，比方说东洲的人，特别是生长在部落的人都会有一种强烈的归属感，可是我发现你从来没有谈过部落的事情。”

Cheng XiangRong laughed, "I knew shortly after I was in contact with you. I understand them although I am not a Guma tribesman. After observing you for several days, I find that you are totally unlike the Dong Zhou people. For example, those from Dong Zhou, especially those who grow up in the tribes, have a strong sense of belonging. But I found that you never once talked about things from the tribe."
程向荣肯定的说道：“我知道你不是古玛部落的人，从一开始就不是，而且我还知道你并不是东洲人。”
Cheng XiangRong declared with certainty, "I know you are not from the Guma Tribe. You weren't one from the very beginning, and I also know you are not a a person from Dong Zhou."
程向荣自信的说道：“当然，这只是我怀疑你的一个因素，真正让我确定你不是古玛部落的人是你的生活习性，如果你是，一些生活细节必定会显现出来，可是在你身上我完全看不到，试问一个常年生活在部落的人怎么可能一下子就改变？”

Cheng XiangRong stated confidently, "Of course, this was only one of the factors that caused me to doubt you. What made me really sure that you weren't a person from the Guma Tribe was your living habits. If you were, some living habits would bound to appear. But I can't see any such things from you. How can a person who had lived in the tribe for years on end change all of a sudden?"
程向荣虽然有潜力，但是他现在也不过是一品修为而已，而颜辉却是二品，不过好在程向荣不是普通的丹师，万俟西元的儿子肯定有些保命手段，凭借这点，两人反倒是僵持下来。

Cheng XiangRong might have potential, but right now, he was only grade one, while Yan Hui was grade two. Luckily, Cheng XiangRong wasn't a normal mage. As the son of MoQi XiYuan, he had plenty of tricks up his sleeves. With that, the two were at a deadlock.
程向荣说：“这种事以后还是少开玩笑比较好，不然被听到会给他留下不好的印象。”
Cheng XiangRong said, "In the future, you shouldn't joke about something like that, otherwise it wouldn't be good if you're overheard."
程向荣这边只有两个人，颜辉那边却有三个人，而且他身后两个人的实力颇高，一对二根本不是他们的对手。

Cheng XiangRong only had one person on his side, but Yan Hui had two. Moreover, the strength of the two people behind him was quite high. One person fighting against those two was not their match at all.
程向荣迟疑的说道：“我想你的目标好像是小默，有时候你对他特别殷勤，你大概是为了掩饰你的目的，所以每次都拖上我好为你掩护吧。”

Cheng said falteringly, "I think your aim seems to be XiaoMo. Sometimes you are particularly solicitous to him. You probably want to mask up your objective, so every time you'd drag me in to cover for you."
程荷一斤刚开始介绍，“这是丹师工会拿出来的火系元素之心，它的价值我就不多说了，相信在座的各位都听说过，丹师工会只有一个要求，只有在场的诸位能拿出令丹师工会心动的东西即可得到它。”

Cheng He began to introduce, "This is the Fire Elemental Essence put up by the Mage Association. I believe that everyone here has heard of it before and will not say much about it's value. The Mage Association only has one request, as long as the Ladies and Gentlemen present are able to take out something that would move the Mage Association, that person would be able to get the Fire Elemental Essence."
程荷仿佛早就猜到这种情况，表情不变的说道：“丹方的主人只有一个要求，他要一枚一品彩丹和一枚二品彩丹。”

Cheng He announced with an unchanged expression as if she had long expected this situation, "The owner of the pill recipe only has one request. He wants a first grade rainbow pill and a second grade rainbow pill."
程荷拿起卷轴，似猜到大家心里在想什么，淡淡一笑：“各位或许以为这是顶级功法或技法，但是很抱歉的告诉大家，这卷卷轴不是功法也不是技法，不过我可以保证，它的价值不会差顶级功法多少……”

Cheng He picked the scroll up and she gave a faint smile, as if she had guessed what everyone was thinking in their minds, "Everyone present may be thinking that this is a pinnacle level soul training or skill training manual, but I'm very sorry to say that this scroll is neither a soul training or skill training manual. Yet, I can guarantee that its value will not be any less than a pinnacle level soul training manual..."
程荷看到大部分人露出垂涎的表情，丹师眼神却又透出一丝无奈，就知道他们都放弃了，平时确实也是这种情况，但今天似乎多了两个强而有力的竞争者，思及此，她分别朝游小默和云少的方向看了一眼。

Cheng He saw that although most were drooling at the mouth, the eyes of the mages showed a hint of helplessness and she knew that they had given up. This was usually the case, but today there seemed to be two strong and powerful competitors. Thinking about this, she separately looked in the direction of You XiaoMo and Yun Shao.
程荷知道他们身家亦不菲，但要拿得出足以匹配火元素之心的东西却差得不少，所以她也没有失望，目光投向游小默和云少，这两个财大气粗的人还没出手，她很有兴趣看看他们到底能拿出什么宝贝来。

Cheng He knew that though they had a high family background (身家亦不菲), it was difficult to take out something that matched (却差得不少) the Fire Elemental Essence, thus she was not disappointed. Her gaze cast towards You XiaoMo and Yun Shao. These two rich and imposing people have not yet shown their hand. She was very interested to see what kind of treasure they would be able to take out.
程荷笑着让人把最后一件压轴拿上来，原本热烈讨论的人霎时安静了下来，一个个都顶着黑布下的东西。

Cheng He smiled as she asked an attendant to bring the last item out. Everyone who had been enthusiastically discussing fell silent in a split second, as each and every one of them eyed the item beneath the black cloth.
程荷走上前亲自掀开盖着第一件物品的黑布，黑布下，赫然躺着一卷描绘着蓝色纹路的卷轴。
Cheng He stepped forward and personally removed the black cloth covering the first item. Beneath the black cloth was a scroll with a blue veined pattern.
空间戒指和芥子空间一样稀有，区别是空间戒指只能存放死物，而芥子空间却可以任何活物都可以进去，有灵气，并且还能种植各种东西。

The dimension ring and pocket dimension were on the same level of rarity, the difference was that the ring could only store non-living things, whereas the pocket can hold anything. It can hold living things, it has spiritual energy and you could plant stuff there.
空间的灵气比较浓，在这里调养比在外面好一些，游小默要去灵草田做农活，凌霄就没话说了。

The spiritual energy of the dimension was pretty rich, and it was better to recover in here than outside. You XiaoMo wanted to go work on the magic herb field, so there was nothing Ling Xiao could say to that.
空间符的价值太高，冲着它是圣境强者制作这一点就只高不低，若一直<t0/>花灵晶或<t1/>灵丹去买，将会是一笔极大的花销，还不如自己制作。

Teleportation talismans were too expensive. Just the fact that only Sacred Level elites could make them meant that they would only be expensive. If they always bought them with spirit gems and pills, then that would be too much of an expenditure. Better to make them themselves.
空间符直接将他们传送到活水河界附近。
The teleportation talisman directly transported them to the vicinity of the Living Waters River Boundary.
空间里。
Inside the dimension.
空间里有灵水湖，说不准就是水元素之心最喜爱的东西，情况紧急，他只能这样做，因此必须让吞金兽他们看紧点，少一滴灵水，克扣伙食费哦！

There was a spiritual water pond in his dimension, which was likely loved by the Water Elemental Essence. As it was an emergency, he had no choice but to sent it in and have his beasts guard it. If there was a single drop missing from his pond, he was going to cut their meal budgets! (扣伙食费)
空间里，游君其<t0/>正坐<t1/>在湖边唉声叹气，这段时间他一直在<t2/>烦恼着<t3/>要怎么样才能让儿子接受自己，因为儿子好像不喜欢他这个老子，每次都把他当空气忽略掉。

Inside the dimension, You JunQiwas sighing as he sat by the lake. During this period of time, he had been troubled over how he was to get his son to accept him, since it seemed like his son didn;t like him, always treating him like air.
突如其来的咆哮声吓得鼠兽们果真不敢再靠近，不过黄鼠兽毕竟是高阶妖兽，而且还是变异体，这声警告他并没有放在眼里，只是意外房屋竟然妖兽守着。

The sudden howl scared the mouse beasts so bad that they really didn't dare to get any closer. However, the ground squirrel beast was still a high level demon beast in the end, and moreover, it was a mutation. He didn't pay any attention to this warning, he was only surprised that there were actually demon beasts guarding the house.
突如其来的状况引来大家的注意力，有一名黑蜘蛛成员趁机逃跑了。
The sudden situation attracted everyone's attention, and a member of the Black Spider took advantage of the opportunity to escape.
突然灵光一闪，这句话便脱口而出。
With a flash of brilliance, You XiaoMo asked.
突然，掌柜的声音在他身后响起。
Suddenly, the concierge's voice came from behind him.
站在伏姓男子身后的老者突然走了出来，同时摘掉顶上的黑帽子，露出一张苍老的容颜。
The old man standing behind the man named Fu suddenly walked forward. At the same time, he took off the black hat he wore on his head, revealing an old appearance.
站在台阶上的凌霄居高临下的扫视一圈，见大家蠢蠢欲动，手指一弹，一缕红色的火焰瞬时出现在大家面前，通道的温度骤然上升可许多。

Ling Xiao, standing on the steps, swept his gaze over everyone from where he stood high above them. Seeing everyone itching to fight, he flicked his finger and a red flame suddenly appeared in front of everyone. The temperature in the hall rose dramatically.
站在游小默身侧的九夜扬了扬冷峻的眉毛，他听说的价格并不是二十万，而是十万，这次竟然翻了一倍，这让他想起听到的那些传闻。

Jiu Ye who was standing beside You XiaoMo frostily raised his eyebrows (冷峻的眉毛). He heard that the price was not two hundred thousand, but one hundred thousand instead. This time it actually doubled and it reminded him of the rumors he had heard.
站在陡峭的墙壁上往下看，一股由下往上冲的罡风顿时刮得他脸颊<t0/>一<t1/>抽一抽的，风声咆哮的声音像女鬼在鬼哭狼嚎一样。
Looking down from the steep wall he was standing on, a blast of wind coming from below attacked his face, the howling reminiscent of the screams of a female ghost.
竞争很快进入尾巴，最后坚持下来的只剩下两个势力，分别是东洲实力最强的古玛部落和真龙族。

The competition very quickly reached the tail-end of its stage, and only two major powers had persisted until the very end. They were separated into Dong Zhou's two strongest powers, the Guma Tribe and the True Dragon Clan.
竟然把话原封不动的还给他。
He actually used his words against him.
竟然拐着弯说他蠢，等你回来你就死定了。
Since you purposefully went out of your way to call me stupid, just wait till you're back. You're dead for sure.
笑阁的<t0/>气氛很压抑，男人们的表情多是一副若有所思的样子，只有个别像吃了<t1/>屎一样<t2/>难看。
The air was heavy around them. Most of the men wore expressions of contemplation, a few looking like they had just eaten shit.

第一件拍卖物品是一个炉鼎，名为红鹰炉，外表像展翅的红鹰，故此得名，虽然红鹰炉在鼎榜上的排名只排了第九十九名，十分靠后，但是抢夺的人依然不少。

The first item was a cauldron known as the Red Eagle Cauldron (红鹰炉). It's shaped like a red eagle taking flight, hence the name. Although it was only ranked ninety-nine, towards the bottom, there was still a lot of people fighting over it.
第一排的座位几乎已经有九成坐满了人，走下去就看到一张张曾经在<t0/>苍盟见<t1/>过的熟悉脸孔。
The first row was almost full. Walking down, he could see those familiar faces he had seen in the Cang Alliance.
第一排虽然说是给各大势力，但是真正坐在第一排的只有游震天等实力强大的圣境强者<t0/>和十神榜<t1/>的强者，而他们家族的人则坐在他身后，其他势力也一样。

Though the first row was given to the powerful Factions, the ones who actually were allowed to sit there were You ZhenTian and the other Sacred Level powerhouses, as well as the ones on the Ten God rankings. As for their clansmen, they took up the seats behind these people. It was the same for the other factions.
第一排还有几个位置，凌霄拉着游小默过去直接占了两个位置。
There were still a few seats in the first row. Ling Xiao pulled You XiaoMo over and took two.
第一次从上面飞过的时候只是觉得很恐怖，但还不至于让他脚软，果然亲身体验过才知道妖坟场的恐怖。

The first time he had flown across, he had felt that it was very scary, but still not scary enough to make his knees weak. However, it seemed that one could only know the true terror of the Demon Beast Graveyard by experiencing it firsthand.
第一次遇到这种情况，程荷也为难起来，她请来中庭交易会最好的鉴定师出来，在对方检验过后，得出的结果却是差不多，这下子就难办了。

It was her first time encountering this situation and Cheng He felt awkward. She invited the best appraisal master at the Courtyard Trade Fair over and after the other party's assessment, the result was that the quality of the pills were nearly the same. This would be hard to deal with now.
第九层没有第八层大，囚牢也只有十个，其中五个有人，这些人的实力两个是神境，其余三人是地境，囚牢就想五星级酒楼一样豪华，不过囚住要他们的牢笼却是世界上最坚硬的铁块铸成的。

The ninth floor wasn't as large as the eights, and there were only ten prison cells, with five prisoners in total. Two of the prisoners wer Divine level, and the other three were Earth level. The prisons were as extravagant as a five star hotel, but the bars were made from the strongest kind of steel in this world.
第二个好处则是巩固以及守护经脉，就像在<t0/>脆弱的玻璃外面加上一层钢铁一样，使身体的经脉在服用一些能量比较狂暴的东西时不会受到冲击。

Its second benefit was that it could strengthen and protect the meridians, just like adding a layer of steel on top of fragile glass. It ensured that when some explosive energy was used in the meridians, they wouldn't receive a blow.
第二件压轴物只是一本顶级功法。
The second item was a pinnacle level soul training manual.
第二天一大早，附近的人起床后发现好来客栈被一把火烧光了，而他们竟然一个都没有发现，除了失踪的掌柜四人，当天住在客栈的客人都被扔在街上，他们一点伤也没有。

On the following morning, the neighbors woke up to find that HaoLai Inn had been burned to the ground and none of them had noticed. Apart from the missing owner and employees, the customers at HaoLai Inn had all been thrown onto the streets, unharmed.
第二天一早，两人便出发了。
The following morning, the two set out.
第二天下午，房间的桌上就多了一张纸条。
On the afternoon of the second day, there was a note left on the table of the room.
第二天天亮，凌霄仍然在床上调养。
At the morning of the second day, Ling Xiao was still recuperating on the bed.
第二天早上，他给自己做了锅肉粥，因为做多了，万厨师和助手终于如愿以偿吃上他做的东西。
On the second morning, he made himself a meat congee, and because he made too much, Chef Wan and his assistant finally got what they wished for, his food.
第二天早上，游小默就准备开始炼丹了。
On the morning of the second day, You XiaoMo got ready to refine the pill.
第二天，后院堆积如山的尸体差点把酒楼的伙计吓死，知道第三天晚上终于消停了。
The second day, the mountain-like pile of corpses in the backyard almost scared the inn's manager to death, and it only finally stopped on the third night.
第二天，昨晚发生的事情在白骨小镇传得沸沸扬扬，大家在讨论两人这一次为何会跑到白骨小镇来，不过也有一些细心的人发现端倪。

On the second day, rumors and gossips of what happened last time at the White Bone Town were everywhere. Everyone was discussing as to why they had returned, but some, more observant one, found inklings of the situation.
第二天，玄龟族果然来人了，他们是直接找到客栈来的，一共有三人，其中一个恰巧是游小默和凌霄认识的，正是玄明。

On the second day, the people from the Black Turtle Clan indeed came. They came directly after finding the inn, and there was a total of three people. One of these people was someone You XiaoMo and Ling Xiao knew, for better or worse: Xuan Ming.
第二天，这家客栈可是说的黑眼圈最严重的人，很多人都对谢俊他们很不满，但碍于谢俊的实力，他们都是敢怒不敢言。

The second day, the people of this inn were said to have the heaviest eyebags, so many people were very displeased with Xie Jun. But taking into consideration Xie Jun's strength, they didn't dare to say anything, and they could only get angry.
第二次来，凌霄也是提前通知对方。
Ling Xiao had also notified the other party in advance the second time he came.
第二轮比赛名为重力屋测试。
The second round was called the Gravity Room.
第二道荤菜他打算做麻仁酥鸭，这道菜相对来说比较美观，而且它既鲜嫩又酥脆，口感是一流的。
The second meat dish he was making was Sesame Duck(麻仁酥鸭), in comparision, it was more visually appealing. Not only was it crispy but also tender, the texture was top notch.
第五件拍卖品有些出乎大家的意料，因为那是一瓶酒。
The fifth item was a bit surprising as it was a bottle of wine.
第六府也就是三大凶门中的死门，死亡率非常高。
The sixth mansion was also the 'death door', part of the 'three bad luck doors' (三大凶门), with a high mortality rate.
第四个则在卫白生辰上有过一面之缘的姬凤，相较于姬云琅三人一脸傲慢轻视，他本人则老神在在的站在最后面，带笑的眼睛完全就是看戏的表情。

The last one was Ji Feng, whom he had meant once on Wei Bai’s birthday. Compared with the other three’s arrogant expressions, he stood at the back, calm and collected. His eyes were smiling, as if waiting for a good show to unfold.
等两艘船的货物都装上去，已经过了酉时。
It was already past seven o'clock in the evening (酉时) when cargo for the two merchant ships were loaded up.
等他们反应过来，远处突然传来一道令人心悸的杀机。
By the time they did, a sliver of terrifying killing intent shot over from afar.
等他们穿过那层明显与其他地方的颜色还要深的黑雾，一阵阴风突然从脸颊刮过，游小默冷不丁打了个寒颤。
When they went through the layer of black fog that was clearly darker than the rest of the mist, a gust of dark wind suddenly scraped past their cheeks. You XiaoMo couldn't help but shiver.
等他们赶到的时候，银戈和展雨轩正围着风迟云发愁。
Yin Ge and Zhan Yu Xuan were surrounding Feng ChiYun while fretting when they arrived.
等他们赶过去，第六府外面的结界果然消失了，再怎么厉害的结界，毕竟经过千万年，在强者们合力攻击下还是破了。

Once they hurried over, the barrier to the sixth mansion unmistakably disappeared. No matter how strong it was, after tens of millions of years, it was going to broken under the combined strength of experts.
等他做完这一切，太阳已经下山了。
The sun had already set by the time he was finished with everything.
等他到了安全的地方，少不了揍他一顿。
By the time he reached a safe spot, he wanted to give him a round beating.
等他回玄龟族，要不了多久就会把你忘了。”凌霄听着他的话便不以为意的说道。
When he returns to the Black Turtle Clan, he'll forget you before very long." Ling Xiao said dismissively after he heard what You XiaoMo was saying.
等他想再找的时候，茫茫人海，对方板有可能已经不在通天大陆，他要去哪里找？

There was a vast sea of people to comb through when he wanted to find You XiaoMo's father again.,In addition, the other party may have long left the TongTian Continent. From where should be even begin to look?
等他抬头，就看到凌霄的脸竟然恢复了真容，而且变得红通通一片，<t0/>隐隐还<t1/>透着一丝扭曲，猛地推开游小默，盘起腿原地坐下，一句话也不说就闭起眼睛。

When he raised his head, he saw that Ling Xiao's face had returned to its true form and a flush had spread across the other's cheeks, expression twisting a little. He hurriedly pushed You XiaoMo aside, crossing his legs as he sat down. He closed his eyes, not saying a word.
等他提炼完所有灵草，天已经亮了。
Once he finished refining all of the magic herbs, the sky was already light.
等他脱险后，他<t0/>一<t1/>定向凌霄忏悔。
After he got out of this, he would beg for Ling Xiao's forgiveness.
等凌霄和游小默出来后，十层的出入口已经被堵得水泄不通，八九层的守卫者几乎都聚集在这里了，为首的是游单两兄弟。

After Ling Xiao and You XiaoMo came out, they found that the entrance to the tenth floor had been completely blocked off. It seemed that all the guards of the eighth and ninth floors had gathered here with You Dan and his brother at the front.
等宴会结束后，他们想查出是谁带走风迟云也不大可能，因为中途离开会场的人并不少，一些急着赶路的人也是在中途就离开绵绵山的，赤血家族要追究起来并不容易，而且风迟云的情况也不能暴露出去。

Even if they wanted to find out who had brought Feng ChiYun away when the banquet was over, it was impossible. There were many who had left the banquet midway and a few people who had to hurry on their journey also left the continuous mountain in the middle of the banquet. It was not easy for the Vermilion Blood Clan to investigate all of them. Furthermore, they could not disclose Feng ChiYun's circumstances.
等黄鼠兽走后，游小默幽怨的瞪了凌霄一眼，“你是不是早就知道了？”
Once the Ground Squirrel Beast left, You XiaoMo turned to stare at Ling Xiao bitterly, "You already knew, didn't you?"
答案是肯定的。
The answer is yes.
简而言之，酒师的作用比较单调，若只是为了恢复灵力，很多人大概更愿意服食灵丹。
Basically, the use of a sommelier was straightforward, to speed the recover of soul power. But, if it was just that, then most people would probably prefer to eat magic pills instead.
算盘倒是打得满满的。
He sure planned it nicely. (???)(算盘倒是打得满满的)
算盘打得满满的，岂料在刑七过来的途中，南面就爆发了混乱，有人将城门炸开，引起人群暴动，刑七直觉这件事和莫景脱不开关系。

The plan seemed good in their heads (算盘打得), but as Xing Qi was on his way, the West side exploded into chaos. Someone had bombed the gates open, creating a riot. Xing Qi's intution said that this must have something to do with Mo Jing.
管理据点的人是傅苍穹的四徒弟叶农，叶农知道游小默与他师傅的交易，上次也是他接待游小默的，不过对于他们的到来还是略感诧异。
The one in charge was Fu CangQiong's fourth disciple Ye Nong. He knew of their deal with his Shifu and last time it was him to greeted them too, but even so, he was still surprised at their arrival.
糙汉轻蔑的冷笑一声。
The burly man sneered in disdain.
紧张的时刻一波接一波，大家却没有松懈，因为终于轮到最后一件压轴物品，也就是游小默在邀请贴上看到的远古之物，具体并没有说明。

The tense moments came one after another, yet everybody did not slack off because it was finally time to bid for the last item. This was also the ancient object that You XiaoMo saw on the invitation, but the specific details on the item was not explained.
紧接着有几个人跑了进来，有人立刻认出带头走进来的人，他就是游青云的弟弟游青山，游青山看到游震天，立刻喊了一声‘爷爷’。

Then, several people ran inside. Some people immediately recognized the one in the lead. He was You QingYun's younger brother, You QingShan. When You QingShan saw You ZhenTian, he immediately called out, "Grandfather!"
紧随其后是赤血家族的子弟，其中就有在六月山脉与游小默见过面的游青山，还有一些他不认识的人，不过让游小默比较在意的是，赤血家族的人似乎对走在游青山身边的男子很恭敬。

Following closely behind were the younger generations of the Vermillion Blood Clan. Included among them was You QingShan who You XiaoMo had met in the June Mountains, and there were also some who he did not recognise. However, what You XiaoMo was more concerned about was that the Vermillion Blood Clan members seemed to be very deferential to the man walking beside You QingShan.
红冠鸡个头大，肉质比火鸡坚韧，用火烤不易熟，所以需要的时间比火鸡多了一倍不止。
Red-Crowned Turkey was huge and it's meat was tougher than a normal turkey, so it wasn't easily cooked over flame, at least doubled the time of a normal turkey.
红冠鸡个头比较大，处理起来比火鸡麻烦一点，不过胜在分量足，一只顶三只火鸡，要知道自从饭桌加入了吞金兽和良知金翅虫，他们也爱上叫花鸡，每次他要做两三只叫花鸡才够他们吃。

The Red-Crowned Turkey was bigger than a normal turkey, so it was harder to deal with, but it was filling, as much as three normal turkeys. Ever since his beasts joined their dinner table, they fell in love with the dish, the Beggar's Chicken (叫花鸡). He had to make two or three each time for them to eat.
红卡在乙级学区或许没有太大的作用，但那是因为一些需要红卡才能进入的地方都在甲级学区，可是游小默还没去甲级学区就拥有一张红卡。

The red card didn’t have much use in Ward B, but that was because the places that could only be accessed by a red card were all in Ward A. Yet You XiaoMo hadn’t even gotten into Ward A yet and he already had one.
红色的玉简，此刻就像一块普通玉简摊在凌霄手里，只要拿起来看一看，立刻就能知道这块被埋藏了万年以上的玉简里到底记录着什么东西。

At this moment, the red colored jade drive in Ling Xiao's hands appeared just like an ordinary jade drive. As long as he picked it up and took a look, You XiaoMo would immediately know what was recorded in the jade drive that had been buried for more than ten thousand years.
约他们过来见面的人似乎是一老一少，两人身上都穿着青色道袍，束起的头发只用一根绿色的簪子点缀。
The person who asked to meet them seemed to be an old and a young man. Both were wearing cyan daopaos (青色道袍) and their hair was tied up and adorned with a green hair pin.
纱帐后的男人将酒杯扔到地上，酒水洒在昂贵的绒毯上，两名侍女头垂得更低了。
The man behind the curtain tossed the cup onto the floor, wine splashing across expensive carpets. The two handmaidens bowed their heads further.
纸条上写着为了保险起见，让他们去鲸岛一个无名的小港口见面，怕他们不知道小港口在哪里，上面还附赠了小港口的地图。

Written on the paper was a message stating that they should meet at an tiny unknown port on Whale Island to be on the safe side. A map of the port was attached for fear that they did not know where the port was.
纸条上写着游小默记给他的几味轮回丹灵草，至于种子之类的，他并没有限制，只是告诉武成只要是十一二级的灵草都可以。

You XiaoMo had written a few magic herbs he needed for the Samsara Pill on the slip of paper. He did not note down any restrictions for seeds and so on, only telling Wu Cheng that anything was fine as long as it was a level eleven or twelve magic herb.

Though Mo Xue had been injured, it had only destroyed her beauty and hadn't affected her skill. However, the sisters weren't as strong as the two attendants and soon fell to a disadvantage.

Mo Xue fell back onto her chair, and soundlessly began to cry. Even though she wasn't a mage, but how could she not know how difficult it was to refine a rainbow pill that was above grade five? Moreover, even if they wanted to refine pills, they still needed a pill recipe.

As if she had fallen into an ice pit, feelings of fear, like the sprouts erupting after the rain, erupted one after another. It was only now, that she started to regret provoking them for her pride. In fear, she held on tightly to Xie Jun's arm, with half of her body hiding behind him.
莫非身体僵硬了两秒，立刻不敢上前了，她哭倒在谢俊怀里。

获胜者凌霄，经验值增加一百，轻松过关。
The winner: Ling Xiao. Experience: +100. An easy victory.
落地的时候，独眼刀疤以右脚尖为支撑点，迅速的调整姿势再发力，像迅猛出闸般朝游小默冲了过去。
When he landed, One-Eyed Scarface used the ball of right foot as a pivot point, swiftly readjusting his position and, with a push, shot out at You XiaoMo like a bullet.
虽然不如以前干脆利落的法子，但是偶尔来一次也不无所谓，当然，最好是背着他家夫人做。

还有皮球他们，看起来好像不在这里一样。”

还没等他开口，那只水妖又扑了过来，尖锐的叫声像是要震破众人的耳膜一样，真是一种非常讨厌的生物！

还没说完，游震天愤怒的声音就响了起来，“当真？”

Now, even Tian Ming and Tian Yuan's faces darkened, though they had just been preparing to watch the show.
