这下子，游小默确定白虎的右眼真的在大峡谷下面。
With this, You XiaoMo was certain that the white tiger's right eye was at the bottom of the canyon.
这下有趣了。
This will be interesting.
这不，他的仇人正在恶意的抬高价格。
As a matter of fact, his foe was currently maliciously raising the price.
这个世界上最悲哀的事情。
What could be sadder.
这个世界的人真是让他越来越难以理解了，锻炼脸上的肌肉？
The residents of this world was getting harder and harder to understand. Practicing facial muscles?
这个交易所就像个商场，但是商场的店家一般都是卖家，可是这里却都是买家，因为每个铺子前都有一块晶石板，晶石板显示着导师和长老们所需的东西。

This Exchange Quarter was just like a marketplace, but most of the time, the shops in a marketplace were of those selling things. However, here it was of those buying things, since there was a quartz sign in front of every shop. On the quartz sign, the teachers and the elders indicated the items they needed.
这个人是雷老的死对头，即乔无星的师傅申老头，他和雷老的目的是一样的，见雷老看过来，脸上的笑意更深了。
This person was Old Lei's sworn enemy and was Qiao WuXing's shifu, the Geezer Shen (申老头). His target was the same as Old Lei's. The smile on his face widened upon seeing Old Lei look over.
这个价格令游小默感到惊讶。
The price shook You XiaoMo.
这个价格已经超出灵草的总价值，而且是拍卖会开场到现在的第一个超过两亿的高潮。
This price had already exceeded the magic herbs' total value, and furthermore, it was the first time that something had gone over 200 million since the auction house opened.
这个价格并不低，很多人其实都出不起，但对爱美的女人来说，就算是五十个点数，估计她们都愿意出。
It wasn’t cheap, and most people wouldn’t be able to afford it, but for a woman who wanted to look pretty, even if it was fifty points, she would probably be willing to pay.
这个凌霄，莫不是玄龟族始祖的后代？
Could Ling Xiao be a descendant of the Black Turtle Clan's first ancestor?
这个小偷似乎对城主府的地形很熟悉，难道是内部人员做的？
This thief seemed to be very familiar with the terrain of the City Master's mansion. Could it be an inside job?
这个幻阵看似很正常，很难破，但是对游小默来说，天空那轮弯弯的月亮出现在大白天那绝对是活见鬼。
This illusion array looks normal and difficult to break but for You XiaoMo, the crescent moon up on the morning sky was a dead give away.
这个念头刚闪出，他手中的地图就突变了。
Just as the thought crossed his mind, the map changed.
这个念头刚闪过，身后突然升起一道杀机，凌厉的杀气锁定住他，快速的朝他冲了过来，明显要只他于死地的坚定信念。
Just as this thought passed through his mind, a wave of killing intent rose behind him and killing energy locked onto him, darting forwards towards him and aiming to assassinate him.
这个想法在夏音看到凌霄的长相后更让她百分百肯定是莫雪姐妹率先挑起的争端。
After Xia Yin saw the appearance of Ling Xiao, this idea made her absolutely sure that it was Mo Xue and her sister were the first to incite the conflict.
这个数目并不低，很多人身上连一万灵晶都未必有。

这个时候会出现在这里恐怕也只有黑蜘蛛的人。
The only ones who would dare appear at a time like this could be nobody else except the Black Spider.
这个时候出去做什么？
What did he go out to do at this time?
这个时间有谁会来敲门？
Who would knock at such a hour?
这个游氏是指赤血家族吧，不过，游小默有些疑惑，难道仅凭一个姓氏就能确定他是游氏族人？

This You Family should be referring to the Vermillion Blood Clan. However, You XiaoMo was a little unconvinced. Could he really confirm that You XiaoMo was a member of You Family just based on his last name?
这个男人和他老婆一样欺软怕硬，见游小默拳头比他硬，眼下也不住的求饶起来，哪里有集九镇第一高手的风范，那都扔到粪坑里去了。

这个男人现在应该就是这个想法吧。
That man was probably thinking of the same thing.
这个笑容只维持了一秒，姬翁的手就捏了下他的脸蛋，宠溺的说道：“小混蛋，爷爷不是教过你，有什么想法在心里想着就好，不然很容易被看穿的。”

The smile lasted only for a second before Ji Weng's hand pinched his cheek as he doted, "You little bastard (小混蛋), didn't Grandpa teach you that you should just think of it in your heart or it would be easy to be seen through?"
这个答案，似乎不能让滕梓心满意。

这么漂亮的老板娘，追求她的人一定不少。

This also meant that they hadn't even noticed that this person had gotten within a hundred feet of them just now. Cold sweat formed involuntarily over all four of their bodies.

It was the main reason for her backing off when she discovered Ling Xiao's true level.
这也是黑蜘蛛为什么要把贪狼的内丹拿出来拍卖的原因之一，自己用不了，放着也没用，于是拿出来发一笔横财，再<t0/>祸水东<t1/>引，不过前提是贪狼真是黑蜘蛛的人杀的。

这些事游小默他们都不知道，此刻已经赶往活水河界。
You XiaoMo didn't know about any of this, and right now, he was already rushing towards Living Waters River Boundary.
这些人之中有丹师工会和驭兽工会的丹师，早在得知今天的交易会会有一张一品彩丹的丹方出现，他们就已经开始摩拳擦掌。

Amongst these people were mages from the Mage Association and Beast Transfiguration Guild who had known long that there would be the pill recipe for a first grade rainbow pill appearing in today's Trade Fair, and had already began to roll up their sleeves for battle.
这些水鲨是在小岛附近活动最大的水兽族群，除了变异体，大部分都是六阶妖兽，它们的牙齿非常锋利，若是有一大群一起发动攻击，就像蝗虫过境，普通的小岛多半会沦陷。

These sharks were from the largest active water demon beast clan near the small island. Besides the mutants, the vast majority of them were level six demon beasts. 这些灵丹九成都是上品灵丹，少数几颗才是中品，如果凌霄只是挑剔不是上品，这些正好可以吃，因为他已经有一段时间没炼丹给凌霄吃了。

Ninety-percent of the pills inside were high grade ones, with only a few mid-grade ones. If Ling Xiao was only picky about eating high grade ones then these were edible, especially since he hadn't given anything for him to eat for a while.
这些空间被逍遥院利用起来，建成各种各样的地方，私人交易所是其中之一，面积超过一千平方米。

This empty space was utilized by XiaoYao Institution, and they were built into all sorts of different places. The private Exchange Quarter was one such place, and its area exceeded a thousand square feet.
这些调料是他很久以前买的，那时为了煮万灵地羊肉，结果万灵地羊肉对火的要求很高，于是就搁浅了，现在正好派上用场。

He bought these condiments a long time ago in order to cook the Thousand Spirit Earth Sheep meat (万灵地羊肉). But his idea ground to a halt before it could take root as the meat of the Thousand Spirit Earth Sheep required a special type of fire to cook (对火的要求很高). Now, he was finally able to put it to good use.
这件事也很好理解。
This matter was very easy to comprehend too.
这件事他父亲的那位亲信并没有告诉他，或者连他也不知道。

这件事天刀略有提过。

这件事连<t0/>苍盟也<t1/>为难，因为两人几乎势均力敌。

这位夫人向来是深居浅出，鲜少在人前露面，想不到她这次会出现在星罗城，估计是听到龙血丢失的消息。
This lady generally didn't show herself in public, keeping hidden. No one had expected that she'd come to Xing Luo City this time. It was probably because she heard about the dragon's blood.
这位导师的事迹九夜听所过。
Jiu Ye had heard of this teacher's deeds before.
这位才是专门啃金属的专家，不管多硬的金属，他都能像吃豆腐一样，总不能连龟皮都啃不动吧。
This was the true 'metal-eating' professional, no matter the hardness of the metal, he could eat it like tofu. There was no way he couldn't even bite through turtle skin, right?
这位杨导师是一名修炼者，他很喜欢吸收灵晶里的能量来增涨自己的修为，而且消费的时候大手大脚，导致他身上的灵晶所剩无几，所以才会想出这个办法。

This Teacher Yang was a practitioner who liked to absorb the energy in the spirit gems to increase his cultivation. He thought of this method as he consumed the gems in an extravagant manner, resulting in him having few spirit gems.
这几天，游小默得知<t0/>乔无星几<t1/>人来找过他，当时他刚好在炼丹，精神高度集中，所以没有注意到他们的到来，几人只坐了一会就被凌霄打发走了。

You XiaoMo found out that Qiao WuXing and co had come looking for him these few days. He had been refining pills then and was extremely focused, so he didn't notice their arrival. They came and sat around for a while before Ling Xiao sent them away.
这半个月他用掉不少顶级灵草，手上已经没有多少存货，剩下的还在灵草田里长着呢，早知如此，当初他就应该先把顶级灵草收集起来再说。

Over the past half a month he had used up quite a bit of transcendent level magic herbs, so he no longer had much in stock. The rest were still growing in his magic herb field. If he knew beforehand, he would have stocked up transcendent level magic herbs earlier.
这半个月来他累惨了。
He was dog-tired for the past half a month.
这句话不适合用在这里。
That phrase might not be so appropriate here.
这句话并没有刻意压低声音，反而刻意加大音贝，好让莫雪他们听到一样，如游小默猜想的，那群人齐齐变了脸色。
He didn't lower his voice for this, rather he purposefully said it loudly, so that Mo Xue's group could hear him. Just like he thought, the expression on their faces changed.

The result of his words, was that Chai Tian was the first to get kicked off the stage by Ling Xiao.
这句话说服了两人，他们很多年前就跟着花姑，在赌坊当打手也是一起的，本身对赌坊也没有太深厚的感情。

This sentence convinced the two people. They had followed Hua Gu for many years and had also worked together as hired thugs in the gambling house. Moreover, they did not have any deep attachment to the place.
这只水妖明显和其他水妖的特征不一样，身上没有那种诡异的颜色，全身仿佛乳白色的奶酪构成一样，光秃秃的，一双黑色的眼珠子仿佛镶在奶酪中一样，转动的时候好像要掉下来似的。

This Water Demon was distinctly different from other Water Demons in that it did not have that weird color. The Water Demon looked like it was made of milky white cheese. 这四个人不是别人，其中三个正是游小默当初去中庭交易会遇到的姬云琅，另外两个是他的手下姬文和姬武。
Three of the four were none other than the ones who You XiaoMo had met in Zhong Ting Trade Fair (中庭交易会). It was Ji YunLang, with the other two being his underlings, Ji Wen and Ji Wu.
这天晚上，他没有心情做饭。
Tonight, he didn't feel like cooking.

That day, Ling Xiao went out to do some information gathering.

Today, You XiaoMo took some refined beauty pills to the market and CatQiu decided to come out with him.
这家伙什么地方不藏，偏偏藏在泉眼下方，如果说它的目标不是泉眼，恐怕难以令他信服。
This fellow didn't want to hide anywhere else except below the spring. It wasn't hard to believe that his target was the spring.
这家伙果然对灵水湖很感兴趣，它此刻就藏在灵水湖泉眼正下方蠢蠢欲动。

这家伙现在是想整他还是怎样？

这家酒楼真是黑店！

这对话看似火药味十足，但听起来更像两个冤家，关于两人之间的恩怨，游小默听乔无星简略的提起过。

This dialog seemed as if it was full of gunpowder (火药味十足), but it sounded even more like an exchange between two sweethearts (冤家). You XiaoMo had heard Qiao WuXing briefly mention the grievances between the two before.
这小子似乎打定主意要跟他交朋友，两老也没反对，虽然很可能和凌霄有关，但他说话倒是直来直往。
This kid seemed to be dead set on making friends with him and the two elders didn't have any objections, though it might've been because of Ling Xiao, but he spoke as bluntly as ever.
这就是传说中的猿粪！
This was what you call ape shit!
这就是实力带来的好处，别人怕得罪老板娘的丈夫所以不敢开成衣店，而且老板娘是个很小心眼的人，她不许别人开成衣店跟她抢生意，所幸她卖的衣服价格还可以。

This was the advantage of strength. Others were afraid to offend the husband of the lady boss, so they did dare not open a garment shop. Moreover, the lady boss was a very petty person. She did not allow others to open a garment shop to compete for business with her. The only silver lining was that the prices of the clothes she sold were not too expensive.
这就是平常好吃懒做的结果，游小默一瞬间竟然还能想到这些，他都有些佩服自己了。
This is the result of usually being gluttonous and lazy. You XiaoMo had some admiration for himself for even being able to think of these at this moment.
这就是所谓的自掘坟墓！

这就是重力屋的效果，每天在这里锻炼的话，确实可增加身体和灵魂的强度。
This was the effect of the Gravity Room. If you trained here every day, you could improve your body and soul.

这幅表情，这幅语气……

这座小岛一直在他管辖的领域范围内，之所以一直攻不下就是因为这个原因。
This was the reason why he had always been unable to attack and obtain the small island, which was in the scope of his territory.
这张丹方是他从所有<t0/>彩级一品<t1/>丹方中挑选出来比较简单的，就算别人看到也不会怀疑这是远古的丹方。
This pill recipe was a relatively simple one amongst the first grade rainbow level pill recipes he had. Even if others saw it, they wouldn't suspect it was an ancient pill recipe.
这张玉床能坚持这么久肯定不是凡品，就这么毁了委实可怜。
This jade bed was definitely not an ordinary item for it to withstand the flames for so long. It was really such a pity for it to just be destroyed like this.
这才刚开打，莫雪就落于下风。
They had just started fighting, and Mo Xue was already at a disadvantage.
这批灵草只是进入高潮前的开胃菜。
These herbs were only the appetizer before the apex.
这时一直缓慢旋转的漩涡突然疾速的旋转起来，速度越来越快，光芒仿佛齿轮与地面摩擦迸发出一道道火花。
Now, the once slowly spinning whirlpool suddenly quickened, becoming faster and faster, with sparks as if a cog was hitting the floor. (光芒仿佛齿轮与地面摩擦迸发出一道道火花)
这时，一位接待员装扮的女侍朝他们走了过来，微微一笑，“三位贵客可是有邀请卡？”
That was when a a female attendant walked towards them, smiling softly. "Do you three gentleman have an invitation?"
这时，人群中突然走出一个白发苍苍，手拄拐杖的佝偻老人，由于年岁已高，他的眼皮耷拉着，眼睛只能睁开一条缝，不过村民们看他的眼神却都很尊敬。

That was when a white haired old man hobbled out with his walking stick, back hunched. He was so old that his eyelids seemed to sag and he could only open his eyes by a sliver, but the villagers all looked at him with respect.
这时，他们还不知道外面已经闹得沸沸扬扬了，而且游小默和凌霄还是事件的主角。
At that moment, they didn't know that it was already becoming extremely rowdy outside, and that You XiaoMo and Ling Xiao were actually the center of attention.
这时，他隔壁一位长老突然发出一声轻笑。
At this moment, the elder next to him let out a light laugh.
这时，以慢性子著称的玄明突然慢悠悠地开口道：“麟昊武，我劝你还是不要与他斗嘴比较好，你的口才没有他好，除非你的脸皮能与他厚。”

At this moment, Xuan Huan, who was famous for his phlegmatic temperament (慢性子) suddenly opened his mouth and unhurriedly said, "Lin HaoWu, let me advise you. Don't bicker with him unless you are as thick-skinned as him since you've already lost in eloquence."
这时，在他们下方，靠门右侧的角落突然钻出一个人告诉了他们答案，那是一个穿白衣的少年，长得白白净净，跑进开酒楼后就朝凌霄扑过去，一把抱住他的腰，露出一脸傻笑。

At that moment, a person suddenly slipped out from the corner to the right of the door, telling them the answer. It was a youth wearing all white, pale and clean. After he ran into the inn, he threw himself at Ling Xiao, hugging his waist, revealing a dumb smile on his face.
这时，旁边的房间也走出一个人，正是男子的同伴王华，他闻到空气中残留的香味，忍不住惊叹道：“好香的味道啊！

Right at this moment, someone walked out from another room and that someone was the other man's comrade, Wang Hua. His nose caught the lingering scent of food in the air and couldn't help but exclaim, "Something smells really good! If I recall, the food we ate yesterday afternoon also had this smell."
这时，游小默往后退了两步，凌霄替到他的位置上，刚好在强者甲的对面，说到他的身份，还真不需要对他手下留情，因为此人正是古玛部落的人。
It was then when You XiaoMo took a few steps back and had Ling Xiao replace him, right in front of expert^1. He really didn't go easy on him since they were of the Guma Tribe.
这时，游小默终于注意到万厨师和助手的存在，见他们直勾勾的盯着他做的菜，心中闪过一个主意。

At this time, the man and Ling Xiao had finished their talk and were returning. Seeing this upon entering, the man looked shocked while Ling Xiao looked to You XiaoMo, having the feeling that it was was definitely his wife who had created such a scene.
这时，迎面走过来几个人。
Several people walked directly towards him at this moment.
这时，雅间的门二度被人推开。
That was when the door was opened once again.
这时，青年突然灵光一闪，想到与他擦肩而过的银戈，急忙叫住正欲走进石林的银戈，“这位朋友，请等一等。”

At this moment, inspiration struck the youth as he recalled that he had brushed past Yin Ge. He hastily called out to Yin Ge, who was about to walk into the Stone Forest, "This friend here, may I request you to wait a moment?"
这时，青年走出来，眼神不善的看了他一眼，旋即转头对真龙族的强者说道：“长老，之前我差点被水妖伤到其实是有人暗中给我下绊子，我怀疑是黑蜘蛛故意下的黑手，目的是想让我们全都死在水妖手里。”

It was then the young man walked out and looked maliciously at the Black Spider expert. Then he turned towards the True Dragon Clan and said, "Elder, I was almost hurt by the Water Demon before because someone had set a trap for me. I suspect that it was by the Black Spider's, they want us to all die under the hands of the Water Demons."
这是个如花似玉的恬静美女，一双秋水般的眼睛盈盈生辉，小家碧玉的恬静气息给他一种熟悉的感觉。
This woman’s beauty was as delicate as a flower and as perfect as jade, eyes like autumn water shone, and the young lady’s refined composure gave him a feeling of familiarity.
这是他第一次毫不犹豫的同意凌霄杀人的观点，可喜可贺！
This was the first time he unhesitatingly agreed with Ling Xiao's murderous suggestions! Amazing!

The youth stared blankly, "Why do you say this?"
青年一看伤口竟然有中毒的迹象，而且毒性还很猛，整条腿才几秒就已经麻痹得完全没有知觉了，青年顿时急了起来，暂时用修为压抑住蛇毒，不过他知道自己是走不到宴会，可又不能放任风迟云不管。

The youth saw that there were signs of poisoning at the wound and the venom was extremely toxic. It only took a few seconds to loose all feeling in his whole leg and for it to be completely paralyzed. The youth immediately became anxious and temporarily used his cultivation to repress the snake venom. However, he knew that he would be unable to walk to the banquet and yet he could not leave Feng ChiYun unguarded.
青年不是个沉得住气的人，很快便试探起他们。
The youth wasn't a calm person, and he very quickly began to start asking them questions.
青年主动表明自己来找他们正是老人告诉他的。
The youth took the initiative and indicated that he had come to find them, as the old man had said.
青年也是龙龟族的，他叫做海初，外表腼腆，不过却是个很健谈的人，他对游小默有一点好感，一路都主动跟他介绍鲸岛的情况。

The youth was also from the Dragon Turtle Clan (龙龟族). He was called Hai Chu, and though he looked shy, he was actually a very talkative person. He had a somewhat good opinion of You XiaoMo, so he willingly explained Whale Island's situation to him along the way.
青年从储物袋取出一个巴掌大的玉盒子，递给他道：“那就麻烦你了，顺便帮我把这只玉盒子交给赦长老他们，切记一定要亲手交到赤血家族的人手上。”

The youth took out a palm-sized jade box from his magic bag and passed it to Yin Ge, "Then I will have to trouble you. Please help to pass this jade box to Elder She and the rest too. Bear in mind that you must personally hand this over to the people from the Vermilion Blood Clan."
青年代表着真龙族，知道他们动手挖灵草太麻烦，因为不是丹师就必须大动干戈，比如连根带土挖出来，游小默就顺手帮了他这个小忙。

The young man represented the True Dragon Clan's and knowing that it would take them a lot of effort digging up magic herbs, since non-mages needed to pull out the roots with the soil, You XiaoMo lend a hand.
青年到现在都没发现，不过可以想象等他知道真相后会是多么懊恼。
The youth didn't even notice anymore, but You XiaoMo could imagine how upset he would be once he learned of the truth.
青年十分讨厌姬凤，因为麒麟族和妖凰族算是死敌，所以两族的长辈时不时就会拿年轻一辈来作对比，谁都不想输给对方。

The youth really disliked Ji Feng, because the Qilin Clan and the Demon Phoenix Clan could be considered as mortal enemies, therefore the elders of the two clans would compare their younger generations with each other from time to time, and none wanted to be outdone by the other.
青年听到他答应了，不由一喜，“但是什么？”
The youth could not help but feel delighted upon hearing his agreement, "But what?"
青年哼了一声，却听他的话没再说什么。
The youth snorted, but listened to his advice and did not say anything else.
青年在说什么？
What was the youth saying?
青年急忙叫住他，要是让他就这样离开，等赤血家族的人发现并找过来，他可能已经毒发身亡了，风迟云没人看着也可能会不见，还不如赌一把。

The youth hurriedly called out to him. If he really let this man leave, he would probably die from the poison by the time the people from the Vermilion Blood Clan discovered his disappearance and came looking. Feng ChiYun may not disappear even with no one watching over him, he might as well take a gamble.
青年恳求地道：“我是赤血家族的弟子，我刚刚被毒蛇咬了，可不可以麻烦你去宴会那边帮我通知他们一声，我会感谢你的。”

The youth entreated, "I am a disciple from the Vermilion Blood Clan. I was bitten by a snake just now. I would be very grateful if I could trouble you to go to the banquet and inform my companions of this."
青年恼羞成怒。
The youth flew into a rage out of humiliation.
青年想了想，还是决定不把这个事实告诉游小默。
The young man thought for a bit before deciding not to tell the truth to You XiaoMo.
青年斟酌了半天，“那个叫莫景的男人，他只是让你们给玄龟族传达几句话而已？
The youth deliberated for a while. "Did the man called Mo Jing only tell you guys to deliver a few messages to the Black Turtle Clan? There was nothing else besides this?"
青年最不缺的就是妖兽内丹，西境妖兽颇多，每年死个几百上千只妖兽不在少数，不少是在战斗中被杀死的，也有一些是寿命到坐化的，真龙族每年少说也能攒几十颗，而且上次他从真龙族里偷出来的内丹到现在还没卖完呢。

The thing that the youth had in abundance was demon beast Life Crystals. There were many demon beasts in Xi Jing, and every year, at least hundreds of thousands demon beasts died. Most were killed in battle, but there were also a few who had died from old age. Every year, the True Dragon Clan could collect ten or so crystals at the very least, and he hadn't even finished selling all the Life Crystals he stole from the True Dragon Clan last time.
青年松了一口气，随即专心应付起身上的蛇毒，低着头的他没有发现，银戈在转弯的时候并没有拐向宴会的方向，而是向山下走去，风迟云自然是紧紧的跟着他，直到四周再无第三个人……

The youth sighed in relief and immediately concentrated on dealing with the snake venom in his body. As his head was lowered, he did not discover that Yin Ge was not heading in the direction of the banquet when he turned. Rather, he was walking down the mountain. Feng ChiYun naturally followed after Yin Ge closely until there was no one else around them. (直到四周再无第三个人)
青年没料到蛇毒会这么厉害，以他的修为只能压抑片刻，这时，他突然懊悔自己为什么要来这么偏僻的地方，否则就不会被蛇咬。

The youth did not expect that the snake venom would be so strong. He was only able to suppress it for a short moment with his cultivation level. At this moment, he suddenly regretted coming to such a such a desolate place, otherwise, he would not have been bitten by a snake.
青年没有认出他是之前坐在风迟云旁边的人，看到他也没在意。
The youth did not recognize that he was the person who had sat beside Feng ChiYun previously so he was not concerned when he saw Yin Ge.
青年皱起眉，中品和上品竟然相差五十万灵晶，差距未免太大了，不过他现在急需灵晶，也只能这样。

The young man frowned. The value of mid grade and high grade differed by a full five hundred thousand spirit gems, that was way too much, but he was desperate for spirit gems, so he could only accept it.
青年看不出他们的破绽，只得说：“既然是误会，那就算了，不过希望李管事下次一定要在第一时间通知我，灵晶不是问题。”

The youth couldn't spot their weak point, and he could only say, "Since it was an accident, then we can forget about it. However, I hope that next time Manager Li will notify me at the earliest possible moment. Spirit gems are not a problem."
青年知道他误会了，可是又无从解释，总不能说风迟云被控制住，没有他亲自引导根本不可能找得到宴会，更不可能辨认出赤血家族的人。

The youth knew that he had been misunderstood, yet he had no way of explaining himself. After all, he could not say that Feng ChiYun was being manipulated and it was impossible for him to reach the banquet without the youth's personal guidance. Not to mention how it was even more impossible for Feng ChiYun to recognize people from the Vermilion Blood Clan.
青年算是恨透了妖凰族。
It could be considered that the youth bitterly hated the Demon Phoenix Clan.
青年脸色微沉，他竟然被无视了。
The expression of the youth slightly darkened, he was actually being ignored.
青年走后，总算轮到他们。
After the young man left, it was finally their turn.
青年连忙摇摇头，同时松一口气，他就觉得不可能，小主子那么重要，莫景怎么可能会交给两个陌生人，偏偏龙老一定要他问一下。

The youth nodded hastily while releasing a breath of air at the same time. He just knew that it was impossible. The Young Master was so important, so how could Mo Jing just hand it over to two strangers, but Old Dragon had insisted on him asking about it.
青年迟疑了起来，“这个恐怕……”
The youth hesitated, "I'm afraid that this... ..."
青秋一下子就发现猫球的存在，一脸欣喜道：“哎呀，这只小妖兽好可爱啊，能不能让我抱一抱？”
Qing Qiu noticed CatQiu immediately and her face lit up. “Oh! That’s such a cute demon beast, can I hug him?”
青秋噗嗤一笑，“逗你玩的，我确实有点事情找你，听说你炼了一种名为容颜丹的灵丹，我受人之托，想跟你买几颗，不知道你现在有没有？”

Qing Qiu laughed softly. “I’m just joking, I do actually need something. I heard you refined a pill called the beauty pill, and someone asked me to purchase some; might you have any for sale at the moment?”
青秋微微一笑，“游同学，我们又见面了。”
Qing Qiu smiled softly, “Classmate You, we meet again.”
青秋抿了<t0/>抿唇，笑道：“那就多谢游同学了。”
Qing Qiu pursed her lips a bit and then smiled, “Thank you then, classmate.”
青秋说：“不多，五颗就行了。”
Qing Qiu said, “Not much, just five is enough.”
靠近游小默的天门和天阳伸长脖子看着两只大小连他们的拇指都没有的金翅虫，这种小妖<t0/>兽只能<t1/>在书籍中看到，现实几乎看不到。

Tian Men and Tian Yang, who were closest to You XiaoMo, stretched their necks to take a closer look at the two Golden Winged Insects, barely larger than their thumb. This sort of demon beast was only ever seen in books, not reality.
面对赤血家族的质问，凌霄表现得十分镇定，“怀疑我的话，把证据拿出来。”
Against the ChiXue Family's suspicion, Ling Xiao was very calm. "If you suspect me, then bring out some proof."
顶着老者看傻子一样的目光，游小默嘴角抽搐的说道：“没，我就是问一下。”
With the elder looking at him as if he was stupid, the corner of You XiaoMo's lips twitched as he said, "No, I was just curious."
顶级丹方和高级丹方有一个很大的区别。
Pinnacle level recipes and high-grade recipes had one major difference.
顶级功法最后不出所料的落入雷龙手中，因为他直接将两枚彩丹甩出来，本来就只有申老头能与他一争高下，结果其他人都拿不出手了。

Ultimately, it turned out as expected and the pinnacle level soul training manual landed in Lei Long's hands because he directly threw out the two rainbow pills. It went without saying that the only one who could compete with him was the Geezer Shen. As a result, the others could could only let it slip out of their hands.
顶级区不一定只有顶级丹师才会来，但是每一个来这里的人一定是强者，这下子进来两个，而且还是戴着一丑一美面具的人，不引起关注才怪。

It wasn't as if only transcendent level mages went to the pinnacle section, but everyone who came to this place was definitely an expert. It would be weird if they didn't get attention, especially since one had an ugly mask and the other a beautiful mask.
顶级区则是由灵草堂收购别人的灵草统一买卖。
The pinnacle section depended solely on the Magic Herb Shop purchasing other people's magic herbs and standardizing the sales.
顶级区的顶级灵草统一由灵草堂出售，和前面的高级区三个区不一样，那些都是外人租借灵草堂的摊位在这里买卖灵草。

All of the transcendent level magic herbs in the pinnacle section (顶级区) were being sold by the Magic Herb Shop. It wasn't the same as the other three districts, where outsiders rented the Magic Herb Shop's stalls to buy and sell magic herbs here.
顶级录草对各大势力是很有吸引力的，所以竞争的人不少，不过为了保证后面的资金充足，出手的人并不是特别多，然而也都是有点资产的。

Transcendent level magic herbs were very attractive to all powerful people, so there were quite a few people competing for them. However, in order to ensure that they would have adequate funds for later, there weren't very many people who were bidding, and they were all people with some assets.
顶级灵草对一些低等妖兽的震慑的作用，就是高级妖兽也不敢随随便便将顶级灵草吞下肚子，不过水妖属于半妖兽，难怪他们没有想到这一点。

Transcendent level magic herbs had the ability to shock some low level demon beasts. Even high level demon beasts didn't dare to casually swallow transcendent level magic herbs into their stomachs. But Water Demons counted as half a demon beast, so it was no surprise they hadn't thought of this.
顶级灵草并不能一概而论。
Transcendent level magic herbs could not be lumped under one class.
须不知，万厨师是学游小默的。
What they didn't know was that Chef Wan learnt it from You XiaoMo.
须不知，从他们走出客栈的时候，游小默和凌霄就已经察觉到他的存在，只是他们没有理会，都当他是不存在的。

But what he didn't know was that You XiaoMo and Ling Xiao had already discovered his existence since the moment they walked out of the inn. It was only that they paid no attention to him and pretended as if he wasn't there at all.
须不知，他不急，别人早已急得团团装。
Unbeknown to him, although he wasn't in any rush, the others were.
须不知，强盗头子从未将她的话听进去，不管她们的话是真是假，反正已经得罪了，那就干脆得罪到底，而且能尝到古玛部落的大小姐和二小姐的滋味也值了。

What she didn't know was that the bandit chief had never once listened to what she was saying. It didn't matter if she was telling the truth or lies. In any case, he had already offended her, so he might as well offend her to the end. Moreover, it was worth it if he could get a taste of the Guma Tribe's first young mistress and second young mistress.
须不知，没了大刀的他已经不会让游小默那么忌惮他了。
He didn't know that, without his sword, You XiaoMo was no long afraid of him at all.
须不知，游小默其实是在心里腹诽凌霄。
They didn't know that You XiaoMo 心里腹诽 Ling Xiao.
顿了一下，他问道：“请问你是？”
He hesitated for a moment and asked, “And you are…?”
领头正是那名伏姓男子，只见他匆匆赶过来，张口似乎要喊万俟西元，眼角余光突然瞥见凌霄的身影。

The one to take the lead was the man surnamed Fu. He rushed over and opened his mouth as if he were going to shout MoQi XiYuan's name, before he caught a glimpse of Ling Xiao's figure in the corner of his eye.
颜辉不信，“以师傅的本事，想要找一株心灵花草有何难，再者师傅也不是丹师，你把灵草送给师傅又有什么用！”
Yan Hui didn't believe him. "With shifu's skill, how hard is it to find a Heart Flower Herb. Plus, shifu isn't a mage, what use is there in giving this magic herb to shifu!"
颜辉也就是苏朗的大师兄，当初他奉命去参加逍遥院的招生大会，目的就是为了凌霄，游小默算是附加的，不过一开始他并不知道凌霄就是他的目标，直到师傅传来消息才知道，让他两人一起监视。

Yan Hui was Su Lang's dashixiong. Back then, he acted under orders and participated in XiaoYao Institution's new student orientation because of Ling Xiao. You XiaoMo could be considered an additional part of it, but at the beginning he hadn't known that Ling Xiao was his target. It was only when shifu sent over more information that he found out, tell him to keep an eye on both of them.
颜辉冷笑一声，“既然你早就知道，为什么不揭穿我？”
Yan Hui laugh grimly, "Since you long knew about this, why didn't you expose me?"
颜辉则拉着他问南陆的事情，比如发生什么趣闻，苍盟盟主长什么样，那个出现在北阳城的圣境强者之类的八卦事件。

Yan Hui pulled him along and asked about the things that happened in the South Continent. For instance, what kind of interesting news happened, how did the Head of the Cang Alliance look like, and such gossipy things like who was the Sacred Realm powerhouse who had appeared in Bei Yang City.
颜辉努力平复这心中翻滚的思绪，再抬起头，脸上已经重新挂起兄友弟恭的笑容，“师弟，每个人都有他的际遇，你的运气确实是我比不上的，但是通天大陆第一天才这个称号，你当得确实名不副实。”

Yan Hui tried hard to calm the rolling thoughts in his heart. When he raised his head, a smile that showed love and respect as good brothers should hung on his face once more, "Shidi (师弟), everyone has their own fate. Your luck is indeed incomparable with mine, but you are really unworthy of the title of the TongTian Continent's Number One Genius.
颜辉却觉得他一脸可惜的表情很搞笑，和程向荣相反，他是个薄情之人，亲情都可以不要，何况是友情，所以他觉得程向荣的想法很可笑，从他们第一次见面，他们就注定不可能当朋友。

Yan Hui felt that his face full of pity was hilarious. Contrary to Cheng XiangRong, he was a heartless person who even disregarded family ties, let alone ties of friendship. So he thought Cheng XiangRong's thinking was ridiculous. It was destined for them to not be friends from the first time they met.
颜辉反倒不着急说了，虽然这个话题有点长他人志气灭自己威风，但是若能看到苏朗脸上的自信和骄傲一点一点的崩溃，那又何妨！

Yan Hui leisurely began. Although this topic was a little like increasing another's spirit and extinguishing one's own prestige, what harm would there be in doing it if he was able to see the confidence and pride slowly collapse on Su Lang's face!
颜辉垂下眼睫毛，眼睛里的冰冷被他悄然掩盖，过了会，他才开口说道：“师弟，就算要找回面子也要有本事才行，否则丢了脸，只怕师傅会更生气，我想你也知道师傅的脾气，他最讨厌没有用和没有利用价值的人。”

Yan Hui's eyelids lowered, and the ice cold look in his eyes was covered slightly. After a while, he said, "Shidi, even if you want to regain your face, you have to have the ability to do so. Or else if you lose face, I'm afraid shifu will be even more angry. I trust that you also know shifu's temper, he hates useless and worthless people."
颜辉安慰的拍拍他的肩膀，“兄弟，不要放在心上，你拒绝了她，她总要找回点面子。”
Yan Hui patted his shoulder in comfort. "Brother, don't think too much of it. You rejected her, so she had to find some way of maintaining her pride."
颜辉对他的脑子并不抱希望，接着道：“意思就是，逍遥院并不缺乏天才，据我所知，有一个人比你更适合当通天大陆第一天才，他才是名副其实。”

Yan Hui was not hopeful about his intelligence, so he continued, "That means, there are no lack of geniuses in the XiaoYao Institution. As far as I know, there's one person who is better suited to be the Number One Genius in the TongTian Continent. He's the one who is worthy of the title."
颜辉投降的摆摆手，“我当然知道，我就是开个玩笑而已啦。”
Yan Hui raised his hands in surrender. "I know, I'm just joking."
颜辉握住他的手，将他的手指一根一根掰开，脸上却平静的笑了笑，“师弟，你也知道师兄我之前是逍遥院的院生，逍遥院能成为通天大陆第一学院，没有几斤几两重又怎么崛起得了。”

Yan Hui grabbed his hand and pried Su Lang's fingers off his collar one by one with a serene smile on his face, "Shidi, you know that I, your Shixiong (师兄), used to be a student in XiaoYao Institution. How could the XiaoYao Institution rise abruptly to become the number one educational institute in the TongTian Continent without some capability and skill?" (没有几斤几两重又怎么崛起得了)
颜辉故意用恶劣的语气说道：“他现在已经是……彩级二品。”
Yan Hui deliberately said in a nasty tone. "He is already... Grade Two Rainbow Level."
颜辉显然意犹未尽，再问，游小默就一问三不知了，大叔见他脸上有些不耐就主动告辞，顺道把颜辉带走了。

Yan Hui obviously wished to continue hearing more gossip and he asked You XiaoMo again. You XiaoMo denied further knowledge of all gossip. Seeing that his patience was running thin, the uncle took the initiative to take his leave and drag Yan Hui away at the same time.
颜辉有些意外他为什么说得这么肯定，诧异道：“你凭什么认为师傅会偏袒你？”他知道师傅比较疼爱苏朗，但是却也是个公私分明的人。

Yan Hui was a little surprised at how certain he sounded, and he said, astonished, "Why do you think shifu side with you?" He knew that shifu was fairly fond of Su Lang, but he was also someone who made a clear distinction between his public and private life.
颜辉没有在意他的嘲讽，慢条斯理道：“我记得，他刚成为院生的时候，年龄好像才二十二岁左右吧，那时他的修为是九品中品还是上品，具体我忘记了，现在才过去一年多，姑且就算两年，他已经是一名彩级二品丹师。”

Yan Hui did not care about Su Lang's ridicule as he leisurely said, "I remember that he seemed to be only about 22 years old when he just became a student. At that time, his cultivation was only at mid-grade or high-grade Level Nine though I forgot the specific details. Now, in just more one year, or two years at the maximum, he is already a Grade Two Rainbow Level mage."
颜辉皱眉，“你笑什么？”
Yan Hui frowned, "What are you laughing about?"
颜辉眼底泄露出来的杀气很清楚的告诉程向荣他心里的答案，不过他的实力明显在程向荣之上，当初在逍遥院他便可以掩饰自己的实力。

Yan Hui's murderous intentions were clear in his eyes, telling Cheng XiangRong his answer. However, his strength was clearly above Cheng XiangRong's. Back in the XiaoYao Institution, he had concealed his true strength.
颜辉突然笑了起来，“这次是我看走眼了，你不傻，你很聪明。”
Yan Hui suddenly laughed, "This time I'm the one who made an error of judgment. You are not stupid, you are really very smart."
颜辉笑了笑，脸上微僵的肌肉突然放松了下来，安抚性的笑道：“师弟，生这么大的气做什么，我只是做个假设而已，比你更天才的人确实没几个人。”

Yan Hui laughed, and the slightly stiff muscles in his face suddenly relaxed. He smiled and placated, "Shidi, what's the use of being so angry. I'm only making a conjecture, there really aren't that many people who are more gifted than you."
颜辉脸色微变，“你是怎么知道的，又是什么时候知道的？”

Hei Xiong was an intelligent person. The proprietress had caused him to make a fool out of himself in front of everyone, and she had also forced him to pay a large sum of Spirit Gems. A flash of surprise appeared in Hei Xiong's eyes. He was much stronger than the young man thus an attack like this wasn't anything, not only that, his original form (本体)was a high leveled bear. With a tough outer skin, sometimes even taking a hit with his body would do little to no harm to him.
黑熊突然开口道：“你先去，以你和刑七的实力，足够对付一个莫景，我要先处理下这里的事情，马上会赶过去的。”

黑熊见对反更感兴趣，心里微微松了一口气，“我不知道那个人是谁，只知道他每个月都会派人过来一次，刚好就是今天，他很强大，我能感觉得出来，比阁下的实力还要高一些，而且他的手下也不是吃素的，当然，我不是说阁下一定会输给那个人，只是两位想必有要事在身，多一事何不如少一事。”

The miasma produced by the black liquid soon spread to Jiang Liu's whole body. From time to time, a black gas could be seen running through the meridians from the surface of his skin. With one glance, it was enough to tell that the corrosion was too severe and he could not be saved.

Though the Black Spider's auctions weren't the number one in TongTian Continent, they were very renown. 黑蜘蛛这个势力很多人都知道，他们比强盗还要强盗，是一群随心所欲的恶人，他们的话基本不可信，谁知道会不会随随便便就反悔，没有信誉的人，除非太阳能打西边出来。

The black robed person couldn't retract his sword fast enough and so he blocked the attack with his other arm before using the power from You XiaoMo's kick to retreat several tens of meters. The black robed man's empty gaze become more and more lifeless as his life drained away. His gaze was filled with despair, and the flash of incredulousness.

The only answer he received was the black robed man once again raising his sword, poised to strike. The energy around him swelled, like a sword being unsheathed, and then the man became a streak of black, swiftly charging at You XiaoMo.

The black robed man did not reply, and just as he was about to leave, he suddenly stopped and looked back at Weng Gong, "You are just an ordinary person. Why were the people in Immortal Jade City (玉仙城) looking for you?"
黑衣男人淡漠的瞥了他一眼，“你别误会，救你不是本意，只不过看到‘熟人’才顺手将你劫下来而已，你的死话与我无关。”

The black man still carried the fire stick/torch stick (烧火棍). The color of his clothes was too dark to see if there was any bloodstains. However, the scent of blood wafting off him was stronger than before. There was even some bloodstains on the purple fire stick/torch stick.

黑袍男子身形一闪便挡在他面前，固执地道：“那可不行，你必须跟我打一架。”
The figure of the black-robed man flashed and he was blocking the way of the white-robed man when he reappeared. He stubbornly insisted, "That's won't do. You must have a fight with me."
黑鹰速度极快的穿透黑雾，飞到低处后，又以胜利者的姿态冲向明朗的天空然而就在它冲出黑雾的一瞬间，异变发生了虚无缥缈的黑雾突然像被赋予了生命一般剧烈的滚动起来，仿佛来自地狱的恶鬼，化成一张张丑陋的鬼脸，争先恐后的扑向黑鹰，黑鹰连声音都没有来得及发出来，整个身体就淹没在黑雾中当黑雾散去，一块块骨头从空中掉了下来。

The black hawk pierced through the black fog very quickly. After flying low to the ground, it began to rise upwards with the attitude of a winner towards the bright and clear sky. /PARA But the second it rose out of the black fog, something strange happened. /PARA The intangible black fog suddenly began to violently churn as if it had come to life, and like an evil spirit from hell, it transformed into many hideous demon faces. They fought with each other as they rushed towards the black hawk, and the black hawk was drowned in the black fog before it even had a chance to make a noise. /PARA When the black fog dispersed, pieces of bone fell from the sky.
鼠兽们为他们的大王欢呼，加油打气，密密麻麻的叽喳声就像放大几百倍一样，吵得人心烦意乱。

The Rat beasts enthusiastically cheered for their king. The numerous squeaking noises of the densely packed group seemed to have been magnified by several hundred times, it was so noisy that it caused one's head to swim.
鼠兽们发现情况后立刻报告给黄鼠兽知道，他们有独特的传递方式，速度可比人类快得多，收到消息的黄鼠兽立刻赶回洞府，以他们的速度，雷云可没那么快就能散去。

After the Rat Beasts discovered the situation, they instantly reported it to the Weasel Beast. They had a unique messaging system that was much faster than the human counterpart. When the Weasel Beast received the information, he immediately hurried back to the Immortal’s Cave. With their speed, there was no way the thunderclouds would disperse that quickly.
鼠兽们找了很多地方，结果只抓到五只，他们也是这个时候才怀疑小岛是不是来了其他人，后来在香气的指引下，他们发现海滩出现一座不知什么时候建起来的房屋。

The mouse beasts searched all over, but they only caught five turkeys. This was also when they started to suspect that someone had arrived on the small island. After following the fragrant scent, they discovered that a house had been erected on the beach who knows when.
鼠兽并没有把好吃火鸡的事告诉大王，不过纸包不住火，后来还是被发现了。
They didn't actually tell their king about the delicious turkeys, but the truth couldn't be concealed. In the end, it was still discovered.
鼠兽有一个优点，它们和水鲨一样拥有非常锋利的牙齿，如果水鲨敢上岸，用不了多久，鼠兽就能轻易的将它们分食了，以前就曾经发生过。

The Rat Beasts had an advantage: just like the sharks, they had very sharp teeth. If the sharks dared to go on land, the Rat Beasts would easily be able to turn them into food in a short amount of time. This had happened before.
龙族则位于龙岛，势力范围没有妖凰族大，因此龙岛属于封闭状态，龙族大部分族群都住在龙岛。

The Dragon Clan was situated at the Dragon Island (龙岛). The range of its forces were not as large as the Demon Phoenix Clan, therefore the Dragon Island belonged to the type where entry and exit was restricted. The majority of the members of the Dragon Clan were living on the Dragon Island.
龙的精血就相当于一颗大补丹，不仅可以提升修为，而且还能增加身体的强度，最重要的是它能提升灵丹的品阶。

A dragon's blood essence was the equivalent of a marvelous supplementary pill. Not only could it improve one's cultivation, it could also increase the strength of the body. Yet, the most important thing was that it could enhance the grade of a magic pill.
龙血啧一声，“麒麟族和妖凰族不同，妖凰族就如同龙族，除了最高贵的远古妖凰，还有一些体内同样流有凤凰血脉的妖兽，比如丘冉的本命契约兽五彩之鸟，所以妖凰族很注重血脉的纯净。”

The dragon blood (龙血) clicked its tongue, "The Qilin Clan is different from the Demon Phoenix Clan. Excluding the most noble Ancient Demon Phoenix, the Demon Phoenix Clan is more similar to the the Dragon Clan. Furthermore, there are also some demon beasts which also have the Feng Huang bloodline, taking Qiu Ran's lifebound contract beast the Five-Colored Bird as an example. Therefore, the Demon Phoenix Clan emphasizes the purity of their bloodline."
龙血是从龙身上取下来的精血。
Dragon blood was the blood essence (精血) taken from a dragon's body.
！”听到后面那句话，他立刻想到这正是天恨前些日子说过的话，若真是他想的那样，那么……
!” When he heard the last part of that sentence, he immediately remembered that those were the words that Tian Hen had said a few days ago. If it was really as he had thought, then...
！”鼠兽们兴奋的呐喊声叽叽喳喳的响起。
!" The excited cheers of the rat beasts started to sound continuously.

tu.prop: 将通灵玄龟的后代交给两个初次见面的陌生人，其实莫景也是下了很大的决心。
莫景有看到凌霄将邢七一只手臂卸下来的动作。

tuv.seg: 小主人太重要了，这次他才刚到西境的边缘就被人埋伏，那么在通往玄龟族的路上一定还会有很多敌人在等着他。

The Young Master was too important. This time, he had only reached the edge of the Western Continent (西境//omegat glossary said eastern continent but isn't xi west?) before being ambushed by someone, so there must be even more enemies waiting for him on the road to the Black Turtle Clan.
